items/abyssal-armor.name: Abyssal Armor
items/abyssal-armor.description: Heavy armor crafted by Apollyon, the destructive exiled Balor mystic. Apollyon sought to destroy lands to stop the falling, but was exiled for his unorthodox approaches.

items/abyssal-axe.name: Abyssal Axe
items/abyssal-axe.description: Heavy axe crafted by Apollyon, the destructive exiled Balor mystic. Apollyon sought to destroy lands to stop the falling, but was exiled for his unorthodox approaches.

items/abyssal-greaves.name: Abyssal Greaves
items/abyssal-greaves.description: Heavy armor crafted by Apollyon, the destructive exiled Balor mystic. Apollyon sought to destroy lands to stop the falling, but was exiled for his unorthodox approaches.

items/abyssal-helmet.name: Abyssal Helmet
items/abyssal-helmet.description: Heavy armor crafted by Apollyon, the destructive exiled Balor mystic. Apollyon sought to destroy lands to stop the falling, but was exiled for his unorthodox approaches.

items/achlys-razor.name: Achlys Razor
items/achlys-razor.description: Long katana carried by Judge Achlys's side. It's punctured blade is well suitable for adornment.

items/acolyte-hood.name: Acolyte Hood
items/acolyte-hood.description: A dusty hood of a follower of Mammon.

items/acolyte-robe.name: Acolyte Robe
items/acolyte-robe.description: A dusty robe of a follower of Mammon.

items/acolyte-shoes.name: Acolyte Shoes
items/acolyte-shoes.description: Dusty footwear of a follower of Mammon.

items/acolyte-staff.name: Acolyte Staff
items/acolyte-staff.description: A knotted staff of a follower of Mammon.

items/adamantine-amulet.name: Adamantine Amulet
items/adamantine-amulet.description: A rare adamantine amulet. Raises attack power.

items/adamantine-armor.name: Adamantine Armor
items/adamantine-armor.description: Armor smithed of adamantine. Surely, it will never break.

items/adamantine-helmet.name: Adamantine Helmet
items/adamantine-helmet.description: A helmet smithed of adamantine. Surely, it will never break.

items/adamantine-leggings.name: Adamantine Leggings
items/adamantine-leggings.description: Leg armor smithed of adamantine. Surely, they will never break.

items/adamantine-staff.name: Adamantine Staff
items/adamantine-staff.description: A staff crafted with adamantine. Surely, it will never break.

items/adamantine.name: Adamantine
items/adamantine.description: An unbreakable chunk of adamantine. Used to craft extremely durable weapons and armor.

items/aegis.name: Aegis
items/aegis.description: A replica of Perseus's famous shield, gifted by Athena. It will protect one from petrification.

items/aengus-ogs-lute.name: Aengus Og's Lute
items/aengus-ogs-lute.description: Second lute of Aengus Og, famous Bard of the Fomorian house of Nocturna. Aengus Og sang tales of Fomoria's conquests, but was quick to flee the lands when the great curse took haste. Does he still sing of conquest, we wonder? While wearing this item, you will tame your opponent's followers and summons, causing them to deal less damage to you.

items/affinity-candle.name: Affinity Candle
items/affinity-candle.description: When lit, this mysterious candle draws stronger enemies to you for a limited time.

items/agathodaemon-hammer.name: Agathodaemon Hammer
items/agathodaemon-hammer.description: Deals extra damage and may stun an opponent.

items/age-old-mimic-head.name: Age-Old Mimic Head
items/age-old-mimic-head.description: Head of a mimic. When wearing it, you may find more items.

items/aglovale.name: Aglovale
items/aglovale.description: A full restored resemblance of Aglovale's weapon. Feralia forged this from many memories of the brave knight, who was once lost to the demons of the season. It occasionally grants one greatly increased Arcane ability.

items/aines-axe.name: Aine's Axe
items/aines-axe.description: Strike an enemy with the hilt of a weapon, increasing the chance to stun.

items/aldons-hat.name: Aldon's Hat
items/aldons-hat.description: The hat of Aldon, the eccentric. Aldon's balance has never faltered, and one cannot be stunned while wearing this hat.

items/alfar-trinket.name: Alfar Trinket
items/alfar-trinket.description: A trinket carried by an Alfar. Using it will increase your chances of finding something rarer when opening Stranger's Gifts.

items/all-seers-gem.name: All-seer's Gem
items/all-seers-gem.description: An adornment depicting a healthy gazing eye. Adorning it upon a weapon will slightly increase the distance that you can see.

items/alpha-myrddin-cloak.name: Alpha Myrddin Cloak
items/alpha-myrddin-cloak.description: One of the notoriously recognizable robes of Merlin, the famed Avalon sorcerer. It can protect its wearer from having their resistance lowered.

items/alpha-myrddin-cowl.name: Alpha Myrddin Cowl
items/alpha-myrddin-cowl.description: One of the notoriously recognizable hoods of Merlin, the famed Avalon sorcerer.

items/alpha-myrddin-hood.name: Alpha Myrddin Hood
items/alpha-myrddin-hood.description: One of the notoriously recognizable hoods of Merlin, the famed Avalon sorcerer.

items/alpha-myrddin-robe.name: Alpha Myrddin Robe
items/alpha-myrddin-robe.description: One of the notoriously recognizable robes of Merlin, the famed Avalon sorcerer. It can protect its wearer from having their resistance lowered.

items/alpha-myrddin-shield.name: Alpha Myrddin Shield
items/alpha-myrddin-shield.description: A relic of Merlin's eccentric collection.

items/alpha-myrddin.name: Alpha Myrddin
items/alpha-myrddin.description: One of the notoriously recognizable archistaves of Merlin, the famed Avalon sorcerer. Spells cast by this staff can occasionally lower an opponent's defenses.

items/alpha-olympia-archistaff.name: Alpha Olympia Archistaff
items/alpha-olympia-archistaff.description: Rare weapon, fallen from an Olympian.

items/alpha-olympia-boots.name: Alpha Olympia Boots
items/alpha-olympia-boots.description: Light armor, reminiscent of an Olympian rogue. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

items/alpha-olympia-cowl.name: Alpha Olympia Cowl
items/alpha-olympia-cowl.description: Light armor, reminiscent of an Olympian rogue. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

items/alpha-olympia-cuirass.name: Alpha Olympia Cuirass
items/alpha-olympia-cuirass.description: Heavy armor, reminiscent of an Olympian warrior. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

items/alpha-olympia-garb.name: Alpha Olympia Garb
items/alpha-olympia-garb.description: Light armor, reminiscent of an Olympian rogue. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

items/alpha-olympia-greaves.name: Alpha Olympia Greaves
items/alpha-olympia-greaves.description: Heavy armor, reminiscent of an Olympian warrior. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

items/alpha-olympia-helmet.name: Alpha Olympia Helmet
items/alpha-olympia-helmet.description: Heavy armor, reminiscent of an Olympian warrior. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

items/alpha-olympia-hood.name: Alpha Olympia Hood
items/alpha-olympia-hood.description: Magical clothing, reminiscent of an Olympian magician. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

items/alpha-olympia-shoes.name: Alpha Olympia Shoes
items/alpha-olympia-shoes.description: Magical clothing, reminiscent of an Olympian magician. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

items/alpha-olympia-vestment.name: Alpha Olympia Vestment
items/alpha-olympia-vestment.description: Magical clothing, reminiscent of an Olympian magician. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

items/alpha-olympia-warbow.name: Alpha Olympia Warbow
items/alpha-olympia-warbow.description: Rare weapon, fallen from an Olympian.

items/alpha-olympia-warsword.name: Alpha Olympia Warsword
items/alpha-olympia-warsword.description: Rare weapon, fallen from an Olympian.

items/amadans-staff.name: Amadan's Staff
items/amadans-staff.description: Deals non-elemental magic damage to all enemies and may suspend an enemy in time.

items/ambrosia.name: Ambrosia
items/ambrosia.description: The brew of a terrible witch. It restores a moderate amount of HP and Mana while curing any negative status effects.

items/amergins-razor.name: Amergin's Razor
items/amergins-razor.description: Attack from the side, cutting an opponent's defenses and giving Ward for 1 turn.

items/amulet.name: Amulet
items/amulet.description: A simple amulet. Slightly raises attack power.

items/ancient-boots.name: Ancient Boots
items/ancient-boots.description: A seemingly ageless yet pristine pair of boots.

items/ancient-dark-essence.name: Ancient Dark Essence
items/ancient-dark-essence.description: The ancient elves seldomly carried essences to ward off the elements. This item will occasionally grant immunity to its assigned element.

items/ancient-earth-essence.name: Ancient Earth Essence
items/ancient-earth-essence.description: The ancient elves seldomly carried essences to ward off the elements. This item will occasionally grant immunity to its assigned element.

items/ancient-eye.name: Ancient Eye
items/ancient-eye.description: A strange eye imbued with even stranger magic. Keeping this in your hand will slightly boost all stats.

items/ancient-fire-essence.name: Ancient Fire Essence
items/ancient-fire-essence.description: The ancient elves seldomly carried essences to ward off the elements. This item will occasionally grant immunity to its assigned element.

items/ancient-holy-essence.name: Ancient Holy Essence
items/ancient-holy-essence.description: The ancient elves seldomly carried essences to ward off the elements. This item will occasionally grant immunity to its assigned element.

items/ancient-hood.name: Ancient Hood
items/ancient-hood.description: A seemingly ageless yet pristine hood.

items/ancient-jinn-staff.name: Ancient Jinn Staff
items/ancient-jinn-staff.description: Magical staff of a Jinn. This weapon may cause unexpected status effects.

items/ancient-lightning-essence.name: Ancient Lightning Essence
items/ancient-lightning-essence.description: The ancient elves seldomly carried essences to ward off the elements. This item will occasionally grant immunity to its assigned element.

items/ancient-mimic-head.name: Ancient Mimic Head
items/ancient-mimic-head.description: Head of a mimic. When wearing it, you may find more items.

items/ancient-robe.name: Ancient Robe
items/ancient-robe.description: A seemingly ageless yet pristine robe.

items/ancient-stone.name: Ancient Stone
items/ancient-stone.description: An extremely ancient stone. Useful for upgrading powerful weapons.

items/ancient-trolls-charm.name: Ancient Troll's Charm
items/ancient-trolls-charm.description: Strange amulet of a troll. Boosts most stats.

items/ancient-water-essence.name: Ancient Water Essence
items/ancient-water-essence.description: The ancient elves seldomly carried essences to ward off the elements. This item will occasionally grant immunity to its assigned element.

items/ankh.name: Ankh
items/ankh.description: A strange, ancient staff. It seems it can cast spells and also be used as a weapon.

items/ankous-ring.name: Ankou's Ring
items/ankous-ring.description: A ring crafted for certain slender fingers. It grants protection from the darkness; one cannot fall asleep or become cursed while wearing it.

items/annwn-rapier.name: Annwn Rapier
items/annwn-rapier.description: Sparring sword of Gwyn, the former King of Annwn. This weapon can temporarily weaken opponents with ease.

items/annwn-shotel.name: Annwn Shotel
items/annwn-shotel.description: A unique curved blade, specifically designed for escaping an opponent's defenses.

items/antidote-pendant.name: Antidote Pendant
items/antidote-pendant.description: A pendant utilized by hunters. It protects its wearer from poison.

items/antlers.name: Antlers
items/antlers.description: This unique headwear does not offer much protection, but is well suited for adornment.

items/apprentice-hood.name: Apprentice Hood
items/apprentice-hood.description: Hood worn by a talented student of magic.

items/apprentice-robe.name: Apprentice Robe
items/apprentice-robe.description: Robe worn by a talented student of magic.

items/apprentice-shoes.name: Apprentice Shoes
items/apprentice-shoes.description: Shoes worn by a talented student of magic.

items/arc.name: Arc
items/arc.description: A Greatbow of Annwn, capable of loosing arcane arrows. It can cause a variety of status effects.

items/arcane-arrows.name: Arcane Arrows
items/arcane-arrows.description: Deals damage thrice, grants 2 turns of Ward, and may temporarily increase dexterity.

items/arcane-boots.name: Arcane Boots
items/arcane-boots.description: The boots of one who practices rare magic. Slightly raises total mana.

items/arcane-hat.name: Arcane Hat
items/arcane-hat.description: The hat of one who practices rare magic. Slightly raises total mana.

items/arcane-robe.name: Arcane Robe
items/arcane-robe.description: The robe of one who practices rare magic. Slightly raises total mana.

items/arcane-wand.name: Arcane Wand
items/arcane-wand.description: Arcane wand of Annwn court wizards. Arcane magic was found to be particularly effective against the forces of Balor.

items/arch-blessed-rune-armor.name: Arch-Blessed Rune Armor
items/arch-blessed-rune-armor.description: Mystical armor that boasts higher magic defense.

items/arch-blessed-rune-helmet.name: Arch-Blessed Rune Helmet
items/arch-blessed-rune-helmet.description: Mystical armor that boasts higher magic defense.

items/arch-blessed-rune-leggings.name: Arch-Blessed Rune Leggings
items/arch-blessed-rune-leggings.description: Mystical armor that boasts higher magic defense.

items/arch-gadget.name: Arch-Gadget
items/arch-gadget.description: One of the concoctions of Cade, the great inventor. This gadget prevents one from having their physical or magical defense lowered.

items/arch-gizmo.name: Arch-Gizmo
items/arch-gizmo.description: One of the concoctions of Cade, the great inventor. This gizmo prevents one from having their dexterity, physical or magical prowess lowered.

items/arch-rune-armor.name: Arch-Rune Armor
items/arch-rune-armor.description: Mystical armor that boasts higher magic defense.

items/arch-rune-helmet.name: Arch-Rune Helmet
items/arch-rune-helmet.description: Mystical armor that boasts higher magic defense.

items/arch-rune-leggings.name: Arch-Rune Leggings
items/arch-rune-leggings.description: Mystical armor that boasts higher magic defense.

items/arch-rune-shield.name: Arch-Rune Shield
items/arch-rune-shield.description: Mystical shield that boasts extra magic defense.

items/arena-token.name: Arena Token
items/arena-token.description: A token permitting access to battle in the Arena.

items/argent-armor.name: Argent Armor
items/argent-armor.description: Mystical armor that boasts higher magic defense.

items/argent-helmet.name: Argent Helmet
items/argent-helmet.description: Mystical armor that boasts higher magic defense.

items/argent-leggings.name: Argent Leggings
items/argent-leggings.description: Mystical armor that boasts higher magic defense.

items/argent-shield.name: Argent Shield
items/argent-shield.description: Mystical shield that boasts extra magic defense.

items/arisen-ankh.name: Arisen Ankh
items/arisen-ankh.description: A strange, ancient staff. It seems it can cast spells and also be used as a weapon.

items/arisen-arch-gadget.name: Arisen Arch-Gadget
items/arisen-arch-gadget.description: One of the concoctions of Cade, the great inventor. This gadget prevents one from having their physical or magical defense lowered.

items/arisen-arch-gizmo.name: Arisen Arch-Gizmo
items/arisen-arch-gizmo.description: One of the concoctions of Cade, the great inventor. This gizmo prevents one from having their dexterity, physical or magical prowess lowered.

items/arisen-armor.name: Arisen Armor
items/arisen-armor.description: Heavy armor worn by knights of Mammon, the demon of hubris.

items/arisen-askr-armor.name: Arisen Askr Armor
items/arisen-askr-armor.description: Heavy armor of Yggdrasil, the fallen symbol of life. Wearing it may occasionally greatly increase one's power.

items/arisen-askr-boots.name: Arisen Askr Boots
items/arisen-askr-boots.description: Boots of Yggdrasil, the fallen symbol of life. Wearing them will keep one from becoming stunned.

items/arisen-askr-cowl.name: Arisen Askr Cowl
items/arisen-askr-cowl.description: Cowl of Yggdrasil, the fallen symbol of life. Wearing it may decrease the damage you may inflict upon yourself.

items/arisen-askr-garb.name: Arisen Askr Garb
items/arisen-askr-garb.description: Garb of Yggdrasil, the fallen symbol of life. Wearing it may occasionally greatly increase one's power.

items/arisen-askr-helmet.name: Arisen Askr Helmet
items/arisen-askr-helmet.description: Helmet of Yggdrasil, the fallen symbol of life. Wearing it may decrease the damage you may inflict upon yourself.

items/arisen-askr-leggings.name: Arisen Askr Leggings
items/arisen-askr-leggings.description: Heavy leggings of Yggdrasil, the fallen symbol of life. Wearing them will keep one from becoming stunned.

items/arisen-avalon-armor.name: Arisen Avalon Armor
items/arisen-avalon-armor.description: Heavy armor of prestigious Avalon knights.

items/arisen-avalon-helmet.name: Arisen Avalon Helmet
items/arisen-avalon-helmet.description: Heavy armor of prestigious Avalon knights.

items/arisen-avalon-leggings.name: Arisen Avalon Leggings
items/arisen-avalon-leggings.description: Heavy armor of prestigious Avalon knights.

items/arisen-axe-of-tiamat.name: Arisen Axe of Tiamat
items/arisen-axe-of-tiamat.description: A powerful axe forged of the remains of Tiamat, the great ancient dragon.

items/arisen-axe-of-typhon.name: Arisen Axe of Typhon
items/arisen-axe-of-typhon.description: A powerful axe forged of the remains of Typhon, the great ancient dragon.

items/arisen-badb-catha.name: Arisen Badb Catha
items/arisen-badb-catha.description: Cursed greatbow of Badb, sister to Morrigan. It can grant one additional dexterity while having the adverse effect on an opponent.

items/arisen-balor-crown.name: Arisen Balor Crown
items/arisen-balor-crown.description: The fabled crown of King Balor.

items/arisen-balor-dagger.name: Arisen Balor Dagger
items/arisen-balor-dagger.description: Dagger often carried as a sidearm by demon soldiers. Has the chance of both burning and causing an opponent to bleed.

items/arisen-banshee-boots.name: Arisen Banshee Boots
items/arisen-banshee-boots.description: Cursed legwear of a follower of Morrigan, the great witch.

items/arisen-banshee-robe.name: Arisen Banshee Robe
items/arisen-banshee-robe.description: Cursed robe of a follower of Morrigan, the great witch.

items/arisen-banshee-veil.name: Arisen Banshee Veil
items/arisen-banshee-veil.description: Cursed headwear of a follower of Morrigan, the great witch.

items/arisen-batwing-bow.name: Arisen Batwing Bow
items/arisen-batwing-bow.description: Bow forged of a great bat's remains. It may break an opponent's defenses.

items/arisen-bone-shield.name: Arisen Bone Shield
items/arisen-bone-shield.description: Grants temporary defenses and grants Ward for 4 turns.

items/arisen-bonecrusher.name: Arisen Bonecrusher
items/arisen-bonecrusher.description: A terribly frightening axe, seemingly forged with the hardened bones of an undead. It has a great chance of stunning an opponent.

items/arisen-boots.name: Arisen Boots
items/arisen-boots.description: Boots worn by rogues of Mammon, the demon of hubris.

items/arisen-bow-of-scales.name: Arisen Bow of Scales
items/arisen-bow-of-scales.description: Although the Lizarr seemed untrained in advanced weaponry, these fine bows have been found within their settlements. This bow is enchanted with the power of ice and water.

items/arisen-bow-of-tiamat.name: Arisen Bow of Tiamat
items/arisen-bow-of-tiamat.description: A superb bow forged of the remains of Tiamat, the great ancient dragon.

items/arisen-bow-of-typhon.name: Arisen Bow of Typhon
items/arisen-bow-of-typhon.description: A superb bow forged of the remains of Typhon, the great ancient dragon.

items/arisen-candy-cane.name: Arisen Candy Cane
items/arisen-candy-cane.description: A vibrant cane carried by followers of Scruug. Some say it is even pleasing to the taste. Carrying it will allow you to recover missing HP per turn.

items/arisen-caroling-lute.name: Arisen Caroling Lute
items/arisen-caroling-lute.description: A song is best sung with cheer.

items/arisen-charons-staff.name: Arisen Charon's Staff
items/arisen-charons-staff.description: Staff of Charon, the Grand Summoner. It will boost the power of your summoned allies.

items/arisen-clurichaun-blade.name: Arisen Clurichaun Blade
items/arisen-clurichaun-blade.description: Fabled ceremonial blade of a forgotten clurichaun. It has a good chance of poisoning an opponent.

items/arisen-colada.name: Arisen Colada
items/arisen-colada.description: A greatsword often used in offensive swordplay by the almighty knight, Balin. Strikes of the sword have the ability to lower an opponent's physical or magical prowess.

items/arisen-contraption.name: Arisen Contraption
items/arisen-contraption.description: A small, strange thing made by Cade, the great inventor. It can provide all sorts of benefits to a piece of armor when adorned upon it.

items/arisen-cowl.name: Arisen Cowl
items/arisen-cowl.description: Cowl worn by rogues of Mammon, the demon of hubris.

items/arisen-crowsong.name: Arisen Crowsong
items/arisen-crowsong.description: Cursed lute played by the sisters of Morrigan. It can grant one additional defenses while having the adverse effect on an opponent.

items/arisen-cursed-aengus-ogs-lute.name: Arisen Cursed Aengus Og's Lute
items/arisen-cursed-aengus-ogs-lute.description: Second lute of Aengus Og, famous Bard of the Fomorian house of Nocturna. Aengus Og sang tales of Fomoria's conquests, but was quick to flee the lands when the great curse took haste. Does he still sing of conquest, we wonder? While wearing this item, you will tame your opponent's followers and summons, causing them to deal less damage to you.

items/arisen-cursed-artios-hide.name: Arisen Cursed Artio's Hide
items/arisen-cursed-artios-hide.description: Bear hide armor of Artio, bear Goddess of the Fomorian house of Nocturna. Artio, of three siblings, spent her days taming wild bears. While wearing this item, you will tame your opponent's followers and summons, causing them to deal less damage to you.

items/arisen-cursed-atepomarus-mail.name: Arisen Cursed Atepomarus Mail
items/arisen-cursed-atepomarus-mail.description: Heavy armor of Atepomarus, horse God and leader of the Fomorian house of Nocturna. Atepomarus, father to the three siblings, was set to ride three horses at once into battle. While wearing this item, you will tame your opponent's followers and summons, causing them to deal less damage to you.

items/arisen-cursed-autumna-crested-shie.name: Arisen Cursed Autumna Crested Shield
items/arisen-cursed-autumna-crested-shie.description: Shield of Fomor, Cursed King of Fomoria. This item grants a number of passive abilities known to be utilized by the Fomorian houses.

items/arisen-cursed-belenuss-boots.name: Arisen Cursed Belenus's Boots
items/arisen-cursed-belenuss-boots.description: Boots worn by Belenus, healing God of the Fomorian house of Nocturna. Belenus, of three siblings, spent his days attending the sick animals of Fomoria's fields. While wearing this item, you will tame your opponent's followers and summons, causing them to deal less damage to you.

items/arisen-cursed-bormanas-mantle.name: Arisen Cursed Bormana's Mantle
items/arisen-cursed-bormanas-mantle.description: Light armor of Bormana, warrior water Goddess of the Fomorian house of Sumner. Bormana tended the Sumner crops with castle-sized barrels of water, a true testiment to her strength. While wearing this item, skills that target multiple opponents will deal additional damage. Additionally, skills will seldomly hit more than one opponent.

items/arisen-cursed-caticatona-cuirass.name: Arisen Cursed Caticatona Cuirass
items/arisen-cursed-caticatona-cuirass.description: Large heavy armor of Caticatona, leader of the Fomorian house of Sumner. Caticatona, the armored Water Goddess, stood tall against Morrigan's acolytes, but ultimately fell by their staff and sword. While wearing this item, skills that target multiple opponents will deal additional damage. Additionally, skills will seldomly hit more than one opponent.

items/arisen-cursed-caturixs-robe.name: Arisen Cursed Caturix's Robe
items/arisen-cursed-caturixs-robe.description: Heavy, armored, robe of Caturix, war God and leader of the Fomorian house of Wintara. Caturix fought Morrigan to the bitter end, ultimately succumbing to the curse in battle. While wearing this item, buffs cast by its wearer may transfer to a party mate. Additionally, positive status effects will last longer.

items/arisen-cursed-clotas-garb.name: Arisen Cursed Clota's Garb
items/arisen-cursed-clotas-garb.description: Light garb of Clota, river Goddess of the Fomorian house of Autumna. Clota and her sisters traversed the riverways, tunnels, and creeks to get the edge in battle, but Morrigan's forces were far too plentiful. While wearing this item, debuffs will be easier to cast on your opponent. Additionally, it increases the maximum damage of status effects on your opponent.

items/arisen-cursed-damonas-shield.name: Arisen Cursed Damona's Shield
items/arisen-cursed-damonas-shield.description: Wet shield of Damona, river Goddess of the Fomorian house of Autumna. Damona was the youngest but bravest of her sisters. While wearing this item, debuffs will be easier to cast on your opponent. Additionally, it increases the maximum damage of status effects on your opponent.

items/arisen-cursed-eostres-circlet.name: Arisen Cursed Eostre's Circlet
items/arisen-cursed-eostres-circlet.description: Circlet of Eostre, warrior Goddess of the Fomorian house of Sumner. Eostre protected the fields and crops of Fomoria; crops that would ultimately grow the vessels of Fomoria's curse. While wearing this item, skills that target multiple opponents will deal additional damage. Additionally, skills will seldomly hit more than one opponent.

items/arisen-cursed-esuss-pillar.name: Arisen Cursed Esus's Pillar

items/arisen-cursed-fomors-crown.description: Crown of Fomor, Cursed King of Fomoria. This item grants a number of passive abilities known to be utilized by the Fomorian houses.

items/arisen-cursed-gobannos-heavy-boots.name: Arisen Cursed Gobannos' Heavy Boots
items/arisen-cursed-gobannos-heavy-boots.description: Large boots of Gobannos, smith God of the Fomorian house of Sumner. Gobannos constructed the crops' heavy gates and fences, ultimately containing Fomoria's curse within. While wearing this item, skills that target multiple opponents will deal additional damage. Additionally, skills will seldomly hit more than one opponent.

items/arisen-cursed-goibhniu-armguard.name: Arisen Cursed Goibhniu Armguard
items/arisen-cursed-goibhniu-armguard.description: Armguard of Goibhniu, warrior smith God of the Fomorian house of Sumner. Goibhniu crafted the house's mighty swords, hammers, and axes. While wearing this item, skills that target multiple opponents will deal additional damage. Additionally, skills will seldomly hit more than one opponent.

items/arisen-cursed-imonas-slippers.name: Arisen Cursed Imona's Slippers
items/arisen-cursed-imonas-slippers.description: Soft slippers of Imona, waking Goddess of the Fomorian house of Wintara. Imona was blessed with the fortune of a life of unneeded sleep. While wearing this item, buffs cast by its wearer may transfer to a party mate. Additionally, positive status effects will last longer.

items/arisen-cursed-leros-hood.name: Arisen Cursed Lero's Hood
items/arisen-cursed-leros-hood.description: Hood of Lero, apprentice God of the Fomorian house of Wintara. Lero, untrained, youthful, and rather brash, was quick to fall during Morrigan's invasion. While wearing this item, buffs cast by its wearer may transfer to a party mate. Additionally, positive status effects will last longer.

items/arisen-cursed-mullos-blinders.name: Arisen Cursed Mullo's Blinders
items/arisen-cursed-mullos-blinders.description: Blinders often used by Mullo, horse God of the Fomorian house of Nocturna. Mullo, of three siblings, spent his days taming wild horses. While wearing this item, you will tame your opponent's followers and summons, causing them to deal less damage to you.

items/arisen-cursed-niskus-boots.name: Arisen Cursed Niskus' Boots
items/arisen-cursed-niskus-boots.description: Boots of Niskus, river God of the Fomorian house of Autumna. Niskus was untrusted to the bitter end, ultimately being the traitor to poison Fomoria's crops, spreading curse from within. While wearing this item, debuffs will be easier to cast on your opponent. Additionally, it increases the maximum damage of status effects on your opponent.

items/arisen-cursed-nocturna-crested-shi.name: Arisen Cursed Nocturna Crested Shield
items/arisen-cursed-nocturna-crested-shi.description: Shield of Fomor, Cursed King of Fomoria. This item grants a number of passive abilities known to be utilized by the Fomorian houses.

items/arisen-cursed-ogmios-satin-robe.name: Arisen Cursed Ogmios' Satin Robe
items/arisen-cursed-ogmios-satin-robe.description: Soft robe of Ogmios, eloquence God of the Fomorian house of Wintara. Ogmios, mentor to Lero, wasn't much for a fight and quickly vanished during Morrigan's invasion. While wearing this item, buffs cast by its wearer may transfer to a party mate. Additionally, positive status effects will last longer.

items/arisen-cursed-sabrinas-cowl.name: Arisen Cursed Sabrina's Cowl
items/arisen-cursed-sabrinas-cowl.description: Headwear of Sabrina, river Goddess of the Fomorian house of Autumna. Sabrina and her sisters traversed the riverways, tunnels, and creeks to get the edge in battle, but Morrigan's forces were far too plentiful. While wearing this item, debuffs will be easier to cast on your opponent. Additionally, it increases the maximum damage of status effects on your opponent.

items/arisen-cursed-sequanas-chestpiece.name: Arisen Cursed Sequana's Chestpiece
items/arisen-cursed-sequanas-chestpiece.description: Masterly smithed chest armor of Sequana, river Goddess and leader of the Fomorian house of Autumna. The oldest of her sisters, Sequana was a deity of grace and fortune. While wearing this item, debuffs will be easier to cast on your opponent. Additionally, it increases the maximum damage of status effects on your opponent.

items/arisen-cursed-sumner-crested-shiel.name: Arisen Cursed Sumner Crested Shield
items/arisen-cursed-sumner-crested-shiel.description: Shield of Fomor, Cursed King of Fomoria. This item grants a number of passive abilities known to be utilized by the Fomorian houses.

items/arisen-cursed-wintara-crested-shie.description: Shield of Fomor, Cursed King of Fomoria. This item grants a number of passive abilities known to be utilized by the Fomorian houses.

items/arisen-dagda-armor.description: Armor forged of the remains of Dagda, a Balor demon. With Dagda's self healing power, healing items will restore additional HP and mana.

items/arisen-dagda-boots.description: Armor forged of the remains of Dagda, a Balor demon. With Dagda's self healing power, healing items will restore additional HP and mana.

items/arisen-demeters-halberd.description: The contorted pole-arm of Demeter. Demeter created the Earthen Legion to restore and maintain balance to this world after the falling. Unfortunately, their fate came long before any notion of normality.

items/arisen-demeters-staff.description: The contorted staff of Demeter. Demeter created the Earthen Legion to restore and maintain balance to this world after the falling. Unfortunately, their fate came long before any notion of normality.

items/arisen-embla-shoes.description: Shoes of Yggdrasil, the fallen symbol of life. Wearing them will keep one from becoming stunned.

items/arisen-fairys-ring.description: An arcane ring often worn by a clurichaun. It increases both mana potential and dexterity.

items/arisen-greaves.description: Leggings worn by knights of Mammon, the demon of hubris.

items/arisen-hels-boots.description: Footwear of Hel, the shadowed rogue. They grant their wearer additional dexterity and are well suited for adornment.

items/arisen-hels-garb.description: Light armor of Hel, the shadowed rogue. It grants its wearer additional dexterity and status immunities. Additionally, it is well suited for adornment.

items/arisen-hels-veil.name: Arisen Hel's Veil
items/arisen-hels-veil.description: Headwear of Hel, the shadowed rogue. Wearing it may increase one's chance of landing a critical attack.

items/arisen-hood.description: Hood worn by acolytes of Mammon, the demon of hubris.

items/arisen-horror.name: Arisen Horror
items/arisen-horror.description: An incredibly dreadful staff forged of the remains of sunken travelers. It may cause fallen beasts to drop more items.

items/arisen-hydra-staff.name: Arisen Hydra Staff

items/arisen-ithras-blade.name: Arisen Ithra's Blade
items/arisen-ithras-blade.description: Thin, cold blade of Ithra, the White Knight. Ithra established the Frozenguard to combat the Draconian invasion.

items/arisen-ithras-staff.name: Arisen Ithra's Staff
items/arisen-ithras-staff.description: Thin, cold staff of Ithra, the White Knight. Ithra established the Frozenguard to combat the Draconian invasion.

items/arisen-jolly-stockings.name: Arisen Jolly Stockings
items/arisen-jolly-stockings.description: Socks of a generous and plump man.

items/arisen-kaladanda.name: Arisen Kaladanda
items/arisen-kaladanda.description: Staff of Mammon, the demon of hubris.

items/arisen-kerberos-claws.name: Arisen Kerberos Claws
items/arisen-kerberos-claws.description: Sharp, jagged blades forged of the mighty claws of Kerberos. They can cause an opponent to bleed or become frozen.

items/arisen-kerberos-hood.name: Arisen Kerberos Hood
items/arisen-kerberos-hood.description: A durable hood forged of the remains of the relentless Kerberos. It protects its wearer from becoming frozen.

items/arisen-kerberos-staff.name: Arisen Kerberos Staff
items/arisen-kerberos-staff.description: Mighty staff, representative of the relentless Kerberos.

items/arisen-kerberos-sword.name: Arisen Kerberos Sword
items/arisen-kerberos-sword.description: Mighty sword, representative of the relentless Kerberos.

items/arisen-kings-crown.name: Arisen King's Crown
items/arisen-kings-crown.description: The broken crown of forgotten King Meliodas. Meliodas claimed rule after Gradlon had fallen, but many outright deny his kingship. Its dents and cracks make it well suited for adornment.

items/arisen-kings-sceptre.name: Arisen King's Sceptre
items/arisen-kings-sceptre.description: The old staff of forgotten King Meliodas. Meliodas claimed rule after Gradlon had fallen, but many outright deny his kingship.

items/arisen-macha-pillar.name: Arisen Macha Pillar

items/arisen-minotaur-axe.name: Arisen Minotaur Axe
items/arisen-minotaur-axe.description: A large, crushing axe used by a minotaur

items/arisen-nagamaki.name: Arisen Nagamaki

items/arisen-ophion-banner.description: Take the stance of Ophion, potentially dispersing any status effect received to your summoned minions.

items/arisen-oxen-axe.name: Arisen Oxen Axe

items/arisen-plagued-greaves.description: Cursed legwear of a follower of Morrigan, the great witch.

items/arisen-raven-veil.description: Cursed headwear of a follower of Morrigan, the great witch.
