items/arisen-reinbow.description: A great hunting bow carried by followers of Scruug. Arrows loosed from this bow will miss less often.

items/arisen-rhada-greatshield.name: Arisen Rhada Greatshield
items/arisen-rhada-greatshield.description: Recovers Ward. Requires 2 turns in battle.

items/arisen-rhada-greatsword.name: Arisen Rhada Greatsword
items/arisen-rhada-greatsword.description: Stomp one foot down, taking a defensive position and reducing damage for 1 turn. On the next turn, deliver a powerful strike.

items/arisen-rift-summoner-boots.name: Arisen Rift Summoner Boots
items/arisen-rift-summoner-boots.description: A piece of Judge's attire worn by Charon. When standing strong with these boots, your summons will be slightly stronger.

items/arisen-rift-summoner-helmet.name: Arisen Rift Summoner Helmet
items/arisen-rift-summoner-helmet.description: A piece of Judge's attire worn by Charon. When wearing this helmet, using pacts with your summons will be more effective.

items/arisen-rift-summoner-plate.name: Arisen Rift Summoner Plate
items/arisen-rift-summoner-plate.description: A piece of Judge's attire worn by Charon. When wearing this armor, your summons will be more likely to protect you.

items/arisen-riftguard-armor.name: Arisen Riftguard Armor
items/arisen-riftguard-armor.description: A piece of Judge's attire worn by Rhada. When taking Ward damage while wearing this armor, one will take reduced self damage from status effects.

items/arisen-riftguard-helmet.name: Arisen Riftguard Helmet
items/arisen-riftguard-helmet.description: A piece of Judge's attire worn by Rhada. When taking Ward damage while wearing this armor, HP and Mana will be recovered by a percentage of the Ward damage taken.

items/arisen-riftguard-leggings.name: Arisen Riftguard Leggings
items/arisen-riftguard-leggings.description: A piece of Judge's attire worn by Rhada. When taking Ward damage while wearing this armor, HP and Mana will be recovered by a percentage of the Ward damage taken.

items/arisen-riftrogue-boots.name: Arisen Riftrogue Boots
items/arisen-riftrogue-boots.description: A piece of Judge's attire worn by Achlys. One may move with extra grace when wearing this armor, decreasing your chance to miss your mark.

items/arisen-riftrogue-chestplate.name: Arisen Riftrogue Chestplate
items/arisen-riftrogue-chestplate.description: A piece of Judge's attire worn by Achlys. One may move with extra grace when wearing this armor, decreasing your chance to miss your mark.

items/arisen-riftrogue-helmet.name: Arisen Riftrogue Helmet
items/arisen-riftrogue-helmet.description: A piece of Judge's attire worn by Achlys. One may move with extra grace when wearing this armor, decreasing your chance to miss your mark.

items/arisen-ring.name: Arisen Ring
items/arisen-ring.description: A ring of the arisen cursed Fafnir. Increases your attack and magic power at the expense of your longevity.

items/arisen-robe.name: Arisen Robe
items/arisen-robe.description: Robe worn by acolytes of Mammon, the demon of hubris.

items/arisen-sea-axe.name: Arisen Sea Axe
items/arisen-sea-axe.description: An axe enchanted with the power of the raging sea.

items/arisen-shadeblades.name: Arisen Shadeblades
items/arisen-shadeblades.description: Swiftly attack twice, dealing up to double damage.

items/arisen-shield.name: Arisen Shield
items/arisen-shield.description: Grants temporary defenses and grants Ward for 5 turns.

items/arisen-shoes.name: Arisen Shoes
items/arisen-shoes.description: Shoes worn by acolytes of Mammon, the demon of hubris.

items/arisen-silk-crossbow.name: Arisen Silk Crossbow
items/arisen-silk-crossbow.description: A sturdy crossbow fastened with a thread of strong silk.

items/arisen-sleighblade.name: Arisen Sleighblade
items/arisen-sleighblade.description: A glistening sword carried by followers of Scruug. It is quite chilling to the touch. When using this weapon, you will start battle with Ward automatically activated.

items/arisen-staff-of-tiamat.name: Arisen Staff of Tiamat
items/arisen-staff-of-tiamat.description: A superb staff forged of the remains of Tiamat, the great ancient dragon.

items/arisen-staff-of-typhon.name: Arisen Staff of Typhon
items/arisen-staff-of-typhon.description: A superb staff forged of the remains of Typhon, the great ancient dragon.

items/arisen-staff-of-wolves.name: Arisen Staff of Wolves
items/arisen-staff-of-wolves.description: Staff of a wolfman mage. Imbued with earthen powers.

items/arisen-stone-dagger.name: Arisen Stone Dagger
items/arisen-stone-dagger.description: A dagger, once a fixture upon a noble statue. It has a small chance of petrifying an opponent.

items/arisen-surtrs-boots.name: Arisen Surtr's Boots
items/arisen-surtrs-boots.description: Footwear of Surtr, the wanderer. They grant their wearer additional dexterity and are well suited for adornment.

items/arisen-surtrs-cuirass.name: Arisen Surtr's Cuirass
items/arisen-surtrs-cuirass.description: Light armor of Surtr, the wanderer. It grants its wearer additional Ward and is well suited for adornment.

items/arisen-surtrs-helmet.name: Arisen Surtr's Helmet
items/arisen-surtrs-helmet.description: Helmet of Surtr, the wanderer. It grants its wearer additional HP and is well suited for adornment.

items/arisen-surtrs-shield.name: Arisen Surtr's Shield
items/arisen-surtrs-shield.description: Grants temporary defenses and grants Ward for 5 turns.

items/arisen-surtrs-sword.name: Arisen Surtr's Sword
items/arisen-surtrs-sword.description: The extremely bright, decorative sword of Surtr. It can easily blind an opponent and will draw more monsters towards you with its bright, everlasting light.

items/arisen-teardrop.name: Arisen Teardrop
items/arisen-teardrop.description: A relic of Mammon capable of granting a piece of equipment additional power while occasionally lowering an opponent's attack or magical power.

items/arisen-terror.name: Arisen Terror
items/arisen-terror.description: An incredibly dreadful staff forged of the remains of sunken travelers. It may cause fallen beasts to drop more gold and orns.

items/arisen-thors-arc.name: Arisen Thor's Arc
items/arisen-thors-arc.description: A masterfully crafted magical bow of Thor. Thor founded the Stormforce shortly before succumbing to the power of the falling. His bow can easily paralyze an opponent.

items/arisen-thors-hammer.name: Arisen Thor's Hammer
items/arisen-thors-hammer.description: Small, yet immensely heavy hammer of Thor. Thor founded the Stormforce shortly before succumbing to the power of the falling. His hammer can easily paralyze an opponent.

items/arisen-tizona.name: Arisen Tizona
items/arisen-tizona.description: Wait one turn, then return an opponent's attack back at them.

items/arisen-top-hat.name: Arisen Top Hat
items/arisen-top-hat.description: Boy, it is dapper! When wearing this hat, you can wield two-handed weapons more effectively.

items/arisen-treecutter.name: Arisen Treecutter
items/arisen-treecutter.description: Take the stance of Gymir, increasing your attack power, but taking damage every turn.

items/arisen-trevelyans-archistaff.name: Arisen Trevelyan's Archistaff
items/arisen-trevelyans-archistaff.description: Unstable elementless magic that can blind an opponent while dealing damage thrice.

items/arisen-trevelyans-charm.name: Arisen Trevelyan's Charm
items/arisen-trevelyans-charm.description: Amulet carried by Trevelyan, the storied Lyonesse Warlock. Wearing it will increase your offensive power when carrying a weapon with both hands.

items/arisen-trevelyans-hood.name: Arisen Trevelyan's Hood
items/arisen-trevelyans-hood.description: Hood of Trevelyan, the storied Lyonesse Warlock. Wearing it will slightly decrease the mana required for spells while protecting one from the arcane arts.

items/arisen-trevelyans-robe.name: Arisen Trevelyan's Robe
items/arisen-trevelyans-robe.description: Robe of Trevelyan, the storied Lyonesse Warlock. Wearing it will slightly decrease the mana required for spells while protecting one from the arcane arts.

items/arisen-trevelyans-shoes.name: Arisen Trevelyan's Shoes
items/arisen-trevelyans-shoes.description: Shoes of Trevelyan, the storied Lyonesse Warlock. Wearing them will slightly decrease the mana required for spells while protecting one from the arcane arts.

items/arisen-vandals-veil.name: Arisen Vandal's Veil
items/arisen-vandals-veil.description: A thick piece of fabric, often used to protect one's lungs. Wearing it makes one less likely to be afflicted with status effects.

items/arisen-vulcans-archistaff.name: Arisen Vulcan's Archistaff
items/arisen-vulcans-archistaff.description: An embered Archistaff seldom wielded by Vulcan, the Red Knight. Vulcan formed the Knights of Inferno to fight alongside the forces of Annwn. His staff can easily burn an opponent.

items/arisen-vulcans-longsword.name: Arisen Vulcan's Longsword
items/arisen-vulcans-longsword.description: A seemingly flawless blade wielded by Vulcan, the Red Knight. Vulcan formed the Knights of Inferno to fight alongside the forces of Annwn. His blade can easily burn an opponent.

items/arisen-willow-branch.name: Arisen Willow Branch
items/arisen-willow-branch.description: Take the stance of Eistla, greatly increasing hybrid offensive ability at the expense of your follower or summons' prowess.

items/arisen-witchs-hat.name: Arisen Witch's Hat
items/arisen-witchs-hat.description: The symbolic headwear of Carman, the banished witch.

items/arisen-witchs-staff.name: Arisen Witch's Staff
items/arisen-witchs-staff.description: Old, decrepit, dark staff of a powerful witch. Slightly boosts experience earned.

items/arisen-wolfbane.name: Arisen Wolfbane
items/arisen-wolfbane.description: A magical blade representing the unrelenting force of Fenrir the wolf. It can temporarily decrease your opponent's defense upon use.

items/arisen-wolven-tower-shield.name: Arisen Wolven Tower Shield
items/arisen-wolven-tower-shield.description: Grants temporary defenses and grants Ward for 5 turns.

items/arms-of-eos.name: Arms of Eos
items/arms-of-eos.description: A piece of a Titan themself. These pieces can be used to augment celestial weapons at a Titan Workshop. This piece will make pacts with your summons more effective.

items/arms-of-oceanus.name: Arms of Oceanus
items/arms-of-oceanus.description: A piece of a Titan themself. These pieces can be used to augment celestial weapons at a Titan Workshop.

items/arms-of-prometheus.name: Arms of Prometheus
items/arms-of-prometheus.description: A piece of a Titan themself. These pieces can be used to augment celestial weapons at a Titan Workshop.

items/arms-of-selene.name: Arms of Selene
items/arms-of-selene.description: A piece of a Titan themself. These pieces can be used to augment celestial weapons at a Titan Workshop. This piece will make hybrid spells and skills more effective.

items/arms-of-themis.name: Arms of Themis
items/arms-of-themis.description: A piece of a Titan themself. These pieces can be used to augment celestial weapons at a Titan Workshop.

items/artifice-gada.name: Artifice Gada
items/artifice-gada.description: The crippling weapon of Knight Artifice, the dragonslayer of Avalon. It can lower an opponent's magical potential.

items/artios-hide.name: Artio's Hide
items/artios-hide.description: Bear hide armor of Artio, bear Goddess of the Fomorian house of Nocturna. Artio, of three siblings, spent her days taming wild bears. While wearing this item, you will tame your opponent's followers and summons, causing them to deal less damage to you.

items/ascalon.name: Ascalon
items/ascalon.description: An adorned sword forged of the most blessed of materials. It's great light can illuminate your path while blinding your opponents.

items/asgard-shield.name: Asgard Shield
items/asgard-shield.description: Shield carried by valkyries of the Northern lands. It protects one from the cold.

items/asgards-summit.name: Asgard's Summit
items/asgards-summit.description: A rare blade carried by the most gifted of Nothren valkyries. It may grant one the stance of Gunnr, raising attack power but lowering defenses.

items/ash-plumed-boots.name: Ash-Plumed Boots
items/ash-plumed-boots.description: Footwear of a worshipper of the mighty Phoenix. Using this item may grant temporary improvements to your stats.

items/ash-plumed-cowl.name: Ash-Plumed Cowl
items/ash-plumed-cowl.description: Headwear of a worshipper of the mighty Phoenix. Using this item may grant temporary improvements to your stats.

items/ash-plumed-cuirass.name: Ash-Plumed Cuirass
items/ash-plumed-cuirass.description: Heavy armor of a worshipper of the mighty Phoenix. Using this item may grant temporary improvements to your stats.

items/ash-plumed-garb.name: Ash-Plumed Garb
items/ash-plumed-garb.description: Light armor of a worshipper of the mighty Phoenix. Using this item may grant temporary improvements to your stats.

items/ash-plumed-greaves.name: Ash-Plumed Greaves
items/ash-plumed-greaves.description: Heavy leg armor of a worshipper of the mighty Phoenix. Using this item may grant temporary improvements to your stats.

items/ash-plumed-helmet.name: Ash-Plumed Helmet
items/ash-plumed-helmet.description: Helmet of a worshipper of the mighty Phoenix. Using this item may grant temporary improvements to your stats.

items/ash-plumed-hood.name: Ash-Plumed Hood
items/ash-plumed-hood.description: Hood of a worshipper of the mighty Phoenix. Using this item may grant temporary improvements to your stats.

items/ash-plumed-robe.name: Ash-Plumed Robe
items/ash-plumed-robe.description: Robe of a worshipper of the mighty Phoenix. Using this item may grant temporary improvements to your stats.

items/ash-plumed-shoes.name: Ash-Plumed Shoes
items/ash-plumed-shoes.description: Footwear of a worshipper of the mighty Phoenix. Using this item may grant temporary improvements to your stats.

items/ashen-boots.name: Ashen Boots
items/ashen-boots.description: Pale attire of elite Balor mages.

items/ashen-hat.name: Ashen Hat
items/ashen-hat.description: Pale attire of elite Balor mages.

items/ashen-phoenician-boots.name: Ashen Phoenician Boots
items/ashen-phoenician-boots.description: Footwear of a worshipper of a fallen Phoenix. Wearing this item may occasionally protect you from status effects.

items/ashen-phoenician-cowl.name: Ashen Phoenician Cowl
items/ashen-phoenician-cowl.description: Headwear of a worshipper of a fallen Phoenix. Wearing this item may occasionally protect you from status effects.

items/ashen-phoenician-cuirass.name: Ashen Phoenician Cuirass
items/ashen-phoenician-cuirass.description: Heavy armor of a worshipper of a fallen Phoenix. Wearing this item may occasionally protect you from status effects.

items/ashen-phoenician-garb.name: Ashen Phoenician Garb
items/ashen-phoenician-garb.description: Light armor of a worshipper of a fallen Phoenix. Wearing this item may occasionally protect you from status effects.

items/ashen-phoenician-greaves.name: Ashen Phoenician Greaves
items/ashen-phoenician-greaves.description: Heavy leg armor of a worshipper of a fallen Phoenix. Wearing this item may occasionally protect you from status effects.

items/ashen-phoenician-helmet.name: Ashen Phoenician Helmet
items/ashen-phoenician-helmet.description: Helmet of a worshipper of a fallen Phoenix. Wearing this item may occasionally protect you from status effects.

items/ashen-phoenician-hood.name: Ashen Phoenician Hood
items/ashen-phoenician-hood.description: Hood of a worshipper of a fallen Phoenix. Wearing this item may occasionally protect you from status effects.

items/ashen-phoenician-robe.name: Ashen Phoenician Robe
items/ashen-phoenician-robe.description: Robe of a worshipper of a fallen Phoenix. Wearing this item may occasionally protect you from status effects.

items/ashen-phoenician-shield.name: Ashen Phoenician Shield
items/ashen-phoenician-shield.description: Grants temporary defenses and grants Ward for 5 turns.

items/ashen-phoenician-shoes.name: Ashen Phoenician Shoes
items/ashen-phoenician-shoes.description: Footwear of a worshipper of a fallen Phoenix. Wearing this item may occasionally protect you from status effects.

items/ashen-pinion.name: Ashen Pinion
items/ashen-pinion.description: A feather pulled from the remains of a fallen Phoenix.

items/ashen-robe.name: Ashen Robe
items/ashen-robe.description: Pale attire of elite Balor mages.

items/ashen-ruby.name: Ashen Ruby
items/ashen-ruby.description: A jewel with a crimson glow. Adorning this upon a weapon will slightly heal your wounds when damaging an opponent.

items/ashen-staff.name: Ashen Staff
items/ashen-staff.description: A pale staff granted to skilled Balor mages.

items/askr-armor.name: Askr Armor
items/askr-armor.description: Heavy armor of Yggdrasil, the fallen symbol of life. Wearing it may occasionally greatly increase one's power.

items/askr-boots.name: Askr Boots
items/askr-boots.description: Boots of Yggdrasil, the fallen symbol of life. Wearing them will keep one from becoming stunned.

items/askr-cowl.name: Askr Cowl
items/askr-cowl.description: Cowl of Yggdrasil, the fallen symbol of life. Wearing it may decrease the damage you may inflict upon yourself.

items/askr-garb.name: Askr Garb
items/askr-garb.description: Garb of Yggdrasil, the fallen symbol of life. Wearing it may occasionally greatly increase one's power.

items/askr-helmet.name: Askr Helmet
items/askr-helmet.description: Helmet of Yggdrasil, the fallen symbol of life. Wearing it may decrease the damage you may inflict upon yourself.

items/askr-leggings.name: Askr Leggings
items/askr-leggings.description: Heavy leggings of Yggdrasil, the fallen symbol of life. Wearing them will keep one from becoming stunned.

items/assassins-jewel.name: Assassin's Jewel
items/assassins-jewel.description: An adornment of assassins. When adorned upon a weapon, it grants the chance to inflict damage to an opponent's defenses.

items/atepomarus-mail.name: Atepomarus Mail
items/atepomarus-mail.description: Heavy armor of Atepomarus, horse God and leader of the Fomorian house of Nocturna. Atepomarus, father to the three siblings, was set to ride three horses at once into battle. While wearing this item, you will tame your opponent's followers and summons, causing them to deal less damage to you.

items/atgeir.name: Atgeir
items/atgeir.description: A deadly polearm carried by the fallen Heimdall, a lord of the Nothren.

items/atlas.name: Atlas
items/atlas.description: Grants temporary defenses and grants Ward for 5 turns.

items/attack-tonic.name: Attack Tonic
items/attack-tonic.description: A sour tonic that raises your attack in battle.

items/attuning-hood.name: Attuning Hood
items/attuning-hood.description: Hood worn by novice summoners. It slightly increases the power of summoned beasts.

items/attuning-robe.name: Attuning Robe
items/attuning-robe.description: Robe worn by novice summoners. It increases the chance of a summon protecting you in battle.

items/autumna-crested-shield.name: Autumna Crested Shield
items/autumna-crested-shield.description: Shield of Fomor, Cursed King of Fomoria. This item grants a number of passive abilities known to be utilized by the Fomorian houses.

items/avalon-crown.name: Avalon Crown
items/avalon-crown.description: The fabled crown of King Arthus. Although it offers little in terms of defense, it can protect its wearer from being cursed or petrified.

items/avalon-knight-armor.name: Avalon Knight Armor
items/avalon-knight-armor.description: Heavy armor of prestigious Avalon knights.

items/avalon-knight-helmet.name: Avalon Knight Helmet
items/avalon-knight-helmet.description: Heavy armor of prestigious Avalon knights.

items/avalon-knight-leggings.name: Avalon Knight Leggings
items/avalon-knight-leggings.description: Heavy armor of prestigious Avalon knights.

items/avalon-melody.name: Avalon Melody
items/avalon-melody.description: Famed golden flute of an Avalon bard. Playing its songs can temporarily raise one's magical defense.

items/avalon-ore.name: Avalon Ore
items/avalon-ore.description: A mighty alloy. It was used to craft Avalonian weapons and armor.

items/axe-of-night.name: Axe of Night
items/axe-of-night.description: An axe wielded by monsters of the night. Enhanced with dark magic.

items/axe-of-the-chimera.name: Axe of the Chimera
items/axe-of-the-chimera.description: A powerful axe forged of the remains of a Chimera. Using this weapon may cause one to fill with immense rage, inflicting the Berserk status.

items/axe-of-tiamat.name: Axe of Tiamat
items/axe-of-tiamat.description: A powerful axe forged of the remains of Tiamat, the great ancient dragon.

items/axe-of-typhon.name: Axe of Typhon
items/axe-of-typhon.description: A powerful axe forged of the remains of Typhon, the great ancient dragon.

items/axe.name: Axe
items/axe.description: A woodcutter's axe. Useful as a tool or as a weapon.

items/azure-crystal.name: Azure Crystal
items/azure-crystal.description: An azure crystal of the night. Increases magical ability at the expense of physical prowess.

items/azure-dioscuri-ring.name: Azure Dioscuri Ring
items/azure-dioscuri-ring.description: The ring of a fused Dioscuri. It grants additional offensive power to those that prefer a more hybrid approach to combat.

items/azure-pinion.name: Azure Pinion
items/azure-pinion.description: A feather pulled from the remains of a cursed Cockatrice. It grants additional magic power at the expense of magical resistance and mana.

items/azure-twinbow.name: Azure Twinbow
items/azure-twinbow.description: The Twinbow of a fused Dioscuri. It grants additional offensive power to those that prefer a more hybrid approach to combat.

items/badb-boots.name: Badb Boots
items/badb-boots.description: Cursed legwear of a follower of Badb, the great witch.

items/badb-catha.name: Badb Catha
items/badb-catha.description: Cursed greatbow of Badb, sister to Morrigan. It can grant one additional dexterity while having the adverse effect on an opponent.

items/badb-garb.name: Badb Garb
items/badb-garb.description: Cursed light armor of a follower of Badb, the great witch.

items/badb-veil.name: Badb Veil
items/badb-veil.description: Cursed headwear of a follower of Badb, the great witch.

items/badb-warbow.name: Badb Warbow
items/badb-warbow.description: Cursed greatbow of Badb, sister to Morrigan. It can grant one additional dexterity while having the adverse effect on an opponent.

items/badbs-feathers.name: Badb's Feathers
items/badbs-feathers.description: Deals damage thrice, grants 2 turns of Ward, and may temporarily increase dexterity.

items/bag-of-treats.name: Bag of Treats
items/bag-of-treats.description: A bag of treats of lore and luck. Carrying it increases gold, orns, and experience earned. You may also find more items.

items/bag-of-tricks.name: Bag of Tricks
items/bag-of-tricks.description: A bag of tricks of lore and luck. Carrying it may add the chance for many status effects to your attacks and spells.

items/balanced-epee.name: Balanced Epee
items/balanced-epee.description: The blademaster Finesse is known for carrying an inhuman amount of swords upon his back. This epee is one of them.

items/baldr-battlerobe.name: Baldr Battlerobe
items/baldr-battlerobe.description: War-mage's robe of Baldr, the undying. Wearing this item will increase HP while making one slightly more resistant to status effects.

items/baldr-boots.name: Baldr Boots
items/baldr-boots.description: War-mage's boots of Baldr, the undying. Wearing this item will increase HP while making one slightly more resistant to status effects.

items/baldr-hood.name: Baldr Hood
items/baldr-hood.description: War-mage's hood of Baldr, the undying. Wearing this item will increase HP while making one slightly more resistant to status effects.

items/baldur.name: Baldur
items/baldur.description: A chunk of Baldur, favored by the raiders of Nothren.

items/balins-left.name: Balin's Left
items/balins-left.description: A heavy great sword carried in Sir Balin's left hand. A blow from this blade can lower an opponent's magic power when attacking.

items/balins-right.name: Balin's Right
items/balins-right.description: A heavy great sword carried in Sir Balin's right hand. A blow from this blade can lower an opponent's attack power.

items/balor-archistaff.name: Balor Archistaff
items/balor-archistaff.description: Staff wielded by Balor mages. It increases mana at the expense of health.

items/balor-armor.name: Balor Armor
items/balor-armor.description: Heavy armor typically worn by Balor warriors.

items/balor-crown.name: Balor Crown
items/balor-crown.description: The fabled crown of King Balor.

items/balor-dagger.name: Balor Dagger
items/balor-dagger.description: Dagger often carried as a sidearm by demon soldiers. Has the chance of both burning and causing an opponent to bleed.

items/balor-helmet.name: Balor Helmet
items/balor-helmet.description: A heavy helmet typically worn by Balor warriors.

items/balor-katana.name: Balor Katana
items/balor-katana.description: Katana wielded by Balor rogues. It has a high chance of causing an opponent to bleed.

items/balor-leggings.name: Balor Leggings
items/balor-leggings.description: Heavy leggings typically worn by Balor warriors.

items/balor-muskellunge.name: Balor Muskellunge
items/balor-muskellunge.description: Quite a rare fish, seemingly ascended from the Underworld.

items/balor-robe.name: Balor Robe
items/balor-robe.description: A dark, dusty robe typically worn by Balor mages.

items/balor-shield.name: Balor Shield
items/balor-shield.description: A decorated shield often carried by Balor warriors.

items/balor-sword.name: Balor Sword
items/balor-sword.description: A commonly used sword of knights of Balor.

items/balorite.name: Balorite
items/balorite.description: A golden material useful in upgrading powerful equipment.

items/band-of-false-gods.name: Band of False Gods
items/band-of-false-gods.description: A ring worn by the elemental Gods of old. Increases gold, orns, and experience earned.

items/band-of-gods.name: Band of Gods
items/band-of-gods.description: A ring worn by the elemental Gods of old. Increases gold, orns, and experience earned.

items/bandits-axe.name: Bandit's Axe
items/bandits-axe.description: A large axe carried by the mightiest bandits.

items/bandits-cloak.name: Bandit's Cloak
items/bandits-cloak.description: Heavy cloak of a bandit. Offers mild defense against the elements.

items/bandits-dagger.name: Bandit's Dagger
items/bandits-dagger.description: A small blade ideal for close quartered combat. It slightly increases dexterity.

items/bandits-hood.name: Bandit's Hood
items/bandits-hood.description: Heavy hood made of strong hide. Offers mild protection against the elements.

items/baneblade.name: Baneblade
items/baneblade.description: Ceremonial blade of a long forgotten civilization. It has a small chance of cursing an opponent.

items/banshee-boots.name: Banshee Boots
items/banshee-boots.description: Cursed legwear of a follower of Morrigan, the great witch.

items/banshee-robe.name: Banshee Robe
items/banshee-robe.description: Cursed robe of a follower of Morrigan, the great witch.

items/banshee-veil.name: Banshee Veil
items/banshee-veil.description: Cursed headwear of a follower of Morrigan, the great witch.

items/basilisk-talons.name: Basilisk Talons
items/basilisk-talons.description: A pair of dark kunai, forged of a basilisk's claws.

items/basilisk-tooth.name: Basilisk Tooth
items/basilisk-tooth.description: Thin sword forged of Basilisk remains. It has a chance to cause either poison or blight.

items/battlemage-armor.name: Battlemage Armor
items/battlemage-armor.description: Some magic users are also skilled in combat. This is the armor of one.

items/battlemage-boots.name: Battlemage Boots
items/battlemage-boots.description: Some magic users are also skilled in combat. These are the boots of one.

items/battlemage-helmet.name: Battlemage Helmet
items/battlemage-helmet.description: Some magic users are also skilled in combat. This is the helmet of one.

items/batwing-bow.name: Batwing Bow
items/batwing-bow.description: Bow forged of a great bat's remains. It may break an opponent's defenses.

items/beags-lute.name: Beag's Lute
items/beags-lute.description: Potentially boost attack, magic, defenses, and resistance while potentially decreasing opponent stats.

items/bearclaw.name: Bearclaw
items/bearclaw.description: A crude blade forged of the remains of a bear.

items/bearskin.name: Bearskin
items/bearskin.description: Armor made of the hide of a bear.

items/beasts-blood.name: Beast's Blood
items/beasts-blood.description: A simple concoction. Consuming it may attract extra monsters to you.

items/beatrices-staff.name: Beatrice's Staff
items/beatrices-staff.description: The staff of the aspiring sorceress, Beatrice. It slightly boosts its wielder's mana.

items/bedsheet.name: Bedsheet
items/bedsheet.description: A simple white sheet that one could use to mock a spirit. It protects one from falling asleep in battle.

items/beguiled-armor.name: Beguiled Armor
items/beguiled-armor.description: A piece threaded of distant memories. Memories of the famed, yet feared, "Angel" of destruction. In his youth, Apollyon favored vitality and dexterity over orthodox defenses.

items/beguiled-boots.name: Beguiled Boots
items/beguiled-boots.description: A piece threaded of distant memories. Memories of the famed, yet feared, "Angel" of destruction. In his youth, Apollyon favored vitality and dexterity over orthodox defenses.

items/beguiled-cowl.name: Beguiled Cowl
items/beguiled-cowl.description: A piece threaded of distant memories. Memories of the famed, yet feared, "Angel" of destruction. In his youth, Apollyon favored vitality and dexterity over orthodox defenses.

items/beguiled-garb.name: Beguiled Garb
items/beguiled-garb.description: A piece threaded of distant memories. Memories of the famed, yet feared, "Angel" of destruction. In his youth, Apollyon favored vitality and dexterity over orthodox defenses.

items/beguiled-heavy-boots.name: Beguiled Heavy Boots
items/beguiled-heavy-boots.description: A piece threaded of distant memories. Memories of the famed, yet feared, "Angel" of destruction. In his youth, Apollyon favored vitality and dexterity over orthodox defenses.

items/beguiled-helmet.name: Beguiled Helmet
items/beguiled-helmet.description: A piece threaded of distant memories. Memories of the famed, yet feared, "Angel" of destruction. In his youth, Apollyon favored vitality and dexterity over orthodox defenses.

items/beguiled-hood.name: Beguiled Hood
items/beguiled-hood.description: A piece threaded of distant memories. Memories of the famed, yet feared, "Angel" of destruction. In his youth, Apollyon favored vitality and dexterity over orthodox defenses.

items/beguiled-mystic-katar.name: Beguiled Mystic Katar
items/beguiled-mystic-katar.description: Grants a chance to return a portion of an opponent's attack back at them. Counterattacks are favorable to win in PvP draws.

items/beguiled-robe.name: Beguiled Robe
items/beguiled-robe.description: A piece threaded of distant memories. Memories of the famed, yet feared, "Angel" of destruction. In his youth, Apollyon favored vitality and dexterity over orthodox defenses.

items/beguiled-shoes.name: Beguiled Shoes
items/beguiled-shoes.description: A piece threaded of distant memories. Memories of the famed, yet feared, "Angel" of destruction. In his youth, Apollyon favored vitality and dexterity over orthodox defenses.

items/belenuss-boots.name: Belenus's Boots
items/belenuss-boots.description: Boots worn by Belenus, healing God of the Fomorian house of Nocturna. Belenus, of three siblings, spent his days attending the sick animals of Fomoria's fields. While wearing this item, you will tame your opponent's followers and summons, causing them to deal less damage to you.

items/belt-of-cerus.name: Belt of Cerus
items/belt-of-cerus.description: Enchanted belt of Cerus, the untamed. It protects one from burning while granting additional HP.

items/belt.name: Belt
items/belt.description: A standard belt. Improves your dexterity.

items/beowulfs-charm.name: Beowulf's Charm
items/beowulfs-charm.description: Amulet often carried by the Beowulf. Wearing this item greatly increases the power of your follower,  may cause them to act less often.

items/berserk-mushroom.name: Berserk Mushroom
items/berserk-mushroom.description: A mushroom of unknown origin. Eating it will cause one to enrage.

items/bestial-eye.name: Bestial Eye
items/bestial-eye.description: Red eye of the Behemoth. Adorning it upon a weapon will increase the action rate and stats of your follower.

items/bestial-potion.name: Bestial Potion
items/bestial-potion.description: A sweet and nutritious tonic. Having your follower consume it will increase their action rate for a limited time.

items/beta-myrddin-cloak.name: Beta Myrddin Cloak
items/beta-myrddin-cloak.description: One of the notoriously recognizable robes of Merlin, the famed Avalon sorcerer. It can protect its wearer from having their resistance lowered.

items/beta-myrddin-cowl.name: Beta Myrddin Cowl
items/beta-myrddin-cowl.description: One of the notoriously recognizable hoods of Merlin, the famed Avalon sorcerer.

items/beta-myrddin-hood.name: Beta Myrddin Hood
items/beta-myrddin-hood.description: One of the notoriously recognizable hoods of Merlin, the famed Avalon sorcerer.

items/beta-myrddin-robe.name: Beta Myrddin Robe
items/beta-myrddin-robe.description: One of the notoriously recognizable robes of Merlin, the famed Avalon sorcerer. It can protect its wearer from having their resistance lowered.

items/beta-myrddin-shield.name: Beta Myrddin Shield
items/beta-myrddin-shield.description: A relic of Merlin's eccentric collection.

items/beta-myrddin.name: Beta Myrddin
items/beta-myrddin.description: One of the notoriously recognizable archistaves of Merlin, the famed Avalon sorcerer. Spells cast by this staff can occasionally lower an opponent's defenses.

items/bident.name: Bident
items/bident.description: A mighty pole-arm carried by Hades, the exiled guardian of the underworld.

items/bird-whistle.name: Bird Whistle
items/bird-whistle.description: A simple whistle useful for calling birds from trees.

items/black-dragon-armor.name: Black Dragon Armor
items/black-dragon-armor.description: Armor forged of the remains of the great dragon, Fafnir.

items/black-dragon-greaves.name: Black Dragon Greaves
items/black-dragon-greaves.description: Leg armor forged of the remains of the great dragon, Fafnir.

items/black-dragon-helmet.name: Black Dragon Helmet
items/black-dragon-helmet.description: Helmet forged of the remains of the great dragon, Fafnir.

items/black-witch-staff.name: Black Witch Staff
items/black-witch-staff.description: Old, decrepit, dark staff of a powerful witch. Slightly boosts experience earned.

items/blackened-eye-of-kerberos.name: Blackened Eye of Kerberos
items/blackened-eye-of-kerberos.description: Crystallized eye of the Kerberos. It can grant a weapon additional properties when adorned upon it.

items/blessed-rune-armor.name: Blessed Rune Armor
items/blessed-rune-armor.description: Mystical armor that boasts higher magic defense.

items/blessed-rune-helmet.name: Blessed Rune Helmet
items/blessed-rune-helmet.description: Mystical armor that boasts higher magic defense.

items/blessed-rune-leggings.name: Blessed Rune Leggings
items/blessed-rune-leggings.description: Mystical armor that boasts higher magic defense.

items/blight-arrows.name: Blight Arrows
items/blight-arrows.description: Deals damage thrice, grants 2 turns of Ward, and may temporarily increase dexterity.

items/blight-pendant.name: Blight Pendant
items/blight-pendant.description: A pendant often worn by dragoons. It protects its wearer from blight.

items/blinders.name: Blinders
items/blinders.description: Blinders often used to quell a wild horse's restlessness. They increase dexterity and critical hit rate of those granted with extra concentration.

items/blood-sword.name: Blood Sword
items/blood-sword.description: A fiery red blade used by the Fomorians.

items/blue-crystal.name: Blue Crystal
items/blue-crystal.description: An odd blue crystal. Boosts MP when equipped.

items/blue-dagger.name: Blue Dagger
items/blue-dagger.description: A small blade ideal for close quartered combat. This one in particular is imbued with ice.

items/blue-eye-of-kerberos.name: Blue Eye of Kerberos
items/blue-eye-of-kerberos.description: Crystallized eye of the Kerberos. It grants a high chance to cause an opponent to freeze.

items/blue-feather.name: Blue Feather
items/blue-feather.description: The feather of a Zu. It can grant a piece of armor additional dexterity when adorned upon it.

items/blue-gem.name: Blue Gem
items/blue-gem.description: An odd blue gem. Raises MP when equipped.

items/blue-wand.name: Blue Wand
items/blue-wand.description: A wand for casting magic. This one in particular is imbued with ice.

items/bolt.name: Bolt
items/bolt.description: A spear of a Stormforce warrior. Very few can wield this weapon without feeling a great shock.

items/bone-shield.name: Bone Shield
items/bone-shield.description: Grants temporary defenses and grants Ward for 3 turns.

items/bone.name: Bone
items/bone.description: A fragment of sturdy bone. Useful for crafting and upgrading weapons or armor.

items/bonecrusher.name: Bonecrusher
items/bonecrusher.description: A terribly frightening axe, seemingly forged with the hardened bones of an undead. It has a great chance of stunning an opponent.

items/bonesong.name: Bonesong
items/bonesong.description: An instrument of a long fallen Odok warrior. Its song has the rare chance to temporarily boost one's critical hit rate.

items/book-of-darkness.name: Book of Darkness
items/book-of-darkness.description: A book carried by a Student of Apollyon. Before being beguiled with destructive magics, Apollyon studied the elven ways of elemental balance. These books contain great elemental affinity.

items/book-of-earth.name: Book of Earth
items/book-of-earth.description: A book carried by a Student of Apollyon. Before being beguiled with destructive magics, Apollyon studied the elven ways of elemental balance. These books contain great elemental affinity.

items/book-of-fire.name: Book of Fire
items/book-of-fire.description: A book carried by a Student of Apollyon. Before being beguiled with destructive magics, Apollyon studied the elven ways of elemental balance. These books contain great elemental affinity.

items/book-of-light.name: Book of Light
items/book-of-light.description: A book carried by a Student of Apollyon. Before being beguiled with destructive magics, Apollyon studied the elven ways of elemental balance. These books contain great elemental affinity.

items/book-of-lightning.name: Book of Lightning
items/book-of-lightning.description: A book carried by a Student of Apollyon. Before being beguiled with destructive magics, Apollyon studied the elven ways of elemental balance. These books contain great elemental affinity.

items/book-of-the-arcane.name: Book of the Arcane
items/book-of-the-arcane.description: A book carried by a Student of Apollyon. Before being beguiled with destructive magics, Apollyon studied the elven ways of elemental balance. These books contain great elemental affinity.

items/book-of-the-dragon.name: Book of the Dragon
items/book-of-the-dragon.description: A book carried by a Student of Apollyon. Before being beguiled with destructive magics, Apollyon studied the elven ways of elemental balance. These books contain great elemental affinity.

items/book-of-water.name: Book of Water
items/book-of-water.description: A book carried by a Student of Apollyon. Before being beguiled with destructive magics, Apollyon studied the elven ways of elemental balance. These books contain great elemental affinity.

items/boots-of-earth.name: Boots of Earth
items/boots-of-earth.description: Boots of a mage who controlled the ground below. Grants protection from earthen magic.

items/boots-of-fire.name: Boots of Fire
items/boots-of-fire.description: Boots of a mage who controlled the heat. Grants protection from fire.

items/boots-of-storm.name: Boots of Storm
items/boots-of-storm.description: Boots of a mage who controlled the skies. Grants protection from lightning.

items/boots-of-the-sea.name: Boots of the Sea
items/boots-of-the-sea.description: Boots of a mage who controlled the tides. Grants protection from water & ice.

items/boreals-staff.name: Boreal's Staff
items/boreals-staff.description: Chilling staff of Boreal, a Frozenguard elite. It has a high chance of freezing an opponent.

items/bormanas-mantle.name: Bormana's Mantle
items/bormanas-mantle.description: Light armor of Bormana, warrior water Goddess of the Fomorian house of Sumner. Bormana tended the Sumner crops with castle-sized barrels of water, a true testiment to her strength. While wearing this item, skills that target multiple opponents will deal additional damage. Additionally, skills will seldomly hit more than one opponent.

items/boulderbold.name: Boulderbold
items/boulderbold.description: Earthen polearm of Boulder, the Earthen Legion elite. It has a high chance of stunning an opponent.

items/bow-of-diana.name: Bow of Diana
items/bow-of-diana.description: Silver bow of a legendary huntress. It grants its wielder extra dexterity.

items/bow-of-scales.name: Bow of Scales
items/bow-of-scales.description: Although the Lizarr seemed untrained in advanced weaponry, these fine bows have been found within their settlements. This bow is enchanted with the power of ice and water.

items/bow-of-the-chimera.name: Bow of the Chimera
items/bow-of-the-chimera.description: A powerful bow forged of the remains of a Chimera. Using this weapon may cause one to fill with immense rage, inflicting the Berserk status.

items/bow-of-tiamat.name: Bow of Tiamat
items/bow-of-tiamat.description: A superb bow forged of the remains of Tiamat, the great ancient dragon.

items/bow-of-typhon.name: Bow of Typhon
items/bow-of-typhon.description: A superb bow forged of the remains of Typhon, the great ancient dragon.

items/bricrius-bow.name: Bricriu's Bow
items/bricrius-bow.description: Bombard all opponents with many arrows.

items/brilliant-feathers.name: Brilliant Feathers
items/brilliant-feathers.description: Deals extra damage and may cause bleeding.

items/briny-pendant.name: Briny Pendant
items/briny-pendant.description: A pendant found within wreckage, deep within the sea. It protects its wearer from blight, poison, rot, and toxic.

items/broadsword.name: Broadsword
items/broadsword.description: A sword with a wide blade.

items/broken-statue.name: Broken Statue
items/broken-statue.description: A broken piece of a statue. It may be useful in upgrading rarer weapons.

items/bulls-eye.name: Bull's Eye
items/bulls-eye.description: A celestial adornment capable of increasing many attributes of a piece of equipment when adorned upon it.

items/bulwark.name: Bulwark
items/bulwark.description: Armor forged of the remains of the dragon Nidhogg. Contrary to its size, it is of little weight and can be worn by anyone. It grants one great resistance from Dragon magic, while boosting the strength of one's own.

items/caladbolg.name: Caladbolg
items/caladbolg.description: A blade with the power to cleave the tops from the hills. It may paralyze an opponent, while protecting its wielder from paralyzation.

items/calloused-hands-of-oceanus.name: Calloused Hands of Oceanus
items/calloused-hands-of-oceanus.description: A piece of a Titan themself. These pieces can be used to augment celestial weapons at a Titan Workshop.

items/candle-pike.name: Candle-pike
items/candle-pike.description: This pike of Pyre is eternally lit. Has a very high chance of causing an opponent to burn.

items/candle-staff.name: Candle-staff
items/candle-staff.description: This staff of Pyre is eternally lit. Has a very high chance of causing an opponent to burn.

items/candy-cane.name: Candy Cane
items/candy-cane.description: A vibrant cane carried by followers of Scruug. Some say it is even pleasing to the taste. Carrying it will allow you to recover missing HP per turn.

items/canon-waystone.name: Canon Waystone
items/canon-waystone.description: A stone imbued with the most helpful of magic. Use it to set a compass marker to story quest monster locations.

items/carls-dagger.name: Carl's Dagger
items/carls-dagger.description: A simple yet sentimental dagger of the aloof one, Carl.

items/carls-ring-646f22f4.name: Carl's Ring
items/carls-ring-646f22f4.description: Iron ring of the aloof one, Carl. Slightly raises some stats.

items/carls-ring.name: Carl's Ring
items/carls-ring.description: Iron ring of the aloof one, Carl. Slightly raises some stats.

items/carnwennan.name: Carnwennan
items/carnwennan.description: A mythical dagger said to have the magical power to shroud its user in shadow. It may lull an opponent to sleep.

items/caroling-lute.name: Caroling Lute
items/caroling-lute.description: A song is best sung with cheer.

items/castors-archistaff.name: Castor's Archistaff
items/castors-archistaff.description: Azure staff of Castor, the Dioscuri magician. Castor and his twin brother seldomly leave the depths of the seas unless truly lacking in other hobbies.

items/caticatona-cuirass.name: Caticatona Cuirass
items/caticatona-cuirass.description: Large heavy armor of Caticatona, leader of the Fomorian house of Sumner. Caticatona, the armored Water Goddess, stood tall against Morrigan's acolytes, but ultimately fell by their staff and sword. While wearing this item, skills that target multiple opponents will deal additional damage. Additionally, skills will seldomly hit more than one opponent.

items/caturixs-robe.name: Caturix's Robe
items/caturixs-robe.description: Heavy, armored, robe of Caturix, war God and leader of the Fomorian house of Wintara. Caturix fought Morrigan to the bitter end, ultimately succumbing to the curse in battle. While wearing this item, buffs cast by its wearer may transfer to a party mate. Additionally, positive status effects will last longer.

items/cavestone.name: Cavestone
items/cavestone.description: Stone mined from an eerie cave. Useful for upgrading powerful weapons.

items/celestial-archistaff.name: Celestial Archistaff
items/celestial-archistaff.description: An extremely malleable yet durable weapon, constructed of refined Skyshards. With great vises, a Titan can augment it to fit your needs.

items/celestial-axe.name: Celestial Axe
items/celestial-axe.description: An extremely malleable yet durable weapon, constructed of refined Skyshards. With great vises, a Titan can augment it to fit your needs.

items/celestial-bow.name: Celestial Bow
items/celestial-bow.description: An extremely malleable yet durable weapon, constructed of refined Skyshards. With great vises, a Titan can augment it to fit your needs.

items/celestial-greatbow.name: Celestial Greatbow
items/celestial-greatbow.description: An extremely malleable yet durable weapon, constructed of refined Skyshards. With great vises, a Titan can augment it to fit your needs.

items/celestial-hammer.name: Celestial Hammer
items/celestial-hammer.description: An extremely malleable yet durable weapon, constructed of refined Skyshards. With great vises, a Titan can augment it to fit your needs.

items/celestial-lute.name: Celestial Lute
items/celestial-lute.description: An extremely malleable yet durable weapon, constructed of refined Skyshards. With great vises, a Titan can augment it to fit your needs.

items/celestial-moondrop.name: Celestial Moondrop
items/celestial-moondrop.description: A celestial essence fallen from the skies above. Consuming it will recollect stories of the Giants and Titans, summoning a Titan to your area.

items/celestial-quarterstaff.name: Celestial Quarterstaff
items/celestial-quarterstaff.description: An extremely malleable yet durable weapon, constructed of refined Skyshards. With great vises, a Titan can augment it to fit your needs.

items/celestial-scythe.name: Celestial Scythe
items/celestial-scythe.description: An extremely malleable yet durable weapon, constructed of refined Skyshards. With great vises, a Titan can augment it to fit your needs.

items/celestial-staff.name: Celestial Staff
items/celestial-staff.description: An extremely malleable yet durable weapon, constructed of refined Skyshards. With great vises, a Titan can augment it to fit your needs.

items/celestial-stardrop.name: Celestial Stardrop
items/celestial-stardrop.description: A celestial essence fallen from the skies above. Consuming it will recollect stories of the Giants and Titans, summoning a Giant to your area.

items/celestial-thinblade.name: Celestial Thinblade
items/celestial-thinblade.description: An extremely malleable yet durable weapon, constructed of refined Skyshards. With great vises, a Titan can augment it to fit your needs.

items/chained-shadeblades.name: Chained Shadeblades
items/chained-shadeblades.description: Swiftly attack twice, dealing up to double damage.

items/chained-shadowblades.name: Chained Shadowblades
items/chained-shadowblades.description: Swiftly attack twice, dealing up to double damage.

items/charons-grimoire.name: Charon's Grimoire
items/charons-grimoire.description: Summon one to many beasts to assist you. Requires 3 turns in battle.

items/charons-shade-staff.name: Charon's Shade Staff
items/charons-shade-staff.description: Staff of Charon, the Grand Summoner. It will boost the power of your summoned allies.

items/charons-shadow-staff.name: Charon's Shadow Staff
items/charons-shadow-staff.description: Staff of Charon, the Grand Summoner. It will boost the power of your summoned allies.

items/chimera-armor.name: Chimera Armor
items/chimera-armor.description: An exotic chest guard made of Chimera remains.

items/chimera-greaves.name: Chimera Greaves
items/chimera-greaves.description: Exotic, heavy leg armor made of Chimeric remains.

items/chimera-helmet.name: Chimera Helmet
items/chimera-helmet.description: An exotic helmet made of Chimera remains.

items/chimera-stacatto.name: Chimera Stacatto
items/chimera-stacatto.description: An instrument often used to sooth the greatest of beasts.

items/claymore.name: Claymore
items/claymore.description: A large cross-hilted weapon that is seen as a sign of distinction. It may break an opponent's defenses.

items/cliffside-cuirass.name: Cliffside Cuirass
items/cliffside-cuirass.description: Chapter VI: Illuyanka then raised walls of stone to frame this new land from the raging seas and winds. The cliffs and shores can be seen from afar, and her mighty armor will surely make one feel as they are made of the cliffs themselves. It will occasionally protect you from hits that take 100% of your maximum HP.

items/clotas-garb.name: Clota's Garb
items/clotas-garb.description: Light garb of Clota, river Goddess of the Fomorian house of Autumna. Clota and her sisters traversed the riverways, tunnels, and creeks to get the edge in battle, but Morrigan's forces were far too plentiful. While wearing this item, debuffs will be easier to cast on your opponent. Additionally, it increases the maximum damage of status effects on your opponent.

items/clurichaun-arrows.name: Clurichaun Arrows
items/clurichaun-arrows.description: Deals damage thrice, grants 2 turns of Ward, and may temporarily increase dexterity.

items/clurichaun-soul-blade.name: Clurichaun Soul Blade
items/clurichaun-soul-blade.description: Fabled ceremonial blade of a forgotten clurichaun. It has a good chance of poisoning an opponent.

items/cockatrice-mail.name: Cockatrice Mail
items/cockatrice-mail.description: Chestplate forged of the remains of a mighty Cockatrice. It grants its wearer immunity from petrification.

items/coiled-shield.name: Coiled Shield
items/coiled-shield.description: Grants temporary defenses and grants Ward for 3 turns.

items/coin-purse.name: Coin Purse
items/coin-purse.description: A bag for coins. Slightly raises gold earned.

items/colada.name: Colada
items/colada.description: A greatsword often used in offensive swordplay by the almighty knight, Balin. Strikes of the sword have the ability to lower an opponent's physical or magical prowess.

items/colossal-armor.name: Colossal Armor
items/colossal-armor.description: Armor forged of the remains of a colossal being. Boasts strong physical defense at the sacrifice of magical defense.

items/colossal-helmet.name: Colossal Helmet
items/colossal-helmet.description: Helmet forged of the remains of a colossal being. Boasts strong physical defense at the sacrifice of magical defense.

items/colossal-leggings.name: Colossal Leggings
items/colossal-leggings.description: Leg armor forged of the remains of a colossal being. Boasts strong physical defense at the sacrifice of magical defense.

items/conalls-wand.name: Conall's Wand
items/conalls-wand.description: Deals non-elemental magic damage and may suspend an enemy in time.

items/contraption.name: Contraption
items/contraption.description: A small, strange thing made by Cade, the great inventor. It can provide all sorts of benefits to a piece of armor when adorned upon it.

items/coral-armor.name: Coral Armor
items/coral-armor.description: Armor of coral, fetched from the high seas. It boasts great resistance at the sacrifice of physical defenses.

items/coral-boots.name: Coral Boots
items/coral-boots.description: Boots of coral, fetched from the high seas. It boasts great resistance at the sacrifice of physical defenses.

items/coral-cowl.name: Coral Cowl
items/coral-cowl.description: Headwear of coral, fetched from the high seas. It boasts great resistance at the sacrifice of physical defenses.

items/coral-garb.name: Coral Garb
items/coral-garb.description: Armor of coral, fetched from the high seas. It boasts great resistance at the sacrifice of physical defenses.

items/coral-helmet.name: Coral Helmet
items/coral-helmet.description: Headwear of coral, fetched from the high seas. It boasts great resistance at the sacrifice of physical defenses.

items/coral-hood.name: Coral Hood
items/coral-hood.description: Hood of coral, fetched from the high seas. It boasts great resistance at the sacrifice of physical defenses.

items/coral-robe.name: Coral Robe
items/coral-robe.description: Robe of coral, fetched from the high seas. It boasts great resistance at the sacrifice of physical defenses.

items/coral.name: Coral
items/coral.description: Currency of the Nothren people, typically used in port towns.

items/cormacs-shotel.name: Cormac's Shotel
items/cormacs-shotel.description: Attack with both hands gripped tightly, dealing paltry to immense damage. Requires 2 turns in battle.

items/counts-garment.name: Count's Garment
items/counts-garment.description: Cloak of a count. It's quite stylish, really.

items/counts-hood.name: Count's Hood
items/counts-hood.description: Hood of a count. It's quite stylish, really.

items/court-jesters-outfit.name: Court Jester's Outfit
items/court-jesters-outfit.description: Amusing outfit of a court jester. It increases gold and orns earned.

items/court-staff.name: Court Staff
items/court-staff.description: An archistaff of Avalon that is capable of lowering an opponent's resistance.

items/cowards-blade.name: Coward's Blade
items/cowards-blade.description: A hooked blade used by Avalon assassins. Some say the great King Arthus had a secretive hobby.

items/cowards-boots.name: Coward's Boots
items/cowards-boots.description: Boots worn by Avalon assassins. Some say the great King Arthus had a secretive hobby.

items/cowards-cloak.name: Coward's Cloak
items/cowards-cloak.description: Cloak worn by Avalon assassins. Some say the great King Arthus had a secretive hobby.

items/cowards-cowl.name: Coward's Cowl
items/cowards-cowl.description: Headpiece worn by Avalon assassins. Some say the great King Arthus had a secretive hobby.

items/cracked-mirror.name: Cracked Mirror
items/cracked-mirror.description: A mirrored shield. At the sacrifice of Ward, one should have been able to reflect on themselves and gain mana. But alas, it is cracked.

items/crest-of-autumna.name: Crest of Autumna
items/crest-of-autumna.description: Proof of trials complete for the Fomorian house of Autumna. Use this item to summon a mighty projection.

items/crest-of-avalon.name: Crest of Avalon
items/crest-of-avalon.description: An easily recognizable shield depicting the crest of Avalon.

items/crest-of-nocturna.name: Crest of Nocturna
items/crest-of-nocturna.description: Proof of trials complete for the Fomorian house of Nocturna. Use this item to summon a mighty projection.

items/crest-of-sumner.name: Crest of Sumner
items/crest-of-sumner.description: Proof of trials complete for the Fomorian house of Sumner. Use this item to summon a mighty projection.

items/crest-of-wintara.name: Crest of Wintara
items/crest-of-wintara.description: Proof of trials complete for the Fomorian house of Wintara. Use this item to summon a mighty projection.

items/crimson-eye.name: Crimson Eye
items/crimson-eye.description: A strange crimson eye imbued with even stranger magic. Keeping this in your hand will slightly boost all stats.

items/crimson-pinion.name: Crimson Pinion
items/crimson-pinion.description: A feather pulled from the remains of a cursed Cockatrice. It grants additional attack power at the expense of physical defense and mana.

items/crooked-shotel.name: Crooked Shotel
items/crooked-shotel.description: The blademaster Finesse is known for carrying an inhuman amount of swords upon his back. This crooked shotel is one of them.

items/crows-feathers.name: Crow's Feathers
items/crows-feathers.description: Crude armor made of the remains of a crow. Does not offer much defense, but raises your dexterity.

items/crowsong.name: Crowsong
items/crowsong.description: Cursed lute played by the sisters of Morrigan. It can grant one additional defenses while having the adverse effect on an opponent.

items/crucifix.name: Crucifix
items/crucifix.description: A staff of the occult. Boasts strong magic power, but can also be used as a weapon. Additionally It heals its wielder when dealing damage.

items/crusading-armor.name: Crusading Armor
items/crusading-armor.description: Some magic users are also skilled in combat. This is the armor of one.

items/crusading-boots.name: Crusading Boots
items/crusading-boots.description: Some magic users are also skilled in combat. These are the boots of one.

items/crusading-helmet.name: Crusading Helmet
items/crusading-helmet.description: Some magic users are also skilled in combat. This is the helmet of one.

items/crystal-eye.name: Crystal Eye
items/crystal-eye.description: A strange eye imbued with even stranger magic. Keeping this in your hand will slightly boost all stats.

items/crystal-halberd.name: Crystal Halberd
items/crystal-halberd.description: A crystalline polearm carried by the most enlightened of travelers. It is well suited for adornment.

items/crystal-staff.name: Crystal Staff
items/crystal-staff.description: A magical crystalline staff carried by the most enlightened travelers. It is well suited for adornment.

items/crystalis.name: Crystalis
items/crystalis.description: A ceremonial sword of enlightened royalty. It can protect one from having their stats lowered and is well suited for adornment.

items/cure-all.name: Cure-all
items/cure-all.description: A bitter green elixir that heals poison, bleeding, blight, frozen, burning, paralysis, sleep, blindness, or rot.

items/cursed-aengus-ogs-lute.name: Cursed Aengus Og's Lute
items/cursed-aengus-ogs-lute.description: Second lute of Aengus Og, famous Bard of the Fomorian house of Nocturna. Aengus Og sang tales of Fomoria's conquests, but was quick to flee the lands when the great curse took haste. Does he still sing of conquest, we wonder? While wearing this item, you will tame your opponent's followers and summons, causing them to deal less damage to you.

items/cursed-artios-hide.name: Cursed Artio's Hide
items/cursed-artios-hide.description: Bear hide armor of Artio, bear Goddess of the Fomorian house of Nocturna. Artio, of three siblings, spent her days taming wild bears. While wearing this item, you will tame your opponent's followers and summons, causing them to deal less damage to you.

items/cursed-atepomarus-mail.name: Cursed Atepomarus Mail
items/cursed-atepomarus-mail.description: Heavy armor of Atepomarus, horse God and leader of the Fomorian house of Nocturna. Atepomarus, father to the three siblings, was set to ride three horses at once into battle. While wearing this item, you will tame your opponent's followers and summons, causing them to deal less damage to you.

items/cursed-autumna-crested-shield.name: Cursed Autumna Crested Shield
items/cursed-autumna-crested-shield.description: Shield of Fomor, Cursed King of Fomoria. This item grants a number of passive abilities known to be utilized by the Fomorian houses.

items/cursed-belenuss-boots.name: Cursed Belenus's Boots
items/cursed-belenuss-boots.description: Boots worn by Belenus, healing God of the Fomorian house of Nocturna. Belenus, of three siblings, spent his days attending the sick animals of Fomoria's fields. While wearing this item, you will tame your opponent's followers and summons, causing them to deal less damage to you.

items/cursed-boots.name: Cursed Boots
items/cursed-boots.description: A seemingly ageless yet pristine pair of boots.

items/cursed-bormanas-mantle.name: Cursed Bormana's Mantle
items/cursed-bormanas-mantle.description: Light armor of Bormana, warrior water Goddess of the Fomorian house of Sumner. Bormana tended the Sumner crops with castle-sized barrels of water, a true testiment to her strength. While wearing this item, skills that target multiple opponents will deal additional damage. Additionally, skills will seldomly hit more than one opponent.

items/cursed-caticatona-cuirass.name: Cursed Caticatona Cuirass
items/cursed-caticatona-cuirass.description: Large heavy armor of Caticatona, leader of the Fomorian house of Sumner. Caticatona, the armored Water Goddess, stood tall against Morrigan's acolytes, but ultimately fell by their staff and sword. While wearing this item, skills that target multiple opponents will deal additional damage. Additionally, skills will seldomly hit more than one opponent.

items/cursed-caturixs-robe.name: Cursed Caturix's Robe
items/cursed-caturixs-robe.description: Heavy, armored, robe of Caturix, war God and leader of the Fomorian house of Wintara. Caturix fought Morrigan to the bitter end, ultimately succumbing to the curse in battle. While wearing this item, buffs cast by its wearer may transfer to a party mate. Additionally, positive status effects will last longer.

items/cursed-clotas-garb.name: Cursed Clota's Garb
items/cursed-clotas-garb.description: Light garb of Clota, river Goddess of the Fomorian house of Autumna. Clota and her sisters traversed the riverways, tunnels, and creeks to get the edge in battle, but Morrigan's forces were far too plentiful. While wearing this item, debuffs will be easier to cast on your opponent. Additionally, it increases the maximum damage of status effects on your opponent.

items/cursed-damonas-shield.name: Cursed Damona's Shield
items/cursed-damonas-shield.description: Wet shield of Damona, river Goddess of the Fomorian house of Autumna. Damona was the youngest but bravest of her sisters. While wearing this item, debuffs will be easier to cast on your opponent. Additionally, it increases the maximum damage of status effects on your opponent.

items/cursed-eostres-circlet.name: Cursed Eostre's Circlet
items/cursed-eostres-circlet.description: Circlet of Eostre, warrior Goddess of the Fomorian house of Sumner. Eostre protected the fields and crops of Fomoria; crops that would ultimately grow the vessels of Fomoria's curse. While wearing this item, skills that target multiple opponents will deal additional damage. Additionally, skills will seldomly hit more than one opponent.

items/cursed-esuss-pillar.name: Cursed Esus's Pillar
items/cursed-esuss-pillar.description: Second staff of Esus, Stone God of the Fomorian house of Wintara. Esus constructed the mighty pillars of Fomoria, an architectural delight, truly. While wearing this item, buffs cast by its wearer may transfer to a party mate. Additionally, positive status effects will last longer.

items/cursed-fomoria-plated-boots-0ebf60.description: Boots of Fomor, Cursed King of Fomoria. This item grants a number of passive abilities known to be utilized by the Fomorian houses.

items/cursed-fomors-crown.description: Crown of Fomor, Cursed King of Fomoria. This item grants a number of passive abilities known to be utilized by the Fomorian houses.

items/cursed-gobannos-heavy-boots.name: Cursed Gobannos' Heavy Boots
items/cursed-gobannos-heavy-boots.description: Large boots of Gobannos, smith God of the Fomorian house of Sumner. Gobannos constructed the crops' heavy gates and fences, ultimately containing Fomoria's curse within. While wearing this item, skills that target multiple opponents will deal additional damage. Additionally, skills will seldomly hit more than one opponent.

items/cursed-goibhniu-armguard.name: Cursed Goibhniu Armguard
items/cursed-goibhniu-armguard.description: Armguard of Goibhniu, warrior smith God of the Fomorian house of Sumner. Goibhniu crafted the house's mighty swords, hammers, and axes. While wearing this item, skills that target multiple opponents will deal additional damage. Additionally, skills will seldomly hit more than one opponent.

items/cursed-hood.name: Cursed Hood
items/cursed-hood.description: A seemingly ageless yet pristine hood.

items/cursed-imonas-slippers.name: Cursed Imona's Slippers
items/cursed-imonas-slippers.description: Soft slippers of Imona, waking Goddess of the Fomorian house of Wintara. Imona was blessed with the fortune of a life of unneeded sleep. While wearing this item, buffs cast by its wearer may transfer to a party mate. Additionally, positive status effects will last longer.

items/cursed-leros-hood.name: Cursed Lero's Hood
items/cursed-leros-hood.description: Hood of Lero, apprentice God of the Fomorian house of Wintara. Lero, untrained, youthful, and rather brash, was quick to fall during Morrigan's invasion. While wearing this item, buffs cast by its wearer may transfer to a party mate. Additionally, positive status effects will last longer.

items/cursed-monster-tome.name: Cursed Monster Tome
items/cursed-monster-tome.description: A tome recounting the cursed stories of Fafnir. Increases experience earned at the expense of your potential.

items/cursed-mullos-blinders.name: Cursed Mullo's Blinders
items/cursed-mullos-blinders.description: Blinders often used by Mullo, horse God of the Fomorian house of Nocturna. Mullo, of three siblings, spent his days taming wild horses. While wearing this item, you will tame your opponent's followers and summons, causing them to deal less damage to you.

items/cursed-niskus-boots.name: Cursed Niskus' Boots
items/cursed-niskus-boots.description: Boots of Niskus, river God of the Fomorian house of Autumna. Niskus was untrusted to the bitter end, ultimately being the traitor to poison Fomoria's crops, spreading curse from within. While wearing this item, debuffs will be easier to cast on your opponent. Additionally, it increases the maximum damage of status effects on your opponent.

items/cursed-nocturna-crested-shield.name: Cursed Nocturna Crested Shield
items/cursed-nocturna-crested-shield.description: Shield of Fomor, Cursed King of Fomoria. This item grants a number of passive abilities known to be utilized by the Fomorian houses.

items/cursed-ogmios-satin-robe.name: Cursed Ogmios' Satin Robe
items/cursed-ogmios-satin-robe.description: Soft robe of Ogmios, eloquence God of the Fomorian house of Wintara. Ogmios, mentor to Lero, wasn't much for a fight and quickly vanished during Morrigan's invasion. While wearing this item, buffs cast by its wearer may transfer to a party mate. Additionally, positive status effects will last longer.

items/cursed-ortanite.name: Cursed Ortanite
items/cursed-ortanite.description: A mangled piece of Ortanite imbued with the plagued magic of Morrigan, the great witch.

items/cursed-ring.name: Cursed Ring
items/cursed-ring.description: A ring of the cursed Fafnir. Increases your attack and magic power at the expense of your longevity.

items/cursed-robe.name: Cursed Robe

While wearing this item, debuffs will be easier to cast on your opponent. Additionally, it increases the maximum damage of status effects on your opponent.

items/cursed-sequanas-chestpiece.name: Cursed Sequana's Chestpiece
items/cursed-sequanas-chestpiece.description: Masterly smithed chest armor of Sequana, river Goddess and leader of the Fomorian house of Autumna. The oldest of her sisters, Sequana was a deity of grace and fortune. While wearing this item, debuffs will be easier to cast on your opponent. Additionally, it increases the maximum damage of status effects on your opponent.

items/delta-olympia-cowl.description: Light armor, reminiscent of an Olympian rogue. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.
