items/delta-olympia-cuirass.description: Heavy armor, reminiscent of an Olympian warrior. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

items/delta-olympia-garb.name: Delta Olympia Garb
items/delta-olympia-garb.description: Light armor, reminiscent of an Olympian rogue. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

items/delta-olympia-greaves.name: Delta Olympia Greaves
items/delta-olympia-greaves.description: Heavy armor, reminiscent of an Olympian warrior. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

items/delta-olympia-helmet.name: Delta Olympia Helmet
items/delta-olympia-helmet.description: Heavy armor, reminiscent of an Olympian warrior. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

items/delta-olympia-hood.name: Delta Olympia Hood
items/delta-olympia-hood.description: Magical clothing, reminiscent of an Olympian magician. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

items/delta-olympia-shoes.name: Delta Olympia Shoes
items/delta-olympia-shoes.description: Magical clothing, reminiscent of an Olympian magician. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

items/delta-olympia-vestment.name: Delta Olympia Vestment
items/delta-olympia-vestment.description: Magical clothing, reminiscent of an Olympian magician. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

items/delta-olympia-warbow.name: Delta Olympia Warbow
items/delta-olympia-warbow.description: Rare weapon, fallen from an Olympian.

items/delta-olympia-warsword.name: Delta Olympia Warsword
items/delta-olympia-warsword.description: Rare weapon, fallen from an Olympian.

items/delta-rhada-riftlock-fragment.name: Delta Rhada Riftlock Fragment
items/delta-rhada-riftlock-fragment.description: Riftlock of Rhada, the Great Shield.

items/delta-rhada-riftlock.name: Delta Rhada Riftlock
items/delta-rhada-riftlock.description: Riftlock of Rhada, the Great Shield.

items/demeters-halberd.name: Demeter's Halberd
items/demeters-halberd.description: The contorted pole-arm of Demeter. Demeter created the Earthen Legion to restore and maintain balance to this world after the falling. Unfortunately, their fate came long before any notion of normality.

items/demeters-staff.name: Demeter's Staff
items/demeters-staff.description: The contorted staff of Demeter. Demeter created the Earthen Legion to restore and maintain balance to this world after the falling. Unfortunately, their fate came long before any notion of normality.

items/demonic-blade.name: Demonic Blade
items/demonic-blade.description: Blade of the wandering demon knights. Its thick obsidian blade is infused with the power of darkness and may cause an opponent to fall asleep.

items/demonic-ore.name: Demonic Ore
items/demonic-ore.description: Unrefined ore of the underworld. Useful for upgrading demonic weapons.

items/diluted-mnemonic.name: Diluted Mnemonic
items/diluted-mnemonic.description: A catalyst with an area's lost memories trapped within. Using it will begin a hunt for shattered memories in your area.

items/dioscuri-archistaff.name: Dioscuri Archistaff
items/dioscuri-archistaff.description: Azure staff of Castor, the Dioscuri magician. Castor and his twin brother seldomly leave the depths of the seas unless truly lacking in other hobbies.

items/dioscuri-greataxe.name: Dioscuri Greataxe
items/dioscuri-greataxe.description: Azure greataxe of Pollux, the Dioscuri berserker. Pollux and his twin brother seldomly leave the depths of the seas unless truly lacking in other hobbies.

items/dioscuri-greatbow.name: Dioscuri Greatbow
items/dioscuri-greatbow.description: Azure greatbow of Pollux, the Dioscuri berserker. Pollux and his twin brother seldomly leave the depths of the seas unless truly lacking in other hobbies.

items/dioscuri-magic-ring.name: Dioscuri Magic Ring
items/dioscuri-magic-ring.description: A strange magical ring of the Dioscuri. Those who are not trained in magical arts can equip this ring to sacrifice physical strength for magic power.

items/dioscuri-mead.name: Dioscuri Mead
items/dioscuri-mead.description: For some reason, the Dioscuri love this terrible drink for its taste and not benefit. Consuming it will temporarily increase your critical hit rate.

items/dioscuri-ring.name: Dioscuri Ring
items/dioscuri-ring.description: A strange magical ring of the Dioscuri. Those who do not possess physical strength can equip this ring to sacrifice magic for attack power.

items/dirk.name: Dirk
items/dirk.description: A long thrusting dagger. Has a high chance to cause bleeding.

items/dokkalfar-gada.name: Dokkalfar Gada
items/dokkalfar-gada.description: A huge mace, favored by esteemed Dokkalfar warriors. Has a very high chance of stunning an opponent.

items/dokkalfar-garb.name: Dokkalfar Garb
items/dokkalfar-garb.description: Light armor of a Dokkalfar warrior.

items/dokkalfar-staff.name: Dokkalfar Staff
items/dokkalfar-staff.description: Great staff of a Dokkalfar mage.

items/dokkalfar-sword.name: Dokkalfar Sword
items/dokkalfar-sword.description: An ebony blade of a Dokkalfar warrior.

items/dontas-shield.name: Donta's Shield
items/dontas-shield.description: Deals moderate non-elemental damage and may lull an opponent

items/dowsing-rod.name: Dowsing Rod
items/dowsing-rod.description: A strange apparatus suitable for finding that which cannot be easily found. Boosts item and discovery rate for a period of time.

items/dracon-bow.name: Dracon Bow
items/dracon-bow.description: Bow of Dracon, the old Draconian king.

items/dracon-shield.name: Dracon Shield
items/dracon-shield.description: A shield depicting the emblem of Draconia. It's not very well constructed.

items/dracon-staff.name: Dracon Staff
items/dracon-staff.description: Staff of Dracon, the old Draconian king.

items/dracon-sword.name: Dracon Sword
items/dracon-sword.description: Sword of Dracon, the old Draconian king.

items/draconian-amulet.name: Draconian Amulet
items/draconian-amulet.description: Amulet of Draconian lords. It slightly extends one's health and mana.

items/draconian-archistaff.name: Draconian Archistaff
items/draconian-archistaff.description: An archistaff granted to Draconian lords. Illuminates your path while carried.

items/draconian-bow.name: Draconian Bow
items/draconian-bow.description: A bow of a Draconian forged by the Draconians.

items/draconian-cowl.name: Draconian Cowl
items/draconian-cowl.description: A cowl of a Draconian rogue.

items/draconian-garb.name: Draconian Garb
items/draconian-garb.description: Body coverings of a Draconian rogue.

items/draconian-hood.name: Draconian Hood
items/draconian-hood.description: A hood of a Draconian mage.

items/draconian-robe.name: Draconian Robe
items/draconian-robe.description: A robe of a Draconian mage.

items/draconian-sceptre.name: Draconian Sceptre
items/draconian-sceptre.description: A staff of a Draconian acolyte. High magic power.

items/draconian-staff.name: Draconian Staff
items/draconian-staff.description: A staff of a Draconian mage. Boasts above average magic power.

items/draconian-sword.name: Draconian Sword
items/draconian-sword.description: A sword of a Draconian blacksmith. The quality is quite surprising.

items/draconite.name: Draconite
items/draconite.description: A rare piece of draconite. Useful for crafting and upgrading magical weapons or armor.

items/dragon-crested-shield.name: Dragon Crested Shield
items/dragon-crested-shield.description: A shield crested with the image of a Dragon. It protects one against Dragon attacks while boosting Ward.

items/dragon-dagger.name: Dragon Dagger
items/dragon-dagger.description: A fine blade crafted of a Dragon's talon

items/dragon-sword.name: Dragon Sword
items/dragon-sword.description: A fine blade crafted of a Dragon's talon

items/dragonite.name: Dragonite
items/dragonite.description: A rare piece of dragonite. Useful for crafting and upgrading magical weapons or armor.

items/dragons-arc.name: Dragon's Arc
items/dragons-arc.description: A superb bow forged of the remains of a lost dragon. It has a good chance of causing blight.

items/dragonsong.name: Dragonsong
items/dragonsong.description: An instrument often used to sooth dragons. Its song has the rare chance to temporarily boost one's magical prowess.

items/dragoons-charm.name: Dragoon's Charm
items/dragoons-charm.description: Amulet often carried by highly ranked Dragoons. Wearing this item increases the power of your follower and may cause them to act more often.

items/drake-armor.name: Drake Armor
items/drake-armor.description: Heavy armor smithed of dragon scale.

items/drake-blood.name: Drake Blood
items/drake-blood.description: A tonic made of a dragon's blood. It will cure any elemental blight that a dragon may have inflicted upon you.

items/drake-boots.name: Drake Boots
items/drake-boots.description: Heavy armor smithed of dragon scale

items/drake-helmet.name: Drake Helmet
items/drake-helmet.description: Heavy armor smithed of dragon scale

items/drake-leggings.name: Drake Leggings
items/drake-leggings.description: Heavy armor smithed of dragon scale

items/draugr-staff.name: Draugr Staff
items/draugr-staff.description: The staff of a draugr. It grants additional mana.

items/dried-oak.name: Dried Oak
items/dried-oak.description: A piece of oak, dried over the ages.

items/dudleys-hammer.name: Dudley's Hammer
items/dudleys-hammer.description: A massive dwarven hammer, carried by Dudley the steadfast.

items/dukes-shield.name: Duke's Shield
items/dukes-shield.description: A shield portraying the emblem of a great duke.

items/dune-blade.name: Dune Blade
items/dune-blade.description: A rare scimitar of the sands. Slightly increases gold earned.

items/durandal.name: Durandal
items/durandal.description: A sword brought by an angel of God. Some say it is the sharpest sword in existence, easily causing an opponent to bleed.

items/dusk-armor.name: Dusk Armor
items/dusk-armor.description: Armor of a royal Dokkalfar warrior. They grant one immunity from blindness and falling asleep in battle.

items/dusk-boots.name: Dusk Boots
items/dusk-boots.description: Boots of a royal Dokkalfar warrior. They grant one immunity from blindness and falling asleep in battle.

items/dusk-cowl.name: Dusk Cowl
items/dusk-cowl.description: Cowl of a royal Dokkalfar assassin. It grants one immunity from blindness and falling asleep in battle.

items/dusk-garb.name: Dusk Garb
items/dusk-garb.description: Light armor of a royal Dokkalfar warrior. It grants one immunity from blindness and falling asleep in battle.

items/dusk-helmet.name: Dusk Helmet
items/dusk-helmet.description: Helmet of a royal Dokkalfar warrior. It grants one immunity from blindness and falling asleep in battle.

items/dusk-hood.name: Dusk Hood
items/dusk-hood.description: Hood of a royal Dokkalfar mage. It grants one immunity from blindness and falling asleep in battle.

items/dusk-robe.name: Dusk Robe
items/dusk-robe.description: Robe of a royal Dokkalfar mage. It grants one immunity from blindness and falling asleep in battle.

items/duskbreaker-ef96cc6a.name: Duskbreaker
items/duskbreaker-ef96cc6a.description: A powerful magical greatbow of Dokkalfar royalty. It grants one immunity from blindness and falling asleep in battle.

items/duskbreaker.name: Duskbreaker
items/duskbreaker.description: A powerful magical sword of Dokkalfar royalty. It grants one immunity from blindness and falling asleep in battle.

items/dynasty.name: Dynasty
items/dynasty.description: An ancient, strange weapon of ages. It is carried by Anubis, the Jackal, and can cause an opponent to bleed simply by casting a spell.

items/dyrnwyn.name: Dyrnwyn
items/dyrnwyn.description: A legendary blade that blazes with fire when drawn.

items/earthen-arrows.name: Earthen Arrows
items/earthen-arrows.description: Deals damage thrice, grants 2 turns of Ward, and may temporarily increase dexterity.

items/earthen-belt.name: Earthen Belt
items/earthen-belt.description: Belt of Earthen Legion. Grants protection from earthen magic.

items/earthen-pike.name: Earthen Pike
items/earthen-pike.description: A pike of a Earth Legionnaire.

items/earthen-sceptre.name: Earthen Sceptre
items/earthen-sceptre.description: A staff that harnesses the earthen power below the wielder.

items/earthstone.name: Earthstone
items/earthstone.description: A rare piece of earthstone. Useful for crafting and upgrading magical weapons or armor.

items/ebon-candy-cane.name: Ebon Candy Cane
items/ebon-candy-cane.description: A vibrant cane carried by followers of Scruug. Some say it is even pleasing to the taste. Carrying it will allow you to recover missing HP per turn.

items/ebon-caroling-lute.name: Ebon Caroling Lute
items/ebon-caroling-lute.description: A song is best sung with cheer.

items/ebon-jolly-stockings.name: Ebon Jolly Stockings
items/ebon-jolly-stockings.description: Socks of a generous and plump man.

items/ebon-north-star.name: Ebon North Star
items/ebon-north-star.description: Converts most of your available mana into damage against an opponent.

items/ebon-reinbow.name: Ebon Reinbow
items/ebon-reinbow.description: A great hunting bow carried by followers of Scruug. Arrows loosed from this bow will miss less often.

items/ebon-sleighblade.name: Ebon Sleighblade
items/ebon-sleighblade.description: A glistening sword carried by followers of Scruug. It is quite chilling to the touch. When using this weapon, you will start battle with Ward automatically activated.

items/ebon-top-hat.name: Ebon Top Hat
items/ebon-top-hat.description: Boy, it is dapper! When wearing this hat, you can wield two-handed weapons more effectively.

items/ectoplasm.name: Ectoplasm
items/ectoplasm.description: Remains of a very spooky ghost. Carrying it will attract additional monsters to you while providing protection from attacks of the physical element, but will often put its wearer to sleep.

items/egg-nog.name: Egg Nog
items/egg-nog.description: A strange concoction of a lost civilization. Drinking it in battle can add a little spring to your step.

items/elite-balor-archistaff.name: Elite Balor Archistaff
items/elite-balor-archistaff.description: Staff wielded by Balor mages. It increases mana at the expense of health.

items/elite-balor-armor.name: Elite Balor Armor
items/elite-balor-armor.description: Heavy armor typically worn by Balor warriors.

items/elite-balor-helmet.name: Elite Balor Helmet
items/elite-balor-helmet.description: A heavy helmet typically worn by Balor warriors.

items/elite-balor-katana.name: Elite Balor Katana
items/elite-balor-katana.description: Katana wielded by Balor rogues. It has a high chance of causing an opponent to bleed.

items/elite-balor-leggings.name: Elite Balor Leggings
items/elite-balor-leggings.description: Heavy leggings typically worn by Balor warriors.

items/elite-balor-robe.name: Elite Balor Robe
items/elite-balor-robe.description: A dark, dusty robe typically worn by Balor mages.

items/elite-balor-shield.name: Elite Balor Shield
items/elite-balor-shield.description: A decorated shield often carried by Balor warriors.

items/elite-balor-sword.name: Elite Balor Sword
items/elite-balor-sword.description: A commonly used sword of knights of Balor.

items/elite-draconian-cowl.name: Elite Draconian Cowl
items/elite-draconian-cowl.description: A cowl of a Draconian rogue.

items/elite-draconian-garb.name: Elite Draconian Garb
items/elite-draconian-garb.description: Body coverings of a Draconian rogue.

items/elite-draconian-hood.name: Elite Draconian Hood
items/elite-draconian-hood.description: A hood of a Draconian mage.

items/elite-draconian-robe.name: Elite Draconian Robe
items/elite-draconian-robe.description: A robe of a Draconian mage.

items/elite-draconian-staff.name: Elite Draconian Staff
items/elite-draconian-staff.description: A staff of a Draconian mage. Boasts above average magic power.

items/elite-draconian-sword.name: Elite Draconian Sword
items/elite-draconian-sword.description: A sword of a Draconian blacksmith. The quality is quite surprising.

items/elite-dune-blade.name: Elite Dune Blade
items/elite-dune-blade.description: A rare scimitar of the sands. Slightly increases gold earned.

items/elite-fomorian-armor.name: Elite Fomorian Armor
items/elite-fomorian-armor.description: Heavy armor worn by Fomorian warriors.

items/elite-fomorian-cowl.name: Elite Fomorian Cowl
items/elite-fomorian-cowl.description: A hood worn by Fomorian rogues.

items/elite-fomorian-garb.name: Elite Fomorian Garb
items/elite-fomorian-garb.description: Heavy armor worn by Fomorian rogues.

items/elite-fomorian-hood.name: Elite Fomorian Hood
items/elite-fomorian-hood.description: A hood worn by Fomorian mages.

items/elite-fomorian-leggings.name: Elite Fomorian Leggings
items/elite-fomorian-leggings.description: Leg armor worn by Fomorian warriors.

items/elite-fomorian-robe.name: Elite Fomorian Robe
items/elite-fomorian-robe.description: A robe worn by Fomorian mages.

items/elite-fomorian-staff.name: Elite Fomorian Staff
items/elite-fomorian-staff.description: A staff of a Fomorian mage.

items/elite-fomorian-sword.name: Elite Fomorian Sword
items/elite-fomorian-sword.description: A sword of a Fomorian warrior.

items/elite-nothren-shield.name: Elite Nothren Shield
items/elite-nothren-shield.description: Shield carried by berserkers of the Northern lands. It protects one from the cold.

items/elstone.name: Elstone
items/elstone.description: An odd stone often used to craft Elven weapons.

items/elven-katana.name: Elven Katana
items/elven-katana.description: A highly decorative weapon wielded by Elven warriors.

items/elven-staff.name: Elven Staff
items/elven-staff.description: A highly decorative staff wielded by Elven mages.

items/elven-sword.name: Elven Sword
items/elven-sword.description: A highly decorative weapon wielded by Elven warriors.

items/ember-plumed-boots.name: Ember-Plumed Boots
items/ember-plumed-boots.description: Footwear of a worshipper of the mighty Phoenix. Using this item may grant temporary improvements to your stats.

items/ember-plumed-cowl.name: Ember-Plumed Cowl
items/ember-plumed-cowl.description: Headwear of a worshipper of the mighty Phoenix. Using this item may grant temporary improvements to your stats.

items/ember-plumed-cuirass.name: Ember-Plumed Cuirass
items/ember-plumed-cuirass.description: Heavy armor of a worshipper of the mighty Phoenix. Using this item may grant temporary improvements to your stats.

items/ember-plumed-garb.name: Ember-Plumed Garb
items/ember-plumed-garb.description: Light armor of a worshipper of the mighty Phoenix. Using this item may grant temporary improvements to your stats.

items/ember-plumed-greaves.name: Ember-Plumed Greaves
items/ember-plumed-greaves.description: Heavy leg armor of a worshipper of the mighty Phoenix. Using this item may grant temporary improvements to your stats.

items/ember-plumed-helmet.name: Ember-Plumed Helmet
items/ember-plumed-helmet.description: Helmet of a worshipper of the mighty Phoenix. Using this item may grant temporary improvements to your stats.

items/ember-plumed-hood.name: Ember-Plumed Hood
items/ember-plumed-hood.description: Hood of a worshipper of the mighty Phoenix. Using this item may grant temporary improvements to your stats.

items/ember-plumed-robe.name: Ember-Plumed Robe
items/ember-plumed-robe.description: Robe of a worshipper of the mighty Phoenix. Using this item may grant temporary improvements to your stats.

items/ember-plumed-shoes.name: Ember-Plumed Shoes
items/ember-plumed-shoes.description: Footwear of a worshipper of the mighty Phoenix. Using this item may grant temporary improvements to your stats.

items/embered-snapper.name: Embered Snapper
items/embered-snapper.description: A violent fish. Stories say these fish can bring down a mighty bear.

items/embla-hood.name: Embla Hood
items/embla-hood.description: Hood of Yggdrasil, the fallen symbol of life. Wearing it may decrease the damage you may inflict upon yourself.

items/embla-robe.name: Embla Robe
items/embla-robe.description: Robe of Yggdrasil, the fallen symbol of life. Wearing it may occasionally greatly increase one's power.

items/embla-shoes.name: Embla Shoes
items/embla-shoes.description: Shoes of Yggdrasil, the fallen symbol of life. Wearing them will keep one from becoming stunned.

items/emerald-pinion.name: Emerald Pinion
items/emerald-pinion.description: A feather pulled from the remains of a cursed Cockatrice. It grants additional magic resistance at the expense of magical power.

items/emerald-trout.name: Emerald Trout
items/emerald-trout.description: A green-hued fish, slightly rarer than what one would usually see.

items/enchanted-skull.name: Enchanted Skull
items/enchanted-skull.description: A skull enchanted with strange magic. Attracts more monsters to you when carried.

items/endbringer.name: Endbringer
items/endbringer.description: Attack with both hands gripped tightly, dealing paltry to immense damage. Requires 2 turns in battle.

items/eostres-circlet.name: Eostre's Circlet
items/eostres-circlet.description: Circlet of Eostre, warrior Goddess of the Fomorian house of Sumner. Eostre protected the fields and crops of Fomoria; crops that would ultimately grow the vessels of Fomoria's curse. While wearing this item, skills that target multiple opponents will deal additional damage. Additionally, skills will seldomly hit more than one opponent.

items/estoc.name: Estoc
items/estoc.description: A simple straight sword, useful for sparring. It has a great chance at catching an opponent off guard.

items/esuss-pillar.name: Esus's Pillar
items/esuss-pillar.description: Second staff of Esus, Stone God of the Fomorian house of Wintara. Esus constructed the mighty pillars of Fomoria, an architectural delight, truly. While wearing this item, buffs cast by its wearer may transfer to a party mate. Additionally, positive status effects will last longer.

items/excalibur-32be53bc.name: Excalibur
items/excalibur-32be53bc.description: The mythic weapon of Arthus, the king of Avalon. It protects its wielder from bleeding.

items/exp-potion.name: EXP Potion
items/exp-potion.description: A sour tasting elixir that doubles experience earned for a limited time.

items/explorers-waystone.name: Explorer's Waystone
items/explorers-waystone.description: A stone imbued with the most curious of magic. Using it may guide you to something interesting.

items/eye-of-the-feyger.name: Eye of the Feyger
items/eye-of-the-feyger.description: Is it the thrill of the fight?

items/eye-of-the-morrigan.name: Eye of the Morrigan
items/eye-of-the-morrigan.description: A decaying adornment capable of increasing many attributes of a piece of equipment when adorned upon it.

items/eyestone.name: Eyestone
items/eyestone.description: Crystal eye fallen from a great gazer. Useful for upgrading powerful weapons.

items/fail-not.name: Fail-not
items/fail-not.description: The bow of a long forgotten hero. It is now carried by Rouge, the crimson archer. Surely, one cannot miss a shot with this bow.

items/fairys-ring.name: Fairy's Ring
items/fairys-ring.description: An arcane ring often worn by a clurichaun. It increases both mana potential and dexterity.

items/fairys-tanto.name: Fairy's Tanto
items/fairys-tanto.description: Attack with a chance of causing poison.

items/fairys-wand.name: Fairy's Wand
items/fairys-wand.description: A curious wand carried by the foul Naggeneen. Spells cast with this wand may cause your opponent to become poisoned or blighted.

items/falchion.name: Falchion
items/falchion.description: A single edged sword with a curved blade, often used as a tool rather than in combat.

items/fallen-archistaff.name: Fallen Archistaff
items/fallen-archistaff.description: The archistaff of a powerful fallen mage.

items/fallen-armor.name: Fallen Armor
items/fallen-armor.description: Heavy armor worn by knights of Mammon, the demon of hubris.

items/fallen-boots.name: Fallen Boots
items/fallen-boots.description: Boots worn by rogues of Mammon, the demon of hubris.

items/fallen-cowl.name: Fallen Cowl
items/fallen-cowl.description: Cowl worn by rogues of Mammon, the demon of hubris.

items/fallen-druids-staff.name: Fallen Druid's Staff
items/fallen-druids-staff.description: Staff of a fallen druid. It greatly increases mana.

items/fallen-garb.name: Fallen Garb
items/fallen-garb.description: Light armor worn by rogues of Mammon, the demon of hubris.

items/fallen-helmet.name: Fallen Helmet
items/fallen-helmet.description: Helmet worn by knights of Mammon, the demon of hubris.

items/fallen-hood.name: Fallen Hood
items/fallen-hood.description: Hood worn by acolytes of Mammon, the demon of hubris.

items/fallen-knights-axe.name: Fallen Knight's Axe
items/fallen-knights-axe.description: A large axe of a fallen knight.

items/fallen-leggings.name: Fallen Leggings
items/fallen-leggings.description: Leggings worn by knights of Mammon, the demon of hubris.

items/fallen-mages-staff.name: Fallen Mage's Staff
items/fallen-mages-staff.description: The trusty staff of a fallen mage.

items/fallen-robe.name: Fallen Robe
items/fallen-robe.description: Robe worn by acolytes of Mammon, the demon of hubris.

items/fallen-rogues-bow.name: Fallen Rogue's Bow
items/fallen-rogues-bow.description: The longbow of a fallen rogue.

items/fallen-shield.name: Fallen Shield
items/fallen-shield.description: Grants temporary defenses and grants Ward for 5 turns.

items/fallen-shoes.name: Fallen Shoes
items/fallen-shoes.description: Shoes worn by acolytes of Mammon, the demon of hubris.

items/fallen-sky-armor.name: Fallen Sky Armor
items/fallen-sky-armor.description: 1000 years since shedding her feathers, Quetzalcoatl rises again under Medea's curse. Her remaining feathers can be used to protect oneself from the Great Dragons' blights. This armor grants its wearer additional Ward protection.

items/fallen-sky-boots.name: Fallen Sky Boots
items/fallen-sky-boots.description: 1000 years since shedding her feathers, Quetzalcoatl rises again under Medea's curse. Her remaining feathers can be used to protect oneself from the Great Dragons' blights. When wearing these boots, one will deal additional damage to an opponent's Ward.

items/fallen-sky-cowl.name: Fallen Sky Cowl
items/fallen-sky-cowl.description: 1000 years since shedding her feathers, Quetzalcoatl rises again under Medea's curse. Her remaining feathers can be used to protect oneself from the Great Dragons' blights. Wearing this cowl will make critical hits slightly more effective.

items/fallen-sky-garb.name: Fallen Sky Garb
items/fallen-sky-garb.description: 1000 years since shedding her feathers, Quetzalcoatl rises again under Medea's curse. Her remaining feathers can be used to protect oneself from the Great Dragons' blights. Skills that enemies are weak against will deal additional damage while wearing this robe.

items/fallen-sky-headdress.name: Fallen Sky Headdress
items/fallen-sky-headdress.description: 1000 years since shedding her feathers, Quetzalcoatl rises again under Medea's curse. Her remaining feathers can be used to protect oneself from the Great Dragons' blights. Wearing this hood will improve the relationship between followers and Valhallan classes, allowing them a greater chance to choose the right action for your situation.

items/fallen-sky-helmet.name: Fallen Sky Helmet
items/fallen-sky-helmet.description: 1000 years since shedding her feathers, Quetzalcoatl rises again under Medea's curse. Her remaining feathers can be used to protect oneself from the Great Dragons' blights. This helmet allows one to see slightly further.

items/fallen-sky-hood.name: Fallen Sky Hood
items/fallen-sky-hood.description: 1000 years since shedding her feathers, Quetzalcoatl rises again under Medea's curse. Her remaining feathers can be used to protect oneself from the Great Dragons' blights. This hood allows one to see slightly further.

items/fallen-sky-leggings.name: Fallen Sky Leggings
items/fallen-sky-leggings.description: 1000 years since shedding her feathers, Quetzalcoatl rises again under Medea's curse. Her remaining feathers can be used to protect oneself from the Great Dragons' blights. These leggings grant its wearer one Ward turn per turn in battle.

items/fallen-sky-legwraps.name: Fallen Sky Legwraps

items/fallen-sky-shoes.name: Fallen Sky Shoes
items/fallen-sky-shoes.description: 1000 years since shedding her feathers, Quetzalcoatl rises again under Medea's curse. Her remaining feathers can be used to protect oneself from the Great Dragons' blights. Spells cast while wearing these shoes will consume additional mana.

items/fallen-thiefs-dagger.name: Fallen Thief's Dagger
items/fallen-thiefs-dagger.description: The trusty dagger of a fallen thief.

items/fallen-wanderers-dagger.name: Fallen Wanderer's Dagger
items/fallen-wanderers-dagger.description: A sharp blade carried by wandering rogues. It has a great chance to cause an opponent to bleed.

items/fallen-warriors-sword.name: Fallen Warrior's Sword
items/fallen-warriors-sword.description: The trusty sword of an unfortunately fallen warrior.

items/false-kings-crown.name: False King's Crown
items/false-kings-crown.description: The broken crown of forgotten King Meliodas. Meliodas claimed rule after Gradlon had fallen, but many outright deny his kingship. Its dents and cracks make it well suited for adornment.

items/false-kings-sceptre.name: False King's Sceptre
items/false-kings-sceptre.description: The old staff of forgotten King Meliodas. Meliodas claimed rule after Gradlon had fallen, but many outright deny his kingship.

items/fancy-belt.name: Fancy Belt
items/fancy-belt.description: How could a piece of clothing make one so happy? This item will grant one proficiency to any weapon.

items/farsight.name: Farsight
items/farsight.description: A tonic that improves eyesight. Consuming this item will increase your view distance for a limited time.

items/feral-archistaff.name: Feral Archistaff
items/feral-archistaff.description: Mighty staff, representative of the feral Kerberos. It greatly increases the rate in which a follower may act in battle.

items/feral-claws.name: Feral Claws
items/feral-claws.description: Attack the opponent with unrelenting fury.

items/feral-hood.name: Feral Hood
items/feral-hood.description: A durable hood forged of the remains of the relentless Kerberos. It greatly increases the power of your follower.

items/feral-warsword.name: Feral Warsword
items/feral-warsword.description: Mighty sword, representative of the relentless Kerberos. It greatly increases the rate in which a follower may act in battle.

items/ferguss-hammer.name: Fergus's Hammer
items/ferguss-hammer.description: Strike an enemy with the hilt of a weapon, increasing the chance to stun.

items/ferocious-bull.name: Ferocious Bull

items/ferocious-bulls-eye.name: Ferocious Bull's Eye
items/ferocious-bulls-eye.description: A celestial adornment capable of increasing many attributes of a piece of equipment when adorned upon it.

items/ferocious-hood.name: Ferocious Hood
items/ferocious-hood.description: Hood of Cerus, the untamed. It reduces the mana cost of skills or spells and is well suited for adornment.

items/fey-arrows.name: Fey Arrows
items/fey-arrows.description: Deals damage thrice, grants 3 turns of Ward, and may temporarily increase dexterity.

items/fey-dragon-robe.description: A robe made of the remains of a great dragon lost to Morrigan. Wearing this item may cause your follower to act more often.

items/fey-eye.description: A strange eye imbued with cursed magic. Keeping this in your hand will slightly boost all stats and protect you from blindness.

items/fey-gazing-staff.name: Fey Gazing Staff
items/fey-gazing-staff.description: A powerful staff adorned with a crystal eye. It increases your ability to see, prevents blindness, and may occasionally increase your dexterity in battle.

Wearing this armor will improve the relationship between followers and Valhallan classes, allowing them a greater chance to choose the right action for your situation.

items/fey-yeti-coat.description: Coat reminiscent of the cursed Yeti. It protects one from having their magical resistance lowered and reduces the damage taken from the ultimate attacks of Raid Bosses.

items/fey-yeti-horns.name: Fey Yeti Horns
items/fey-yeti-horns.description: Headwear decorated with the horns of a great Yeti. Healing items will recover more HP and mana while wearing these horns. They are also well suited for adornment.

items/final-horsemans-armor.name: Final Horseman's Armor
items/final-horsemans-armor.description: Armor of the Fourth Horseman, often associated with untimely demise. It reduces the damage taken from the ultimate attacks of Raid Bosses.

items/final-horsemans-boots.name: Final Horseman's Boots
items/final-horsemans-boots.description: Boots of the Fourth Horseman, often associated with untimely demise. It reduces the damage taken from the ultimate attacks of Raid Bosses.

items/final-horsemans-cloak.description: Cloak of the Fourth Horseman, often associated with untimely demise. It reduces the damage taken from the ultimate attacks of Raid Bosses.

items/final-horsemans-scythe.name: Final Horseman's Scythe
items/final-horsemans-scythe.description: Scythe of the Fourth Horseman, often associated with untimely demise. It is suitable for both attacking and casting spells, reduces the damage taken from the ultimate attacks of Raid Bosses, and has a small chance to curse an opponent.

items/fine-greatsword.name: Fine Greatsword
items/fine-greatsword.description: The blademaster Finesse is known for carrying an inhuman amount of swords upon his back. This greatsword is one of them.

items/fine-whetstone.name: Fine Whetstone
items/fine-whetstone.description: A stone of quartz often used in the sharpening of blades. Using it will freely upgrade your equipped weapon from level 2 to 3.

items/finesse-katana.name: Finesse Katana
items/finesse-katana.description: The blademaster Finesse is known for carrying an inhuman amount of swords upon his back. This katana is his favorite, and can easily weaken an opponent.

items/finesses-enchanted-epee.name: Finesse's Enchanted Epee
items/finesses-enchanted-epee.description: The blademaster Finesse is known for carrying an inhuman amount of swords upon his back. This epee is one of them.

items/finesses-greatsword.name: Finesse's Greatsword
items/finesses-greatsword.description: The blademaster Finesse is known for carrying an inhuman amount of swords upon his back. This greatsword is one of them.

items/finesses-katana.name: Finesse's Katana
items/finesses-katana.description: The blademaster Finesse is known for carrying an inhuman amount of swords upon his back. This katana is his favorite, and can easily weaken an opponent.

items/finesses-shotel.name: Finesse's Shotel
items/finesses-shotel.description: The blademaster Finesse is known for carrying an inhuman amount of swords upon his back. This crooked shotel is one of them.

items/finns-spear.name: Finn's Spear
items/finns-spear.description: Attack with your weapon extended, dealing moderate damage but mitigating damage from your opponent's next attack.

items/fire-arrows.name: Fire Arrows
items/fire-arrows.description: Deals damage thrice, grants 2 turns of Ward, and may temporarily increase dexterity.

items/firepike.name: Firepike
items/firepike.description: This pike of Pyre is eternally lit. Has a very high chance of causing an opponent to burn.

items/firestone.name: Firestone
items/firestone.description: A rare piece of firestone. Useful for crafting and upgrading magical weapons or armor.

items/first-horsemans-armor.name: First Horseman's Armor
items/first-horsemans-armor.description: Armor of the First Horseman, often associated with great famine. It reduces the damage taken from the ultimate attacks of Raid Bosses.

items/first-horsemans-boots.name: First Horseman's Boots

items/fishing-hat.description: A simple hat, suitable for an angler. It will increase your luck while fishing.

items/fishing-line.name: Fishing Line
items/fishing-line.description: A simple line, suitable for fetching aught from the seas. Use when near a body of water or fountain to begin fishing.

items/fjalar-mantle.name: Fjalar Mantle
items/fjalar-mantle.description: Crude armor made of the remains of a fjalar. Does not offer much defense, but raises your dexterity.

items/flamberge.name: Flamberge
items/flamberge.description: A large, undulating blade said to resemble that of flames.

items/flame-belt.name: Flame Belt
items/flame-belt.description: Belt of the Inferno Knights. Grants protection from fire.

items/flameguard.name: Flameguard
items/flameguard.description: A sword and shield pairing enchanted with the power of fire.

items/fluke-of-oceanus.name: Fluke of Oceanus
items/fluke-of-oceanus.description: A piece of a Titan themself. These pieces can be used to augment celestial weapons at a Titan Workshop.

items/fog-blade.name: Fog Blade
items/fog-blade.description: A foggy, mysterious blade. It may put an opponent to sleep.

items/fogstone.description: Strange, transparent material. Useful for upgrading special weapons.

items/fomor-katana.name: Fomor Katana
items/fomor-katana.description: Katana of elite Fomorian rogues. It has a good chance of causing an opponent to bleed.

items/fomor-staff.name: Fomor Staff

items/fomor-sword.name: Fomor Sword

items/fomorian-leggings.description: Leg armor worn by Fomorian warriors.

items/fomorian-robe.name: Fomorian Robe
items/fomorian-robe.description: A robe worn by Fomorian mages

items/fomorian-staff.name: Fomorian Staff
items/fomorian-staff.description: A staff of a Fomorian mage.

items/fomorian-sword.name: Fomorian Sword
items/fomorian-sword.description: A sword of a Fomorian warrior.

items/fomors-crown-2cca9537.name: Fomor's Crown
items/fomors-crown-2cca9537.description: Crown of Fomor, Cursed King of Fomoria. This item grants a number of passive abilities known to be utilized by the Fomorian houses.

items/fomors-crown-c64fb3e7.name: Fomor's Crown
items/fomors-crown-c64fb3e7.description: Crown of Fomor, Cursed King of Fomoria. This item grants a number of passive abilities known to be utilized by the Fomorian houses.

items/fomors-crown-faad302c.name: Fomor's Crown
items/fomors-crown-faad302c.description: Crown of Fomor, Cursed King of Fomoria. This item grants a number of passive abilities known to be utilized by the Fomorian houses.

items/fomors-crown.name: Fomor's Crown
items/fomors-crown.description: Crown of Fomor, Cursed King of Fomoria. This item grants a number of passive abilities known to be utilized by the Fomorian houses.

items/fragment-of-the-planets-core.name: Fragment of the Planet's Core
items/fragment-of-the-planets-core.description: A hot, red, stone. It is apparently from the planet's core, but who knows for sure.

items/freyjas-charm.name: Freyja's Charm
items/freyjas-charm.description: Amulet often carried by highly ranked Nothren warriors. Wearing this item increases the power of your follower and may cause them to act more often.

items/frilled-naga-halberd.name: Frilled Naga Halberd
items/frilled-naga-halberd.description: Crude weapon of a Frilled Naga warrior.

items/frilled-naga-staff.name: Frilled Naga Staff
items/frilled-naga-staff.description: Crude staff of a Frilled Naga mage.

items/frost-belt.name: Frost Belt
items/frost-belt.description: Belt of the Frozenguard. Grants protection from ice.

items/frosty-daggers.name: Frosty Daggers
items/frosty-daggers.description: A pair of daggers enchanted with the power of the cold.

items/fur-coat.name: Fur Coat
items/fur-coat.description: Coat made of fur of a wild beast.

items/furious-bull.name: Furious Bull
items/furious-bull.description: The powerful, fiery axe of Cerus, the untamed bull. It has a good chance of stunning or burning an opponent.

items/furious-bulls-eye.name: Furious Bull's Eye
items/furious-bulls-eye.description: A celestial adornment capable of increasing many attributes of a piece of equipment when adorned upon it.

items/furious-cuirass.name: Furious Cuirass
items/furious-cuirass.description: Armor of Cerus, the raging bull. It reduces the mana cost of skills or spells and is well suited for adornment.

items/furious-helmet.name: Furious Helmet
items/furious-helmet.description: Helmet of Cerus, the raging bull. It reduces the mana cost of skills or spells and is well suited for adornment.

items/gadget.name: Gadget
items/gadget.description: One of the concoctions of Cade, the great inventor. This gadget prevents one from having their defense lowered.

items/gaia-robe.name: Gaia Robe
items/gaia-robe.description: Adorned robe of an infamous Gaia of the Earthen Legion.

items/galars-hammer.name: Galar's Hammer
items/galars-hammer.description: A fine hammer used by Galar. Using this item before upgrading equipment at the blacksmith will reduce the time needed to complete the upgrades.

items/gales-spear.name: Gale's Spear
items/gales-spear.description: Spear of Gale, the Stormforce elite. It has a high chance of paralyzing an opponent.

items/gamma-myrddin-cloak.name: Gamma Myrddin Cloak
items/gamma-myrddin-cloak.description: One of the notoriously recognizable robes of Merlin, the famed Avalon sorcerer. It can protect its wearer from having their resistance lowered.

items/gamma-myrddin-cowl.name: Gamma Myrddin Cowl
items/gamma-myrddin-cowl.description: One of the notoriously recognizable hoods of Merlin, the famed Avalon sorcerer.

items/gamma-myrddin-hood.name: Gamma Myrddin Hood
items/gamma-myrddin-hood.description: One of the notoriously recognizable hoods of Merlin, the famed Avalon sorcerer.

items/gamma-myrddin-robe.name: Gamma Myrddin Robe
items/gamma-myrddin-robe.description: One of the notoriously recognizable robes of Merlin, the famed Avalon sorcerer. It can protect its wearer from having their resistance lowered.

items/gamma-myrddin-shield.name: Gamma Myrddin Shield
items/gamma-myrddin-shield.description: A relic of Merlin's eccentric collection.

items/gamma-myrddin.name: Gamma Myrddin
items/gamma-myrddin.description: One of the notoriously recognizable archistaves of Merlin, the famed Avalon sorcerer. Spells cast by this staff can occasionally lower an opponent's defenses.

items/gamma-olympia-archistaff.name: Gamma Olympia Archistaff
items/gamma-olympia-archistaff.description: Rare weapon, fallen from an Olympian.

items/gamma-olympia-boots.name: Gamma Olympia Boots
items/gamma-olympia-boots.description: Light armor, reminiscent of an Olympian rogue. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

items/gamma-olympia-cowl.name: Gamma Olympia Cowl
items/gamma-olympia-cowl.description: Light armor, reminiscent of an Olympian rogue. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

items/gamma-olympia-cuirass.name: Gamma Olympia Cuirass
items/gamma-olympia-cuirass.description: Heavy armor, reminiscent of an Olympian warrior. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

items/gamma-olympia-garb.name: Gamma Olympia Garb
items/gamma-olympia-garb.description: Light armor, reminiscent of an Olympian rogue. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

items/gamma-olympia-greaves.name: Gamma Olympia Greaves
items/gamma-olympia-greaves.description: Heavy armor, reminiscent of an Olympian warrior. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

items/gamma-olympia-helmet.name: Gamma Olympia Helmet
items/gamma-olympia-helmet.description: Heavy armor, reminiscent of an Olympian warrior. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

items/gamma-olympia-hood.name: Gamma Olympia Hood
items/gamma-olympia-hood.description: Magical clothing, reminiscent of an Olympian magician. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

items/gamma-olympia-shoes.name: Gamma Olympia Shoes
items/gamma-olympia-shoes.description: Magical clothing, reminiscent of an Olympian magician. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

items/gamma-olympia-vestment.name: Gamma Olympia Vestment
items/gamma-olympia-vestment.description: Magical clothing, reminiscent of an Olympian magician. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

items/gamma-olympia-warbow.name: Gamma Olympia Warbow
items/gamma-olympia-warbow.description: Rare weapon, fallen from an Olympian.

items/gamma-olympia-warsword.name: Gamma Olympia Warsword
items/gamma-olympia-warsword.description: Rare weapon, fallen from an Olympian.

items/gandring.name: Gandring
items/gandring.description: Deals arcane damage and may cause curse.

items/gargouilles-dagger.name: Gargouille's Dagger
items/gargouilles-dagger.description: A dagger, once a fixture upon a noble statue. It has a small chance of petrifying an opponent.

items/gauntlet-key.name: Gauntlet Key
items/gauntlet-key.description: One can use this key to enter a Gauntlet.

items/gazing-staff.name: Gazing Staff
items/gazing-staff.description: A powerful staff adorned with a crystal eye. Increases your ability to see.

items/genius.name: Genius
items/genius.description: The easily recognizable pole-arm of Cade, the great Avalonian inventor. Its hidden features can cause a variety of status effects.

items/gizmo.name: Gizmo
items/gizmo.description: One of the concoctions of Cade, the great inventor. This gizmo prevents one from having their physical or magical prowess lowered.

items/glacial-staff.name: Glacial Staff
items/glacial-staff.description: A staff of the Frozenguard that is eternally frozen.

items/gladiators-shotel.name: Gladiator's Shotel
items/gladiators-shotel.description: A shotel carried by a cunning gladiator. Shotels can easily pierce through an opponent's defenses.

items/gladiators-sword.name: Gladiator's Sword
items/gladiators-sword.description: A sword carried by a talented gladiator. Through its might, an opponent's stats can be lowered.

items/glaive.name: Glaive
items/glaive.description: A curved blade fashioned upon an extended shaft of wood.

items/globe-holder.name: Globe Holder
items/globe-holder.description: Take the stance of Atlas, disabling your ability to use Ward, but locking it in place.

items/gobannos-heavy-boots.name: Gobannos' Heavy Boots
items/gobannos-heavy-boots.description: Large boots of Gobannos, smith God of the Fomorian house of Sumner. Gobannos constructed the crops' heavy gates and fences, ultimately containing Fomoria's curse within. While wearing this item, skills that target multiple opponents will deal additional damage. Additionally, skills will seldomly hit more than one opponent.

items/goblin-lords-staff.name: Goblin Lord's Staff
items/goblin-lords-staff.description: The staff of the Goblin Lord. It slightly boosts its wielder's mana.

items/goibhniu-armguard.name: Goibhniu Armguard
items/goibhniu-armguard.description: Armguard of Goibhniu, warrior smith God of the Fomorian house of Sumner. Goibhniu crafted the house's mighty swords, hammers, and axes. While wearing this item, skills that target multiple opponents will deal additional damage. Additionally, skills will seldomly hit more than one opponent.

items/gold-pinion.name: Gold Pinion
items/gold-pinion.description: A feather pulled from the remains of a cursed Cockatrice. It grants additional physical defense at the expense of attack power.

items/golden-crystal.name: Golden Crystal
items/golden-crystal.description: Golden crystal of the sun. Increases physical prowess at the expense of magical ability.

items/gradlons-archistaff.name: Gradlon's Archistaff
items/gradlons-archistaff.description: Deals holy damage, recovers Ward, and recovers a percentage of damage dealt. An opponent may also be blinded from the light.

items/grand-armor.name: Grand Armor
items/grand-armor.description: Armor fit for a court's guard.

items/grand-attuning-hood.name: Grand Attuning Hood
items/grand-attuning-hood.description: Hood worn by novice summoners. It slightly increases the power of summoned beasts.

items/grand-attuning-robe.name: Grand Attuning Robe
items/grand-attuning-robe.description: Robe worn by novice summoners. It increases the chance of a summon protecting you in battle.

items/grand-attuning-shoes.name: Grand Attuning Shoes
items/grand-attuning-shoes.description: Shoes worn by novice summoners. They slightly increase the power of summoned beasts.

items/grand-helmet.name: Grand Helmet
items/grand-helmet.description: A helmet fit for a court's guard.

items/grand-leggings.name: Grand Leggings
items/grand-leggings.description: Leg armor fit for a court's guard.

items/grand-summoners-hood.name: Grand Summoner's Hood
items/grand-summoners-hood.description: Hood worn by advanced summoners. When wearing this hood, using pacts with your summons will be more effective.

items/grand-summoners-robe.name: Grand Summoner's Robe
items/grand-summoners-robe.description: Robe worn by advanced summoners. It increases the chance of a summon protecting you in battle.

items/grand-summoners-shoes.name: Grand Summoner's Shoes
items/grand-summoners-shoes.description: Shoes worn by advanced summoners. They slightly increase the power of summoned beasts.

items/grand-sword.name: Grand Sword
items/grand-sword.description: A broad sword fit for a court's guard.

items/great-antlers.name: Great Antlers
items/great-antlers.description: This unique headwear does not offer much protection, but is well suited for adornment.

items/great-bearskin.name: Great Bearskin
items/great-bearskin.description: Protective armor made of the hide of a great bear.

items/great-empty-bottle.name: Great Empty Bottle
items/great-empty-bottle.description: A large bottle suitable for holding a brewed potion, tonic, or elixir. Visit a herbalist to fill this bottle.

items/great-fishing-hat.name: Great Fishing Hat
items/great-fishing-hat.description: A simple hat, suitable for an angler. It will increase your luck while fishing.

items/great-fishing-line.name: Great Fishing Line
items/great-fishing-line.description: A very strong fishing line, suitable for fetching aught from the seas. Use when near a body of water or fountain to begin fishing.

items/great-jinn-staff.name: Great Jinn Staff
items/great-jinn-staff.description: Magical staff of a great Jinn. This weapon may cause unexpected status effects.

items/great-mimic-head.name: Great Mimic Head
items/great-mimic-head.description: Head of a mimic. When wearing it, you may find more gold or items.

items/great-monster-remains.name: Great Monster Remains
items/great-monster-remains.description: Fragrant remains of a fallen monster. Attracts a boss to your location when used. Bosses summoned with this item will give slightly less rewards than those found in the world.

items/great-monster-tome.name: Great Monster Tome
items/great-monster-tome.description: A large tome of monster knowledge. Increases experience earned.

items/great-orcish-axe.name: Great Orcish Axe
items/great-orcish-axe.description: Blunt axe of a great Orcish warrior.

items/great-orcish-blade.name: Great Orcish Blade
items/great-orcish-blade.description: Blunt blade of a great Orcish warrior.

items/great-phoenician-boots.name: Great Phoenician Boots
items/great-phoenician-boots.description: Footwear of a worshipper of the mighty Phoenix.

items/great-phoenician-cowl.name: Great Phoenician Cowl
items/great-phoenician-cowl.description: Headwear of a worshipper of the mighty Phoenix.

items/great-phoenician-cuirass.name: Great Phoenician Cuirass
items/great-phoenician-cuirass.description: Heavy armor of a worshipper of the mighty Phoenix.

items/great-phoenician-garb.name: Great Phoenician Garb
items/great-phoenician-garb.description: Light armor of a worshipper of the mighty Phoenix.

items/great-phoenician-greaves.name: Great Phoenician Greaves
items/great-phoenician-greaves.description: Heavy leg armor of a worshipper of the mighty Phoenix.

items/great-phoenician-helmet.name: Great Phoenician Helmet
items/great-phoenician-helmet.description: Helmet of a worshipper of the mighty Phoenix.

items/great-phoenician-hood.name: Great Phoenician Hood
items/great-phoenician-hood.description: Hood of a worshipper of the mighty Phoenix.

items/great-phoenician-robe.name: Great Phoenician Robe
items/great-phoenician-robe.description: Robe of a worshipper of the mighty Phoenix.

items/great-phoenician-shield.name: Great Phoenician Shield
items/great-phoenician-shield.description: Decorated shield of a worshipper of the mighty Phoenix. It protects one from being blinded or lit ablaze.

items/great-phoenician-shoes.name: Great Phoenician Shoes
items/great-phoenician-shoes.description: Footwear of a worshipper of the mighty Phoenix.

items/great-phoenixsong.name: Great Phoenixsong
items/great-phoenixsong.description: A decorated flute often used to lull the great Phoenix. Although it seemingly has little power, it is well suited for adornment.

items/great-staff.name: Great Staff
items/great-staff.description: A staff favored by archmages of older times.

items/greatbow.name: Greatbow
items/greatbow.description: Large bow often carried by rangers of the wood.

items/greater-attack-tonic.name: Greater Attack Tonic
items/greater-attack-tonic.description: A sour tonic that raises your attack in battle.

items/greater-bulls-eye.name: Greater Bull's Eye
items/greater-bulls-eye.description: A celestial adornment capable of increasing many attributes of a piece of equipment when adorned upon it.

items/greater-magic-tonic.name: Greater Magic Tonic
items/greater-magic-tonic.description: A sour tonic that raises your magic in battle.

items/greater-soul.name: Greater Soul
items/greater-soul.description: Soul of a great felled gladiator. Useful in upgrading rarer weapons and equipment.

items/greater-wisp-staff.name: Greater Wisp Staff
items/greater-wisp-staff.description: Staff imbued with the power of a wisp.

items/greatsword.name: Greatsword
items/greatsword.description: An extremely heavy sword, that must be wielded with all your might.

items/green-crystal.name: Green Crystal
items/green-crystal.description: An odd green crystal. Boosts magic power when equipped.

items/green-eye-of-kerberos.name: Green Eye of Kerberos
items/green-eye-of-kerberos.description: Crystallized eye of the Kerberos. It grants a high chance to cause an opponent to rot.

items/green-feather.name: Green Feather
items/green-feather.description: The feather of a Buzzard. It can grant a piece of armor additional dexterity when adorned upon it.

items/green-gem.name: Green Gem
items/green-gem.description: An odd green gem. Raises magic power when equipped.

items/griffin-crested-shield.name: Griffin Crested Shield
items/griffin-crested-shield.description: A shield crested with the image of a Griffin. It protects one against Dragon attacks while boosting Ward.

items/grioarvolr.name: Grioarvolr
items/grioarvolr.description: A staff that brings down giants. It may break an opponents magical defenses.

items/gungnir.name: Gungnir
items/gungnir.description: Attack with your weapon extended, dealing moderate damage but mitigating damage from your opponent's next attack.

items/halberd.name: Halberd
items/halberd.description: An axe blade atop a long pole. Useful for keeping distance while striking.

items/hallowed-blade.name: Hallowed Blade
items/hallowed-blade.description: Attack with both hands gripped tightly, dealing paltry to immense damage. Requires 2 turns in battle.

items/hallowed-candle.name: Hallowed Candle
items/hallowed-candle.description: When lit, this mysterious candle draws stronger enemies to you for a limited time. Monsters defeated with this candle lit also give more experience.

items/hallowed-monster-tome.name: Hallowed Monster Tome
items/hallowed-monster-tome.description: A large tome of monster knowledge. Increases experience earned.

items/hallowed-witchs-hat.name: Hallowed Witch's Hat
items/hallowed-witchs-hat.description: The symbolic headwear of a nameless witch. It can protect one from status effects caused by the four basic elements.

items/hammer.name: Hammer
items/hammer.description: A large hammer suitable for crushing blows.

items/handy-waystone.name: Handy Waystone
items/handy-waystone.description: A stone imbued with the most helpful of magic. Use it to set a compass marker to inn quest monster locations.

items/hard-leather-armor.name: Hard Leather Armor
items/hard-leather-armor.description: Light armor reinforced with hardened leather. Offers fair protection from the elements.

items/hard-leather-boots.name: Hard Leather Boots
items/hard-leather-boots.description: Sturdy leather boots. Offers extra protection.

items/hardened-steel.name: Hardened Steel
items/hardened-steel.description: Steel, yet seemingly more durable than usual. Useful in upgrading stronger weapons.

items/hardwood-lute.name: Hardwood Lute
items/hardwood-lute.description: A talented bard's lute, playing it in battle may temporarily boost one's defenses.

items/harpys-feathers.name: Harpy's Feathers
items/harpys-feathers.description: Crude armor made of the remains of a harpy. Does not offer much defense, but raises your dexterity.

items/heart-of-eos.name: Heart of Eos
items/heart-of-eos.description:
The Olympians constructed many great Titans to construct their towers to the skies. Few titans remain animated today.

Titan Eos drove a mighty chariot powered by her mighty horses, the Phaethons. She searched the continents for tower materials, never having difficulty delivering them home.

This piece will increase the power of your summons.

items/heart-of-oceanus.name: Heart of Oceanus
items/heart-of-oceanus.description:
The Olympians constructed many great Titans to construct their towers to the skies. Few titans remain animated today.

Oceanus raised the great seas; crashing waves against the towers to test their might. He cooled the artifacts of Prometheus's Kiln, and forced the tower pieces into place with great tidal force.

This augment allows one to break the maximum damage limit.

items/heart-of-prometheus.name: Heart of Prometheus
items/heart-of-prometheus.description:
The Olympians constructed many great Titans to construct their towers to the skies. Few titans remain animated today.

Titan Prometheus operated a great kiln, molding stone, steel, and ortanite needed by the Titans into great pieces of the great towers. Ultimately, it is said his synthetic flesh became a kiln in itself.

This piece increases one's resistance to status effects.

items/heart-of-selene.name: Heart of Selene
items/heart-of-selene.description:
The Olympians constructed many great Titans to construct their towers to the skies. Few titans remain animated today.

Titan Selene had a certain way with the wildlife surrounding the towers. With the help of the birds, the trees, the hunters, and the prey -- she never felt deficient of help.

This piece will allow your follower to make more intelligent decisions in battle.

items/heart-of-themis.name: Heart of Themis
items/heart-of-themis.description:
The Olympians constructed many great Titans to construct their towers to the skies. Few titans remain animated today.

Titan Themis, of law and order, balanced the tower planes into place with her shoulders. A plane mustn't lean down to Balor, nor up to skies. A level floor bequeaths the next level floor.

This piece allows one to recover both HP and Mana when taking Ward damage.

items/heavy-arrows.name: Heavy Arrows
items/heavy-arrows.description: Deals damage thrice, grants 2 turns of Ward, and may temporarily increase dexterity.

items/heavy-boots.name: Heavy Boots
items/heavy-boots.description: Heavy boots, made to endure most weather conditions.

items/heimdalls-shield.name: Heimdall's Shield
items/heimdalls-shield.description: Grants temporary defenses and grants Ward for 4 turns.

items/helhest.name: Helhest
items/helhest.description: The mighty bow of Hel. Its loosed arrows will light your path while exploring the world.

items/hellfire-armor.name: Hellfire Armor
items/hellfire-armor.description: Chapter II: Steadfast and diligent, the Tatzelwurms worked tirelessly to level Lotan's coiled rock. Wearing this armor will improve the relationship between followers and Valhallan classes, allowing them a greater chance to choose the right action for your situation.

items/hellfire-boots.name: Hellfire Boots
items/hellfire-boots.description: Chapter II: Steadfast and diligent, the Tatzelwurms worked tirelessly to level Lotan's coiled rock. Wearing this armor will improve the relationship between followers and Valhallan classes, allowing them a greater chance to choose the right action for your situation.

Wearing this armor will improve the relationship between followers and Valhallan classes, allowing them a greater chance to choose the right action for your situation.

items/hels-boots.name: Hel's Boots
items/hels-boots.description: Footwear of Hel, the shadowed rogue. They grant their wearer additional dexterity and are well suited for adornment.

items/hels-feathers.name: Hel's Feathers
items/hels-feathers.description: Deals damage thrice, grants 2 turns of Ward, and may temporarily increase dexterity.

items/hels-garb.name: Hel's Garb
items/hels-garb.description: Light armor of Hel, the shadowed rogue. It grants its wearer additional dexterity and status immunities. Additionally, it is well suited for adornment.

items/hels-veil.name: Hel's Veil
items/hels-veil.description: Headwear of Hel, the shadowed rogue. Wearing it may increase one's chance of landing a critical attack.

items/heretics-jewel.name: Heretic's Jewel
items/heretics-jewel.description: An adornment of the blasphemous. When adorned upon a weapon, it grants the chance to inflict damage to an opponent's magical resistance.

items/heretics-robe.name: Heretic's Robe
items/heretics-robe.description: A decorated robe often worn by the Heretics. It grants additional magic power, but spells cast will consume more mana.

items/hermes-coin-purse.name: Hermes' Coin Purse
items/hermes-coin-purse.description: A bag for coins, carried by Hermes the merchant. Slightly raises gold earned.

items/hide.name: Hide
items/hide.description: A small scrap of animal hide. Useful for crafting and upgrading weapons or armor.

items/high-draconian-cowl.name: High Draconian Cowl
items/high-draconian-cowl.description: A cowl of a Draconian rogue.

items/high-draconian-garb.name: High Draconian Garb

items/horned-helmet.description: Helmet of Cerus, the untamed. It reduces the mana cost of skills or spells and is well suited for adornment.

items/horned-hood.description: Hood of Cerus, the untamed. It reduces the mana cost of skills or spells and is well suited for adornment.

items/horror.description: An incredibly dreadful staff forged of the remains of sunken travelers. It may cause fallen beasts to drop more items.

items/horuss-robe.description: Ivory robe of Horus, the winged protector of the skies. What it lacks in defensive power is made up with dexterity.

items/ichaival.description: Bow of the underworld. It has a good chance of breaking an opponents defenses.

items/ichor.description: A restorative elixir that removes any stat lowering ailments against you.

items/ifrits-feet.name: Ifrit's Feet

items/imagination.name: Imagination

items/immortal-boots.name: Immortal Boots
items/immortal-boots.description: Boots of an Immortal warrior. The Immortals are warriors of a great fallen Empire. Their equipment can prevent one from losing their sight.

items/immortal-garb.name: Immortal Garb

items/immortal-hood.name: Immortal Hood

items/immortal-katana.name: Immortal Katana
items/immortal-katana.description: The blade of an ageless warrior. It may pierce the defenses of an opponent.

items/imonas-slippers.name: Imona's Slippers
items/imonas-slippers.description: Soft slippers of Imona, waking Goddess of the Fomorian house of Wintara. Imona was blessed with the fortune of a life of unneeded sleep. While wearing this item, buffs cast by its wearer may transfer to a party mate. Additionally, positive status effects will last longer.

items/incarnate-archistaff.name: Incarnate Archistaff
items/incarnate-archistaff.description: Heavy archistaff crafted by Apollyon, the destructive exiled Balor mystic. Apollyon sought to destroy lands to stop the falling, but was exiled for his unorthodox approaches.

items/incarnate-boots.name: Incarnate Boots
items/incarnate-boots.description: Mystical boots crafted by Apollyon, the destructive exiled Balor mystic. Apollyon sought to destroy lands to stop the falling, but was exiled for his unorthodox approaches.

items/incarnate-hood.description: Mystical hood crafted by Apollyon, the destructive exiled Balor mystic. Apollyon sought to destroy lands to stop the falling, but was exiled for his unorthodox approaches.

items/incarnate-robe.name: Incarnate Robe
items/incarnate-robe.description: Mystical robe crafted by Apollyon, the destructive exiled Balor mystic. Apollyon sought to destroy lands to stop the falling, but was exiled for his unorthodox approaches.

items/infernal-boots.name: Infernal Boots

While wearing this item, buffs cast by its wearer may transfer to a party mate. Additionally, positive status effects will last longer.

items/lifeshaker.description: A terribly frightening axe, seemingly forged with the hardened bones of an odok undead. It has a great chance of stunning an opponent.

items/liver-of-prometheus.description: A piece of a Titan themself. These pieces can be used to augment celestial weapons at a Titan Workshop. This piece allows one to recover more HP and mana when using curatives.

items/ljosalfar-garb.description: Light armor of a Ljosalfar warrior.

items/ljosalfar-sceptre.description: An extremely versatile magical Ljosalfar sceptre. Can be used as either a magic staff or weapon.

items/ljosalfar-staff.description: Great staff of a Ljosalfar mage.

items/lucky-silver-coin.name: Lucky Silver Coin
items/lucky-silver-coin.description: A shiny, lucky, silver coin. Boosts orns earned for a period of time.

items/lugus-gauntlet.name: Lugus Gauntlet
items/lugus-gauntlet.description: Gauntlet of the Balor knight Lugus. Wearing it will provide a chance to greatly increase your offensive power.

items/lunar-boots.name: Lunar Boots
items/lunar-boots.description: Azure light armor crafted of titanium.

items/lunar-dagger.name: Lunar Dagger
items/lunar-dagger.description: An azure dagger crafted of hard titanium.

items/lunar-garb.name: Lunar Garb
items/lunar-garb.description: Azure light armor crafted of titanium.

items/lunar-helmet.name: Lunar Helmet
items/lunar-helmet.description: Azure light armor crafted of titanium.
