items/lyonesse-cowl.name: Lyonesse Cowl
items/lyonesse-cowl.description: Light armor of a Lyonesse assassin.

items/lyonesse-crown.name: Lyonesse Crown
items/lyonesse-crown.description: The famed Crown of King Gradlon. Gradlon left Avalon to form the kingdom of Lyonesse a century ago. It is rumored that Lyonesse still stands, without their beloved King.

items/lyonesse-garb.name: Lyonesse Garb
items/lyonesse-garb.description: Light armor of a Lyonesse assassin.

items/lyonesse-greaves.name: Lyonesse Greaves
items/lyonesse-greaves.description: Leg armor of a Lyonesse knight.

items/lyonite.name: Lyonite
items/lyonite.description: A golden ore favored in use of forging Lyonesse weapons and armor.

items/lyons-penance.name: Lyon's Penance
items/lyons-penance.description: An artifact capable of unmarking one from Lyonesse execution.

items/mace.name: Mace
items/mace.description: A blunt weapon suitable for heavy blows.

items/macha-boots.name: Macha Boots
items/macha-boots.description: Cursed legwear of a follower of Macha, the great witch.

items/macha-pillar.name: Macha Pillar
items/macha-pillar.description: Cursed staff of Macha, sister to Morrigan. It can grant one additional magic power while having the adverse effect on an opponent.

items/macha-robe.name: Macha Robe
items/macha-robe.description: Cursed robe of a follower of Macha, the great witch.

items/macha-veil.name: Macha Veil
items/macha-veil.description: Cursed headwear of a follower of Macha, the great witch.

items/macha-warstaff.name: Macha Warstaff
items/macha-warstaff.description: Cursed staff of Macha, sister to Morrigan. It can grant one additional magic power while having the adverse effect on an opponent.

items/magic-defense-tonic.name: Magic Defense Tonic
items/magic-defense-tonic.description: A sour tonic that raises your magic defense in battle.

items/magic-tonic.name: Magic Tonic
items/magic-tonic.description: A sour tonic that raises your magic in battle.

items/magicians-hood.name: Magician's Hood
items/magicians-hood.description: The hood of a student of magic.

items/magicians-robe.name: Magician's Robe
items/magicians-robe.description: A simple robe worn by students of magic.

items/magicians-shoes.name: Magician's Shoes
items/magicians-shoes.description: Simple shoes worn by students of magic.

items/mammons-teardrop.name: Mammon's Teardrop
items/mammons-teardrop.description: A relic of Mammon capable of granting a piece of equipment additional power while occasionally lowering an opponent's attack or magical power.

items/mana-bow.name: Mana Bow
items/mana-bow.description: The bow of a mystic. It slightly raises your dexterity.

items/mandrake.name: Mandrake
items/mandrake.description: A single leaf of mandrake. It is useful in crafting some potions at a herbalist.

items/maras-blessing.name: Mara's Blessing
items/maras-blessing.description: A charm imbued with Seeker Mara's magic. It will both help you see farther while increasing the life and mana healed by potions.

items/masamune.name: Masamune
items/masamune.description: A beautiful blade that resemble stars in the night sky.

items/merchants-waystone.name: Merchant's Waystone
items/merchants-waystone.description: A stone imbued with the most curious of magic. Use it to set a compass marker to the nearest shop in the world.

items/merlins-concoction.name: Merlin's Concoction
items/merlins-concoction.description: One of the rare potions of Merlin, the famed Avalon sorcerer. It grants immense, but temporarily, magical prowess.

items/merlins-ring.name: Merlin's Ring
items/merlins-ring.description: Magical ring of Merlin, the famed sorcerer of Avalon. Those who are not trained in magical arts can equip this ring to sacrifice physical strength for magic power.

items/meteor-armor.name: Meteor Armor
items/meteor-armor.description: Exquisite armor forged of meteoric solarite.

items/meteor-hammer.name: Meteor Hammer
items/meteor-hammer.description: An exquisite hammer forged of meteoric solarite.

items/meteor-helmet.name: Meteor Helmet
items/meteor-helmet.description: Exquisite armor forged of meteoric solarite.

items/meteor-leggings.name: Meteor Leggings
items/meteor-leggings.description: Exquisite armor forged of meteoric solarite.

items/midnight-eye.name: Midnight Eye
items/midnight-eye.description: A strange twilight eye imbued with even stranger magic. Keeping this in your hand will grant you more visibility at night while boosting HP and mana.

items/might.name: Might
items/might.description: Grants temporary defenses and grants Ward for 4 turns.

items/mightiest-mimic-head.name: Mightiest Mimic Head
items/mightiest-mimic-head.description: Head of a mimic. When wearing it, you may find more items, gold, orns, and experience.

items/mighty-ensemble.name: Mighty Ensemble
items/mighty-ensemble.description: Grants temporary defenses and grants Ward for 5 turns.

items/mighty-fishing-line.name: Mighty Fishing Line
items/mighty-fishing-line.description: A very strong fishing line, suitable for fetching aught from the seas. Use when near a body of water or fountain to begin fishing.

items/mighty-griffin-shield.name: Mighty Griffin Shield
items/mighty-griffin-shield.description: Grants temporary defenses and grants Ward for 5 turns.

items/mighty-hands-of-themis.name: Mighty Hands of Themis
items/mighty-hands-of-themis.description: A piece of a Titan themself. These pieces can be used to augment celestial weapons at a Titan Workshop.

items/mighty-mimic-head.name: Mighty Mimic Head
items/mighty-mimic-head.description: Head of a mimic. When wearing it, you may find more items, gold, orns, and experience.

items/mighty-tempest.name: Mighty Tempest
items/mighty-tempest.description: A bow signifying the great Griffin of the skies. Arrows shot from this bow can easily knock an opponent off-guard.

items/mimic-head.name: Mimic Head
items/mimic-head.description: Head of a mimic. When wearing it, you may find more gold or items.

items/mimic-king-head.name: Mimic King Head
items/mimic-king-head.description: Head of a mimic. When wearing it, you may find more gold or orns.

items/mimic-king-of-kings-head.name: Mimic King of Kings Head
items/mimic-king-of-kings-head.description: Head of a mimic. When wearing it, you may find more gold or orns.

items/minotaur-axe.name: Minotaur Axe
items/minotaur-axe.description: A large, crushing axe used by a minotaur.

items/mirror.name: Mirror
items/mirror.description: Grants a chance to return a portion of an opponent's attack back at them. Reflections are more successful when magic users attempt them.

items/monster-remains.name: Monster Remains
items/monster-remains.description: Fragrant remains of a fallen monster. Attracts a boss to your location when used. Bosses summoned with this item will give slightly less rewards than those found in the world.

items/monster-tome.name: Monster Tome
items/monster-tome.description: A tome of common monsters. Slightly boosts experience earned.

items/moon-staff.name: Moon Staff
items/moon-staff.description: An azure staff crafted of hard titanium.

items/moondust.name: Moondust
items/moondust.description: A celestial adornment capable of increasing many attributes of a piece of equipment when adorned upon it.

items/morning-star.name: Morning Star
items/morning-star.description: A deadly spiked ball on a chain.

items/mullos-blinders.name: Mullo's Blinders
items/mullos-blinders.description: Blinders often used by Mullo, horse God of the Fomorian house of Nocturna. Mullo, of three siblings, spent his days taming wild horses. While wearing this item, you will tame your opponent's followers and summons, causing them to deal less damage to you.

items/myrddin-harp.name: Myrddin Harp
items/myrddin-harp.description: Harp found in Merlin's eccentric collection. It can grant elemental protection.

items/myrkheim-hammer.name: Myrkheim Hammer
items/myrkheim-hammer.description: A fine hammer used by the skilled smiths of Myrkheim. Using this item before upgrading equipment at the blacksmith will greatly reduce the time needed to complete the upgrades.

items/mystic-katar.name: Mystic Katar
items/mystic-katar.description: Grants a chance to return a portion of an opponent's attack back at them. Counterattacks are favorable to win in PvP draws.

items/mystics-ring.name: Mystic's Ring
items/mystics-ring.description: A strange magical ring. Those who do not possess physical strength can equip this ring to sacrifice magic for attack power.

items/mythril-amulet.name: Mythril Amulet
items/mythril-amulet.description: A rare amulet made of mythril. Raises attack power.

items/mythril-armor.name: Mythril Armor
items/mythril-armor.description: Silver armor that is quite protective.

items/mythril-bow.name: Mythril Bow
items/mythril-bow.description: A sturdy bow forged with mythril.

items/mythril-dagger.name: Mythril Dagger
items/mythril-dagger.description: A fine dagger forged of mythril.

items/mythril-hammer.name: Mythril Hammer
items/mythril-hammer.description: A large hammer made of mythril.

items/mythril-helmet.name: Mythril Helmet
items/mythril-helmet.description: Silver armor that is quite protective.

items/mythril-leggings.name: Mythril Leggings
items/mythril-leggings.description: Silver armor that is quite protective.

items/mythril-ring.name: Mythril Ring
items/mythril-ring.description: A ring made of mythril. Raises defense when worn.

items/mythril-sword.name: Mythril Sword
items/mythril-sword.description: A fine sword forged of mythril.

items/mythril.name: Mythril
items/mythril.description: A small piece of mythril ore. Useful for crafting and upgrading weapons or armor.

items/naga-halberd.name: Naga Halberd
items/naga-halberd.description: Crude weapon of a Naga warrior.

items/naga-staff.name: Naga Staff
items/naga-staff.description: Crude staff of a Naga mage.

items/nagamaki.name: Nagamaki
items/nagamaki.description: Deals extra damage and may cause bleeding.

items/naggeneens-belt.name: Naggeneen's Belt
items/naggeneens-belt.description: Belt of the mischievous clurichaun, Naggeneen. It will slightly protect one from status effects while making it easier to apply status effects to your opponents.

items/naggeneens-brew.name: Naggeneen's Brew
items/naggeneens-brew.description: A incredibly foul drink concocted by Naggeneen. It heavily poisons its consumer, but raises some stats.

items/naggeneens-hat.name: Naggeneen's Hat
items/naggeneens-hat.description: Headwear of the mischievous clurichaun, Naggeneen. It protects its wearer from both poison and toxicity.

items/naggeneens-song.name: Naggeneen's Song
items/naggeneens-song.description: Unkept instrument carried by the filthy Naggeneen.

items/nekromancers-staff.name: Nekromancer's Staff
items/nekromancers-staff.description: A staff often used in forbidden magic. It slightly increases the power of summons and pacts with your summons.

items/neman-cuirass.name: Neman Cuirass
items/neman-cuirass.description: Cursed heavy armor of a follower of Neman, the great witch.

items/neman-greaves.name: Neman Greaves
items/neman-greaves.description: Cursed legwear of a follower of Neman, the great witch.

items/neman-havoc.name: Neman Havoc
items/neman-havoc.description: Cursed greatsword of Neman, sister to Morrigan. It can grant one additional attack power while having the adverse effect on an opponent.

items/neman-helmet.name: Neman Helmet
items/neman-helmet.description: Cursed headwear of a follower of Neman, the great witch.

items/neman-warsword.name: Neman Warsword
items/neman-warsword.description: Cursed greatsword of Neman, sister to Morrigan. It can grant one additional attack power while having the adverse effect on an opponent.

items/nemans-protection.name: Neman's Protection
items/nemans-protection.description: Cursed shield of a follower of Neman, the great witch. It offers protection from being put to sleep.

items/nightbreak-71e7e93d.name: Nightbreak
items/nightbreak-71e7e93d.description: A powerful dark archistaff of unknown royalty. It grants one immunity from blindness and falling asleep in battle.

items/nightbreak-9492da49.name: Nightbreak
items/nightbreak-9492da49.description: A powerful dark sword of unknown royalty. It grants one immunity from blindness and falling asleep in battle.

items/nightbreak.name: Nightbreak
items/nightbreak.description: A powerful dark greatbow of unknown royalty. It grants one immunity from blindness and falling asleep in battle.

items/nightshade.name: Nightshade
items/nightshade.description: A stalk of nightshade. It is useful in crafting some potions at a herbalist.

items/nightstone.name: Nightstone
items/nightstone.description: A hard stone that resembles the night sky.

items/niskus-boots.name: Niskus' Boots
items/niskus-boots.description: Boots of Niskus, river God of the Fomorian house of Autumna. Niskus was untrusted to the bitter end, ultimately being the traitor to poison Fomoria's crops, spreading curse from within. While wearing this item, debuffs will be easier to cast on your opponent. Additionally, it increases the maximum damage of status effects on your opponent.

items/nocturna-crested-shield.name: Nocturna Crested Shield
items/nocturna-crested-shield.description: Shield of Fomor, Cursed King of Fomoria. This item grants a number of passive abilities known to be utilized by the Fomorian houses.

items/nolans-staff.name: Nolan's Staff
items/nolans-staff.description: Staff o' the Gnome Master, Nolan. 'Ave one 'ver seen such a wonder? Spells cast o' this staff'll miss less often.

items/north-star.name: North Star
items/north-star.description: Converts half of your available mana into damage against an opponent.

items/nostrum.name: Nostrum
items/nostrum.description: Some say the Cure-all is a bit of snake oil. This concoction aims to cure its drinker of many ailments.

items/nothren-shield.name: Nothren Shield
items/nothren-shield.description: Shield carried by berserkers of the Northern lands. It protects one from the cold.

items/nu-olympia-archistaff.name: Nu Olympia Archistaff
items/nu-olympia-archistaff.description: Rare weapon, fallen from an Olympian.

items/nu-olympia-boots.name: Nu Olympia Boots
items/nu-olympia-boots.description: Light armor, reminiscent of an Olympian rogue. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

items/nu-olympia-cowl.description: Light armor, reminiscent of an Olympian rogue. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

items/nu-olympia-shoes.description: Magical clothing, reminiscent of an Olympian magician. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

items/occult-candle.description: A mysterious candle that draws more enemies to you for a limited time when lit.

items/oceanic-boots.name: Oceanic Boots
items/oceanic-boots.description: Great boots of a mage who controlled the tides. Grants protection from water & ice.

items/ogmios-satin-robe.name: Ogmios' Satin Robe
items/ogmios-satin-robe.description: Soft robe of Ogmios, eloquence God of the Fomorian house of Wintara. Ogmios, mentor to Lero, wasn't much for a fight and quickly vanished during Morrigan's invasion. While wearing this item, buffs cast by its wearer may transfer to a party mate. Additionally, positive status effects will last longer.

items/ogre-axe.name: Ogre Axe
items/ogre-axe.description: A crude axe of an ogre.

items/oisin-crown.name: Oisin Crown
items/oisin-crown.description: This unique headwear does not offer much protection, but is well suited for adornment.

items/old-hallowed-blade.name: Old Hallowed Blade
items/old-hallowed-blade.description: Attack with both hands gripped tightly, dealing paltry to immense damage. Requires 2 turns in battle.

items/old-mace.name: Old Mace
items/old-mace.description: A blunt weapon suitable for heavy blows.

items/old-nothren-crown.name: Old Nothren Crown

items/old-olympia-armor.name: Old Olympia Armor

items/old-olympia-headdress.description: Old and worn Olympia attire, found in the crater of a Titan's fall. Ophion's influence will give additional power to both your follower, or the minions you summon.

items/old-olympia-shoes.name: Old Olympia Shoes

items/old-spear.name: Old Spear
items/old-spear.description: A blade fashioned upon an extended shaft of wood.

items/olympia-mnemonic.name: Olympia Mnemonic
items/olympia-mnemonic.description: Bundled, distorted memories of the Titans of Olympia crafted by Pythia. Using it will restore a Titan from fragmented memories, granting you a follower.

items/olympia-tower-key.name: Olympia Tower Key
items/olympia-tower-key.description: To ascend a tower of Olympia, we must first open the door.

items/olympian-tower-joist.name: Olympian Tower Joist
items/olympian-tower-joist.description: Take the stance of Asteria, increasing your magic power but losing a great amount of defenses. Additionally, mana will burn away each turn.

items/omega-myrddin-cloak.name: Omega Myrddin Cloak
items/omega-myrddin-cloak.description: One of the notoriously recognizable robes of Merlin, the famed Avalon sorcerer. It can protect its wearer from having their resistance lowered.

items/omega-myrddin-cowl.name: Omega Myrddin Cowl
items/omega-myrddin-cowl.description: One of the notoriously recognizable hoods of Merlin, the famed Avalon sorcerer.

items/omega-myrddin-shield.name: Omega Myrddin Shield
items/omega-myrddin-shield.description: A relic of Merlin's eccentric collection.

items/omega-myrddin.name: Omega Myrddin
items/omega-myrddin.description: One of the notoriously recognizable archistaves of Merlin, the famed Avalon sorcerer. Spells cast by this staff can occasionally lower an opponent's defenses.

items/omega-olympia-archistaff.description: Rare weapon, fallen from an Olympian.

items/omega-olympia-warbow.description: Rare weapon, fallen from an Olympian.

items/omega-olympia-warsword.name: Omega Olympia Warsword
items/omega-olympia-warsword.description: Rare weapon, fallen from an Olympian.

items/omega-riftlock.name: Omega Riftlock
items/omega-riftlock.description: A complete Riftlock. Riftlocks were carried by those who tended to the Rift, and grant one powers akin to those of the Judges themselves. When carried by summoners, this item will occasionally remove the casting time needed to summon beasts. Additionally, this item provides a great amount of Ward.

items/ophion-banner.name: Ophion Banner
items/ophion-banner.description: Take the stance of Ophion, potentially dispersing any status effect received to your summoned minions.

items/orange-pinion.name: Orange Pinion
items/orange-pinion.description: A fallen feather of the great Phoenix. It can grant a weapon additional attributes when adorned upon it.

items/orcish-axe.name: Orcish Axe
items/orcish-axe.description: Blunt axe of an Orcish warrior.

items/orcish-blade.name: Orcish Blade
items/orcish-blade.description: Blunt blade of an Orcish warrior.

items/orichalcum-helmet.description: A helmet made of solid orichalcum.

items/orichalcum-leggings.name: Orichalcum Leggings
items/orichalcum-leggings.description: Leg armor made of solid orichalcum.

items/orichalcum.name: Orichalcum
items/orichalcum.description: A solid chunk of orichalcum. Useful in upgrading hardened equipment.

items/ortanite-armor.name: Ortanite Armor
items/ortanite-armor.description: Armor forged of the remains of a Ortanite golem. It boasts strong physical defense at the sacrifice of magical defense.

items/ortanite-greaves.name: Ortanite Greaves
items/ortanite-greaves.description: Leg armor forged of the remains of a Ortanite golem. It boasts strong physical defense at the sacrifice of magical defense.

items/ortanite-helmet.name: Ortanite Helmet
items/ortanite-helmet.description: Helmet forged of the remains of a Ortanite golem. It boasts strong physical defense at the sacrifice of magical defense.

items/ortanite.name: Ortanite
items/ortanite.description: The great blacksmith Creidhne created this alloy to forge the most powerful of weapons.

items/oxen-axe.name: Oxen Axe
items/oxen-axe.description: Grants temporary defenses and grants Ward for 4 turns.

items/pale-armor.name: Pale Armor
items/pale-armor.description: Pale armor of elite Balor warriors.

items/pale-eye-of-kerberos.name: Pale Eye of Kerberos
items/pale-eye-of-kerberos.description: Crystallized eye of the Kerberos. It can grant a weapon additional properties when adorned upon it.

items/pale-helmet.name: Pale Helmet
items/pale-helmet.description: Pale armor of elite Balor warriors.

items/pale-leggings.name: Pale Leggings
items/pale-leggings.description: Pale armor of elite Balor warriors.

items/paleblade.name: Paleblade
items/paleblade.description: A pale blade often used by the most elite of Balor knights.

items/palm-tree-branch.name: Palm Tree Branch
items/palm-tree-branch.description: Take the stance of Aegir, greatly increasing defenses at the expense of offensive power.

items/parrying-dagger.name: Parrying Dagger
items/parrying-dagger.description: Wait one turn, then return an opponent's attack back at them.

items/perfect-baldur.name: Perfect Baldur
items/perfect-baldur.description: A perfect chunk of Baldur, favored by the raiders of Nothren. It is useful for upgrading powerful equipment.

items/perfect-fishing-line.name: Perfect Fishing Line
items/perfect-fishing-line.description: A very strong fishing line, suitable for fetching aught from the seas. Use when near a body of water or fountain to begin fishing.

items/perfect-runestone.name: Perfect Runestone
items/perfect-runestone.description: A flawless chunk of runestone. Useful for crafting and upgrading magical weapons or armor.

items/phantom-blinders.name: Phantom Blinders
items/phantom-blinders.description: Blinders often used to quell a Kelpie's restlessness. They increase dexterity and critical hit rate of those granted with extra concentration.

items/phoenician-boots.name: Phoenician Boots
items/phoenician-boots.description: Footwear of a worshipper of the mighty Phoenix.

items/phoenician-cowl.name: Phoenician Cowl
items/phoenician-cowl.description: Headwear of a worshipper of the mighty Phoenix.

items/phoenician-cuirass.name: Phoenician Cuirass
items/phoenician-cuirass.description: Heavy armor of a worshipper of the mighty Phoenix.

items/phoenician-garb.name: Phoenician Garb
items/phoenician-garb.description: Light armor of a worshipper of the mighty Phoenix.

items/phoenician-greaves.name: Phoenician Greaves
items/phoenician-greaves.description: Heavy leg armor of a worshipper of the mighty Phoenix.

items/phoenician-helmet.name: Phoenician Helmet
items/phoenician-helmet.description: Helmet of a worshipper of the mighty Phoenix.

items/phoenician-hood.name: Phoenician Hood
items/phoenician-hood.description: Hood of a worshipper of the mighty Phoenix.

items/phoenician-robe.name: Phoenician Robe
items/phoenician-robe.description: Robe of a worshipper of the mighty Phoenix.

items/phoenician-shield.name: Phoenician Shield
items/phoenician-shield.description: Decorated shield of a worshipper of the mighty Phoenix. It protects one from being blinded or lit ablaze.

items/phoenician-shoes.name: Phoenician Shoes
items/phoenician-shoes.description: Footwear of a worshipper of the mighty Phoenix.

items/phoenixsong.name: Phoenixsong
items/phoenixsong.description: A decorated flute often used to lull the great Phoenix. Although it seemingly has little power, it is well suited for adornment.

items/piece-of-string.name: Piece of String
items/piece-of-string.description: A piece of string, possibly for use in fishing. Use when near a body of water or fountain to begin fishing.

items/plagued-cuirass.name: Plagued Cuirass
items/plagued-cuirass.description: Cursed heavy armor of a follower of Morrigan, the great witch.

items/plagued-greaves.name: Plagued Greaves
items/plagued-greaves.description: Cursed legwear of a follower of Morrigan, the great witch.

items/plagued-helmet.name: Plagued Helmet
items/plagued-helmet.description: Cursed headwear of a follower of Morrigan, the great witch.

items/platinum-amulet.name: Platinum Amulet
items/platinum-amulet.description: A rare platinum amulet. Raises attack power.

items/platinum.name: Platinum
items/platinum.description: A small piece of platinum ore. Useful for crafting and upgrading weapons or armor.

items/poison-arrows.name: Poison Arrows
items/poison-arrows.description: Deals damage thrice, grants 2 turns of Ward, and may temporarily increase dexterity.

items/poison-dagger.name: Poison Dagger
items/poison-dagger.description: A simple dagger, encrusted in a thick poison.

items/polished-aegis.name: Polished Aegis
items/polished-aegis.description: A replica of Perseus's famous shield, gifted by Athena. It will protect one from petrification.

items/polished-mirror.name: Polished Mirror
items/polished-mirror.description: Grants a chance to return a portion of an opponent's attack back at them. Reflections are more successful when magic users attempt them.

items/polluxs-greataxe.name: Pollux's Greataxe
items/polluxs-greataxe.description: Azure greataxe of Pollux, the Dioscuri berserker. Pollux and his twin brother seldomly leave the depths of the seas unless truly lacking in other hobbies.

items/presents.name: Presents!
items/presents.description: Gifts for you and me. Greatly boosts the chance for monsters to drop items. Additionally, you may find extra materials from defeating monsters in the world.

items/psi-olympia-archistaff.name: Psi Olympia Archistaff
items/psi-olympia-archistaff.description: Rare weapon, fallen from an Olympian.

items/psi-olympia-boots.name: Psi Olympia Boots
items/psi-olympia-boots.description: Light armor, reminiscent of an Olympian rogue. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

items/psi-olympia-cowl.name: Psi Olympia Cowl
items/psi-olympia-cowl.description: Light armor, reminiscent of an Olympian rogue. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

items/psi-olympia-cuirass.name: Psi Olympia Cuirass
items/psi-olympia-cuirass.description: Heavy armor, reminiscent of an Olympian warrior. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

items/psi-olympia-garb.name: Psi Olympia Garb
items/psi-olympia-garb.description: Light armor, reminiscent of an Olympian rogue. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

items/psi-olympia-greaves.name: Psi Olympia Greaves
items/psi-olympia-greaves.description: Heavy armor, reminiscent of an Olympian warrior. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

items/psi-olympia-helmet.name: Psi Olympia Helmet
items/psi-olympia-helmet.description: Heavy armor, reminiscent of an Olympian warrior. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

items/psi-olympia-hood.name: Psi Olympia Hood
items/psi-olympia-hood.description: Magical clothing, reminiscent of an Olympian magician. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

items/psi-olympia-shoes.name: Psi Olympia Shoes
items/psi-olympia-shoes.description: Magical clothing, reminiscent of an Olympian magician. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

items/psi-olympia-vestment.name: Psi Olympia Vestment
items/psi-olympia-vestment.description: Magical clothing, reminiscent of an Olympian magician. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

items/psi-olympia-warbow.name: Psi Olympia Warbow
items/psi-olympia-warbow.description: Rare weapon, fallen from an Olympian.

items/psi-olympia-warsword.name: Psi Olympia Warsword
items/psi-olympia-warsword.description: Rare weapon, fallen from an Olympian.

items/pure-darkstone.name: Pure Darkstone
items/pure-darkstone.description: Pure darkstone. Useful for upgrading extremely dark weapons.

items/pure-draconite.name: Pure Draconite
items/pure-draconite.description: A rare chunk of pure draconite. Useful for crafting and upgrading magical weapons or armor.

items/pure-lightstone.name: Pure Lightstone
items/pure-lightstone.description: Rare white material used in Ljosalfar weaponry. Can be used to upgrade powerful weapons.

items/pure-waterstone.name: Pure Waterstone
items/pure-waterstone.description: A rare chunk of pure waterstone. Useful for crafting and upgrading powerful magical weapons or armor.

items/questing-axe.name: Questing Axe
items/questing-axe.description: A powerful axe forged of the remains of Glatisant, the questing beast. Wielding it will slightly increase the amount of experience, gold, and orns earned.

items/questing-bow.name: Questing Bow
items/questing-bow.description: A powerful bow forged of the remains of Glatisant, the questing beast. Wielding it will slightly increase the amount of experience, gold, and orns earned.

items/questing-license.name: Questing License
items/questing-license.description: A simple piece of parchment given to you by Samson. Using this item will temporarily improve the gold, orns, and experience earned when completing quests.

items/questing-staff.name: Questing Staff
items/questing-staff.description: A powerful staff forged of the remains of Glatisant, the questing beast. Wielding it will slightly increase the amount of experience, gold, and orns earned.

items/racul-blade.name: Racul Blade
items/racul-blade.description: An evil blade wielded by Racul, King of vampires. Attacks with this weapon can slightly restore HP.

items/raging-bull.name: Raging Bull
items/raging-bull.description: The powerful, fiery axe of Cerus, the untamed bull. It has a good chance of stunning or burning an opponent.

items/raging-bulls-eye.name: Raging Bull's Eye
items/raging-bulls-eye.description: A celestial adornment capable of increasing many attributes of a piece of equipment when adorned upon it.

items/rangers-greatbow.name: Ranger's Greatbow
items/rangers-greatbow.description: Large, precise bow often carried by rangers of the wood.

items/rapier.name: Rapier
items/rapier.description: A simple rapier, useful for sparring. It has a great chance at catching an opponent off guard.

items/ras-cane.name: Ra's Cane
items/ras-cane.description: The trusty cane of Ra, the seer. Ra was obsessed with the senses of humans after losing much of his own. This staff increases your ability to see, while potentially blinding your opponent.

items/raven-boots.name: Raven Boots
items/raven-boots.description: Cursed legwear of a follower of Morrigan, the great witch.

items/raven-garb.name: Raven Garb
items/raven-garb.description: Cursed light armor of a follower of Morrigan, the great witch.

items/raven-veil.name: Raven Veil
items/raven-veil.description: Cursed headwear of a follower of Morrigan, the great witch.

items/ravens-feathers.name: Raven's Feathers
items/ravens-feathers.description: Crude armor made of the remains of a raven. Does not offer much defense, but raises your dexterity.

items/realm-boots.name: Realm Boots
items/realm-boots.description: Light armor crafted by Apollyon, the destructive exiled Balor mystic. Apollyon sought to destroy lands to stop the falling, but was exiled for his unorthodox approaches.

items/realm-cowl.name: Realm Cowl
items/realm-cowl.description: Light armor crafted by Apollyon, the destructive exiled Balor mystic. Apollyon sought to destroy lands to stop the falling, but was exiled for his unorthodox approaches.

items/realm-garb.name: Realm Garb
items/realm-garb.description: Light armor crafted by Apollyon, the destructive exiled Balor mystic. Apollyon sought to destroy lands to stop the falling, but was exiled for his unorthodox approaches.

items/realm-katana.name: Realm Katana
items/realm-katana.description: Dark katana crafted by Apollyon, the destructive exiled Balor mystic. Apollyon sought to destroy lands to stop the falling, but was exiled for his unorthodox approaches.

items/realm-katar.name: Realm Katar
items/realm-katar.description: Grants a chance to return a portion of an opponent's attack back at them. Counterattacks are favorable to win in PvP draws.

items/realm-ore.name: Realm Ore
items/realm-ore.description: A strange dark and warm ore refined by Balor mystics. It is useful in upgrading equipment of the exiled.

items/realmcrystal.name: Realmcrystal
items/realmcrystal.description: An oddly shaped crystal fallen from Olympia. Using it will allow one to return to another Realm without wait.

items/realmspikes.name: Realmspikes
items/realmspikes.description: Lay spikes around your opponent, potentially greatly increasing damage and the chance for a critical strike.

items/reapers-robe.name: Reaper's Robe
items/reapers-robe.description: The blackened robe of Ankou, the henchman of Death. Slightly increases orns earned. It is most fitting for the most skilled of mages.

items/reapers-scythe.name: Reaper's Scythe
items/reapers-scythe.description: The followers of Ankou are fearsome, and this great scythe is their chosen weapon. It has a high chance of causing an opponent to bleed.

items/reaping-sickle.name: Reaping Sickle
items/reaping-sickle.description: The followers of Apollyon are fearsome, and this great scythe is their chosen weapon. It has a high chance of causing an opponent to bleed.

items/red-crystal.name: Red Crystal
items/red-crystal.description: An odd red crystal. Boosts HP when equipped.

items/red-dagger.name: Red Dagger
items/red-dagger.description: A small blade ideal for close quartered combat. This one in particular is imbued with fire.

items/red-draconite.name: Red Draconite
items/red-draconite.description: A chunk of fiery draconite. Useful for upgrading powerful weapons.

items/red-eye-of-kerberos.name: Red Eye of Kerberos
items/red-eye-of-kerberos.description: Crystallized eye of the Kerberos. It grants a high chance to cause an opponent to burn.

items/red-feather.name: Red Feather
items/red-feather.description: The feather of a Carrion Crow. It can grant a piece of armor additional dexterity when adorned upon it.

items/red-gem.name: Red Gem
items/red-gem.description: An odd red gem. Raises HP when equipped.

items/red-pinion.name: Red Pinion
items/red-pinion.description: A fallen feather of the great Phoenix. It can grant a piece of armor additional attributes when adorned upon it.

items/reinbow.name: Reinbow
items/reinbow.description: A great hunting bow carried by followers of Scruug. Arrows loosed from this bow will miss less often.

items/rhada-shade-greatshield.name: Rhada Shade Greatshield
items/rhada-shade-greatshield.description: Recovers Ward. Requires 2 turns in battle.

items/rhada-shade-greatsword.name: Rhada Shade Greatsword
items/rhada-shade-greatsword.description: Stomp one foot down, taking a defensive position and reducing damage for 1 turn. On the next turn, deliver a powerful strike.

items/rhada-shadow-greatshield.name: Rhada Shadow Greatshield
items/rhada-shadow-greatshield.description: Recovers Ward. Requires 2 turns in battle.

items/rhada-shadow-greatsword.name: Rhada Shadow Greatsword
items/rhada-shadow-greatsword.description: Stomp one foot down, taking a defensive position and reducing damage for 1 turn. On the next turn, deliver a powerful strike.

items/rhongomiant.name: Rhongomiant
items/rhongomiant.description: Great staff of Avalon court mages.

items/rift-summoner-boots.name: Rift Summoner Boots
items/rift-summoner-boots.description: A piece of Judge's attire worn by Charon. When standing strong with these boots, your summons will be slightly stronger.

items/rift-summoner-helmet.name: Rift Summoner Helmet
items/rift-summoner-helmet.description: A piece of Judge's attire worn by Charon. When wearing this helmet, using pacts with your summons will be more effective.

items/rift-summoner-plate.name: Rift Summoner Plate
items/rift-summoner-plate.description: A piece of Judge's attire worn by Charon. When wearing this armor, your summons will be more likely to protect you.

items/riftguard-armor.name: Riftguard Armor
items/riftguard-armor.description: A piece of Judge's attire worn by Rhada. When taking Ward damage while wearing this armor, one will take reduced self damage from status effects.

items/riftguard-helmet.name: Riftguard Helmet
items/riftguard-helmet.description: A piece of Judge's attire worn by Rhada. When taking Ward damage while wearing this armor, HP and Mana will be recovered by a percentage of the Ward damage taken.

items/riftguard-leggings.name: Riftguard Leggings
items/riftguard-leggings.description: A piece of Judge's attire worn by Rhada. When taking Ward damage while wearing this armor, HP and Mana will be recovered by a percentage of the Ward damage taken.

items/riftrogue-boots.name: Riftrogue Boots
items/riftrogue-boots.description: A piece of Judge's attire worn by Achlys. One may move with extra grace when wearing this armor, decreasing your chance to miss your mark.

items/riftrogue-chestplate.name: Riftrogue Chestplate
items/riftrogue-chestplate.description: A piece of Judge's attire worn by Achlys. One may move with extra grace when wearing this armor, decreasing your chance to miss your mark.

items/riftrogue-helmet.name: Riftrogue Helmet
items/riftrogue-helmet.description: A piece of Judge's attire worn by Achlys. One may move with extra grace when wearing this armor, decreasing your chance to miss your mark.

items/ring-of-annwn.name: Ring of Annwn
items/ring-of-annwn.description: A ring of Annwn royalty. Its arcane enchantment grants the immunity to element status conditions.

items/ring-of-dawn.name: Ring of Dawn
items/ring-of-dawn.description: Ring of the King of Light. It helps one get a little extra step in the morning.

items/ring-of-day.name: Ring of Day
items/ring-of-day.description: Ring of the King of Light. It can protect one from having their defenses lowered.

items/ring-of-dusk.name: Ring of Dusk
items/ring-of-dusk.description: Ring of the Queen of Darkness. It provides extra mana to help get through the night.

items/ring-of-night.name: Ring of Night
items/ring-of-night.description: Ring of the Queen of Darkness. It can protect one from having their physical or magical prowess decreased.

items/ring-of-restraint.name: Ring of Restraint
items/ring-of-restraint.description: A ring that inhibits growth, greatly reducing the amount of experience earned while slightly increasing orns, gold, and items found.

items/ring-of-sacrifice.name: Ring of Sacrifice
items/ring-of-sacrifice.description: A ring of certain evil. Wearing it attracts stronger monsters to you, but reduces your overall power.

items/robe-of-the-north.name: Robe of the North
items/robe-of-the-north.description: Magical attire of Nothren lords. It protects one from fire, the weakness of the Nothren people.

items/rosas-brooch.name: Rosa's Brooch
items/rosas-brooch.description: Lunar Catalyst of Rosa, fallen queen of the Enlightened.

items/rosewood-lute.name: Rosewood Lute
items/rosewood-lute.description: A talented bard's lute, playing it in battle may temporary boost one's stats.

items/rotten-leaves.name: Rotten Leaves
items/rotten-leaves.description: A clump of smelly old leaves.

items/royal-boots.name: Royal Boots
items/royal-boots.description: The royal families often employed the use of rogues, arming them with pieces of great quality.

items/royal-chestplate.name: Royal Chestplate
items/royal-chestplate.description: The royal families often employed the use of rogues, arming them with pieces of great quality.

items/royal-dagger.name: Royal Dagger
items/royal-dagger.description: The royal families often employed the use of rogues, arming them with pieces of great quality.

items/royal-helmet.name: Royal Helmet
items/royal-helmet.description: The royal families often employed the use of rogues, arming them with pieces of great quality.

items/royal-hood.name: Royal Hood
items/royal-hood.description: The royal families often employed the use of rogues, arming them with pieces of great quality.

items/royal-longbow.name: Royal Longbow
items/royal-longbow.description: The royal families often employed the use of rogues, arming them with pieces of great quality.

items/royal-shield.name: Royal Shield
items/royal-shield.description: The royal families often employed the use of rogues, arming them with pieces of great quality.

items/royalty.name: Royalty
items/royalty.description: Grants temporary defenses and grants Ward for 4 turns.

items/ruby-wand.name: Ruby Wand
items/ruby-wand.description: A wand for casting magic. This one in particular is imbued with fire.

items/ruby.name: Ruby
items/ruby.description: A jewel with a crimson glow. Adorning this upon a weapon will slightly heal your wounds when damaging an opponent.

items/rune-armor.name: Rune Armor
items/rune-armor.description: Mystical armor that boasts higher magic defense.

items/rune-helmet.name: Rune Helmet
items/rune-helmet.description: Mystical armor that boasts higher magic defense.

items/rune-leggings.name: Rune Leggings
items/rune-leggings.description: Mystical armor that boasts higher magic defense.

items/rune-shield.name: Rune Shield
items/rune-shield.description: Mystical shield that boasts extra magic defense.

items/runestone.name: Runestone
items/runestone.description: A rare piece of runestone. Useful for crafting and upgrading magical weapons or armor.

items/runic-boots.name: Runic Boots
items/runic-boots.description: The boots of a mage of a lost race known as the Runics. Wearing this item will slightly reduce the mana cost of spells. It is also well suited for adornment.

items/runic-hat.name: Runic Hat
items/runic-hat.description: The hat of a mage of a lost race known as the Runics. Wearing this item will slightly reduce the mana cost of spells. It is also well suited for adornment.

items/runic-robe.name: Runic Robe
items/runic-robe.description: The robe of a mage of a lost race known as the Runics. Wearing this item will slightly reduce the mana cost of spells. It is also well suited for adornment.

items/sabrinas-cowl.name: Sabrina's Cowl
items/sabrinas-cowl.description: Headwear of Sabrina, river Goddess of the Fomorian house of Autumna. Sabrina and her sisters traversed the riverways, tunnels, and creeks to get the edge in battle, but Morrigan's forces were far too plentiful. While wearing this item, debuffs will be easier to cast on your opponent. Additionally, it increases the maximum damage of status effects on your opponent.

items/salas-hood.name: Sala's Hood
items/salas-hood.description: Ivory hood of Sala, the High Elf.

items/salas-robe.name: Sala's Robe
items/salas-robe.description: Crimson robe of Sala, the High Elf.

items/sandstone.name: Sandstone
items/sandstone.description: Material made of hardened sand. Useful for upgrading powerful weapons.

items/sandstorm.name: Sandstorm
items/sandstorm.description: A rare scimitar of the sands. Slightly increases gold earned.

items/sanguine-archistaff.name: Sanguine Archistaff
items/sanguine-archistaff.description: A large staff wielded by kobold lords.

items/sanguine-staff.name: Sanguine Staff
items/sanguine-staff.description: A simple staff wielded by kobold mages.

items/sanguine-sword.name: Sanguine Sword
items/sanguine-sword.description: A simple sword wielded by kobold warriors.

items/satis-antlers.name: Satis Antlers
items/satis-antlers.description: This unique headwear does not offer much protection, but is well suited for adornment.

items/saturns-eye.name: Saturn's Eye
items/saturns-eye.description: A celestial adornment capable of increasing many attributes of a piece of equipment when adorned upon it.

items/scalestone.name: Scalestone
items/scalestone.description: A chunk of nearly fossilized scales. Useful for upgrading rare weapons.

items/scimitar.name: Scimitar
items/scimitar.description: A short sword with a curved blade, designed for horseback combat.

items/scorcher.name: Scorcher
items/scorcher.description: This sword of the Inferno Knights is eternally ablaze.

items/scroll-of-chaos.name: Scroll of Chaos
items/scroll-of-chaos.description: A scroll containing a terrible incantation that will turn the world crimson. Using this scroll will cause enemies of any habitat to show for a limited time, but may be more difficult to defeat.

items/scythe.name: Scythe
items/scythe.description: A large tool quite suitable for cutting grass.

items/sea-axe.name: Sea Axe
items/sea-axe.description: An axe enchanted with the power of the raging sea.

items/sea-bass.name: Sea Bass
items/sea-bass.description: A medium sized fish, often seen in larger bodies of water.

items/second-horsemans-armor.name: Second Horseman's Armor
items/second-horsemans-armor.description: Armor of the Second Horseman, often associated with great pestilence. It reduces the damage taken from the ultimate attacks of Raid Bosses.

items/second-horsemans-boots.name: Second Horseman's Boots
items/second-horsemans-boots.description: Boots of the Second Horseman, often associated with great pestilence. It reduces the damage taken from the ultimate attacks of Raid Bosses.

items/second-horsemans-cloak.name: Second Horseman's Cloak
items/second-horsemans-cloak.description: Cloak of the Second Horseman, often associated with great pestilence. It reduces the damage taken from the ultimate attacks of Raid Bosses.

items/second-horsemans-hood.name: Second Horseman's Hood
items/second-horsemans-hood.description: Hood of the Second Horseman, often associated with great pestilence. It reduces the damage taken from the ultimate attacks of Raid Bosses.

items/second-horsemans-staff.name: Second Horseman's Staff
items/second-horsemans-staff.description: Staff of the Second Horseman, often associated with great pestilence. It reduces the damage taken from the ultimate attacks of Raid Bosses and can cause an opponent to be poisoned or blighted.

items/seekers-candle.name: Seeker's Candle
items/seekers-candle.description: When lit, this candle is said to draw near monsters that you have accepted a quest for.

items/sempre-forte.name: Sempre Forte
items/sempre-forte.description: A relic of Apollyon's less destructive years.

items/sequanas-chestpiece.name: Sequana's Chestpiece
items/sequanas-chestpiece.description: Masterly smithed chest armor of Sequana, river Goddess and leader of the Fomorian house of Autumna. The oldest of her sisters, Sequana was a deity of grace and fortune. While wearing this item, debuffs will be easier to cast on your opponent. Additionally, it increases the maximum damage of status effects on your opponent.

items/shadow-boots.name: Shadow Boots
items/shadow-boots.description: Dark armor of elite Balor rogues.

items/shadow-garb.name: Shadow Garb
items/shadow-garb.description: Dark armor of elite Balor rogues.

items/shadow-hood.name: Shadow Hood
items/shadow-hood.description: Dark armor of elite Balor rogues.

items/shadow-katana.name: Shadow Katana
items/shadow-katana.description: A thin, pale blade granted to elite Balor warriors.

items/shamans-charm.name: Shaman's Charm
items/shamans-charm.description: An amulet carried by most talented of healers. Wearing this item will increase the effectiveness of healing items.

items/sharpened-kerberos-claws.name: Sharpened Kerberos Claws
items/sharpened-kerberos-claws.description: Sharp, jagged blades forged of the mighty claws of Kerberos. They can cause an opponent to bleed or become frozen.

items/shivas-bow.name: Shiva's Bow
items/shivas-bow.description: A decorative bow enchanted with the power of ice. It can easily cause an opponent to freeze.

items/shoulders-of-eos.name: Shoulders of Eos
items/shoulders-of-eos.description: A piece of a Titan themself. These pieces can be used to augment celestial weapons at a Titan Workshop. This piece will allow your summons to protect you more frequently.

items/shoulders-of-oceanus.name: Shoulders of Oceanus
items/shoulders-of-oceanus.description: A piece of a Titan themself. These pieces can be used to augment celestial weapons at a Titan Workshop.

items/shoulders-of-prometheus.name: Shoulders of Prometheus
items/shoulders-of-prometheus.description: A piece of a Titan themself. These pieces can be used to augment celestial weapons at a Titan Workshop.

items/shoulders-of-selene.name: Shoulders of Selene
items/shoulders-of-selene.description: A piece of a Titan themself. These pieces can be used to augment celestial weapons at a Titan Workshop. This piece will increase frequency that your follower will act in battle.

items/shoulders-of-themis.name: Shoulders of Themis
items/shoulders-of-themis.description: A piece of a Titan themself. These pieces can be used to augment celestial weapons at a Titan Workshop. This augment will increase the amount of damage dealt with Holy attacks and spells.

items/side-arm.name: Side-arm
items/side-arm.description: Wait one turn, then return an opponent's attack back at them.

items/sigma-olympia-archistaff.name: Sigma Olympia Archistaff
items/sigma-olympia-archistaff.description: Rare weapon, fallen from an Olympian.

items/sigma-olympia-boots.name: Sigma Olympia Boots
items/sigma-olympia-boots.description: Light armor, reminiscent of an Olympian rogue. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

items/sigma-olympia-cowl.name: Sigma Olympia Cowl
items/sigma-olympia-cowl.description: Light armor, reminiscent of an Olympian rogue. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

items/sigma-olympia-cuirass.name: Sigma Olympia Cuirass
items/sigma-olympia-cuirass.description: Heavy armor, reminiscent of an Olympian warrior. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

items/sigma-olympia-garb.name: Sigma Olympia Garb
items/sigma-olympia-garb.description: Light armor, reminiscent of an Olympian rogue. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

items/sigma-olympia-greaves.name: Sigma Olympia Greaves
items/sigma-olympia-greaves.description: Heavy armor, reminiscent of an Olympian warrior. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

items/sigma-olympia-helmet.name: Sigma Olympia Helmet
items/sigma-olympia-helmet.description: Heavy armor, reminiscent of an Olympian warrior. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

items/sigma-olympia-hood.name: Sigma Olympia Hood
items/sigma-olympia-hood.description: Magical clothing, reminiscent of an Olympian magician. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

items/sigma-olympia-shoes.name: Sigma Olympia Shoes
items/sigma-olympia-shoes.description: Magical clothing, reminiscent of an Olympian magician. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

items/sigma-olympia-vestment.name: Sigma Olympia Vestment
items/sigma-olympia-vestment.description: Magical clothing, reminiscent of an Olympian magician. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

items/sigma-olympia-warbow.name: Sigma Olympia Warbow
items/sigma-olympia-warbow.description: Rare weapon, fallen from an Olympian.

items/sigma-olympia-warsword.name: Sigma Olympia Warsword
items/sigma-olympia-warsword.description: Rare weapon, fallen from an Olympian.

items/silk-crossbow.name: Silk Crossbow
items/silk-crossbow.description: A sturdy crossbow fastened with a thread of strong silk.

items/silk.name: Silk
items/silk.description: Silk of a great spider. Useful for upgrading rare weapons.

items/silphium.name: Silphium
items/silphium.description: A sprig of silphium. It is useful in crafting some potions at a herbalist.

items/silver-amulet.name: Silver Amulet
items/silver-amulet.description: A shiny, silver amulet. Raises attack power.

items/silver-crossbow.name: Silver Crossbow
items/silver-crossbow.description: A silver crossbow especially effective against the undead.

items/silver-dagger.name: Silver Dagger
items/silver-dagger.description: A silver dagger. Quite suitable when fighting the undead.

items/silver-kris.name: Silver Kris
items/silver-kris.description: Swiftly attack twice, dealing up to double damage.

items/silver.name: Silver
items/silver.description: A small piece of silver ore. Useful for crafting and upgrading weapons or armor.

items/simple-robe.name: Simple Robe
items/simple-robe.description: A simple mage's robe. Offers a small amount of magic protection.

items/simple-shoes.name: Simple Shoes
items/simple-shoes.description: A simple pair of trusty shoes.

items/skyshard-dagger.name: Skyshard Dagger
items/skyshard-dagger.description: A brittle weapon, constructed of Skyshards. With great vises, a Titan can augment it to fit your needs.

items/skyshard-lute.name: Skyshard Lute
items/skyshard-lute.description: A brittle weapon, constructed of Skyshards. With great vises, a Titan can augment it to fit your needs.

items/skyshard-quarterstaff.name: Skyshard Quarterstaff
items/skyshard-quarterstaff.description: A brittle weapon, constructed of Skyshards. With great vises, a Titan can augment it to fit your needs.

items/skyshard-staff.name: Skyshard Staff
items/skyshard-staff.description: A brittle weapon, constructed of Skyshards. With great vises, a Titan can augment it to fit your needs.

items/skyshard-sword.name: Skyshard Sword
items/skyshard-sword.description: A brittle weapon, constructed of Skyshards. With great vises, a Titan can augment it to fit your needs.

items/skyshard.name: Skyshard
items/skyshard.description: A piece of Skyshard refined from a piece of a Tower of Olympia.

items/skystone.name: Skystone
items/skystone.description: Material imbued by the windy skies. Useful for upgrading powerful weapons.

items/sleighblade.name: Sleighblade
items/sleighblade.description: A glistening sword carried by followers of Scruug. It is quite chilling to the touch. When using this weapon, you will start battle with Ward automatically activated.

items/small-bestial-potion.name: Small Bestial Potion
items/small-bestial-potion.description: A sweet and nutritious tonic. Having your follower consume it will increase their action rate for a limited time.

items/small-empty-bottle.name: Small Empty Bottle
items/small-empty-bottle.description: A small bottle suitable for holding a brewed potion, tonic, or elixir. Visit a herbalist to fill this bottle.

items/smelly-mushroom.name: Smelly Mushroom
items/smelly-mushroom.description: A mushroom of Naggeneen's collection. Eating it will cause one to enrage, but become afflicted with Toxic.

items/smelly-shoes.name: Smelly Shoes
items/smelly-shoes.description: Foul shoes worn by the fairy Naggeneen. Oddly, they can protect their wearer from poison and blight.

items/snakeskin-armor.name: Snakeskin Armor
items/snakeskin-armor.description: Armor made of great snake's remains.

items/snakeskin-cowl.name: Snakeskin Cowl
items/snakeskin-cowl.description: A cowl made of great snake's remains.

items/solar-boots.name: Solar Boots
items/solar-boots.description: Light armor imbued with celestial might.

items/solar-bow.name: Solar Bow
items/solar-bow.description: A bow imbued with celestial might.

items/solar-garb.name: Solar Garb
items/solar-garb.description: Light armor imbued with celestial might.

items/solar-hood.name: Solar Hood
items/solar-hood.description: Light armor imbued with celestial might.

items/solar-secrets.name: Solar Secrets
items/solar-secrets.description: A scroll of destructive solar magic crafted by Emile. Using it will grant the skills "Solarstrikes" and "Solarseals".

items/solarite.name: Solarite
items/solarite.description: Rare chunk of solarite. Useful in upgrading powerful equipment.

items/soul-blade.name: Soul Blade
items/soul-blade.description: Ceremonial blade of a long forgotten civilization. It has a small chance of cursing an opponent.

items/soul-of-achlys.name: Soul of Achlys
items/soul-of-achlys.description: Soul of Achlys, the Red Dagger. Adorning this soul within your weapon will increase light and dark damage.

items/soul-of-charon.name: Soul of Charon
items/soul-of-charon.description: Soul of Charon, the Grand Summoner. Adorning this soul within your weapon will slightly increase the power of your summons.

items/soul-of-rhada.name: Soul of Rhada
items/soul-of-rhada.description: Soul of Rhada, the Great Shield. Adorning this soul within your armor will decrease light and dark damage taken.

items/soul.name: Soul
items/soul.description: Soul of a felled gladiator. Useful in upgrading rarer weapons and equipment.

items/sour-mushroom.name: Sour Mushroom
items/sour-mushroom.description: A mushroom of Naggeneen's collection. Eating it will greatly increase one's attack and magic powers, but become afflicted with a variety of illnesses.

items/spear.name: Spear
items/spear.description: A blade fashioned upon an extended shaft of wood.

items/spectral-armor.name: Spectral Armor
items/spectral-armor.description: A piece threaded of distant memories. Memories of the famed, yet feared, "Angel" of destruction. In his youth, Apollyon favored vitality and dexterity over orthodox defenses.

items/spectral-boots.name: Spectral Boots
items/spectral-boots.description: A piece threaded of distant memories. Memories of the famed, yet feared, "Angel" of destruction. In his youth, Apollyon favored vitality and dexterity over orthodox defenses.

items/spectral-cowl.name: Spectral Cowl
items/spectral-cowl.description: A piece threaded of distant memories. Memories of the famed, yet feared, "Angel" of destruction. In his youth, Apollyon favored vitality and dexterity over orthodox defenses.

items/spectral-garb.name: Spectral Garb
items/spectral-garb.description: A piece threaded of distant memories. Memories of the famed, yet feared, "Angel" of destruction. In his youth, Apollyon favored vitality and dexterity over orthodox defenses.

items/spectral-heavy-boots.name: Spectral Heavy Boots
items/spectral-heavy-boots.description: A piece threaded of distant memories. Memories of the famed, yet feared, "Angel" of destruction. In his youth, Apollyon favored vitality and dexterity over orthodox defenses.

items/spectral-helmet.name: Spectral Helmet
items/spectral-helmet.description: A piece threaded of distant memories. Memories of the famed, yet feared, "Angel" of destruction. In his youth, Apollyon favored vitality and dexterity over orthodox defenses.

items/spectral-hood.name: Spectral Hood
items/spectral-hood.description: A piece threaded of distant memories. Memories of the famed, yet feared, "Angel" of destruction. In his youth, Apollyon favored vitality and dexterity over orthodox defenses.

items/spectral-robe.name: Spectral Robe
items/spectral-robe.description: A piece threaded of distant memories. Memories of the famed, yet feared, "Angel" of destruction. In his youth, Apollyon favored vitality and dexterity over orthodox defenses.

items/spectral-shoes.name: Spectral Shoes
items/spectral-shoes.description: A piece threaded of distant memories. Memories of the famed, yet feared, "Angel" of destruction. In his youth, Apollyon favored vitality and dexterity over orthodox defenses.

items/speed-tonic.name: Speed Tonic
items/speed-tonic.description: A sour tonic that raises your speed in battle.

items/spellswords-ring.name: Spellsword's Ring
items/spellswords-ring.description: A strange magical ring. Those who are not trained in magical arts can equip this ring to sacrifice physical strength for magic power.

items/spelunking-staff.name: Spelunking Staff
items/spelunking-staff.description: Staff of a lost dungeon explorer. It seems to have developed quite some power while resting deep within the land.

items/spiked-greatshield.name: Spiked Greatshield
items/spiked-greatshield.description: Recovers Ward. Requires 2 turns in battle.

items/spine-of-eos.name: Spine of Eos
items/spine-of-eos.description: A piece of a Titan themself. These pieces can be used to augment celestial weapons at a Titan Workshop.

items/spine-of-oceanus.name: Spine of Oceanus
items/spine-of-oceanus.description: A piece of a Titan themself. These pieces can be used to augment celestial weapons at a Titan Workshop.

items/spine-of-prometheus.name: Spine of Prometheus
items/spine-of-prometheus.description: A piece of a Titan themself. These pieces can be used to augment celestial weapons at a Titan Workshop.

items/spine-of-selene.name: Spine of Selene
items/spine-of-selene.description: A piece of a Titan themself. These pieces can be used to augment celestial weapons at a Titan Workshop.

items/spine-of-themis.name: Spine of Themis
items/spine-of-themis.description: A piece of a Titan themself. These pieces can be used to augment celestial weapons at a Titan Workshop.

items/spirit-of-the-wood.name: Spirit of the Wood
items/spirit-of-the-wood.description: Ceremonial sword of a great woodland elf. It may poison an opponent.

items/spore.name: Spore
items/spore.description: A spore of a toxic mushroom. Adorning it upon a weapon can add a variety of status effects to your attacks.

items/staff-of-the-chimera.name: Staff of the Chimera
items/staff-of-the-chimera.description: A powerful staff forged of the remains of a Chimera. Using this weapon may cause one to fill with immense rage, inflicting the Berserk status.

items/staff-of-tiamat.name: Staff of Tiamat
items/staff-of-tiamat.description: A superb staff forged of the remains of Tiamat, the great ancient dragon.

items/staff-of-typhon.name: Staff of Typhon
items/staff-of-typhon.description: A superb staff forged of the remains of Typhon, the great ancient dragon.

items/staff-of-wolves.name: Staff of Wolves
items/staff-of-wolves.description: Staff of a wolfman mage. Imbued with earthen powers.

items/staff-of-zaltys.name: Staff of Zaltys
items/staff-of-zaltys.description: Chapter V: Zaltys never did like the Agathodaemon, but understood that she needed the soil for life. Zaltys laid seed to the soil, sprouting the foliage that lets us breath our air. Her staff represents life, and will allow you to recover HP each turn in battle.

items/stardust.name: Stardust
items/stardust.description: A celestial adornment capable of increasing many attributes of a piece of equipment when adorned upon it.

items/steadfast-charm.name: Steadfast Charm
items/steadfast-charm.description: A yellow crystal carried by some of the most steadfast. Carrying this item may occasionally protect you from status effects.

items/steady-hands-of-eos.name: Steady Hands of Eos
items/steady-hands-of-eos.description: A piece of a Titan themself. These pieces can be used to augment celestial weapons at a Titan Workshop.

items/steady-hands-of-prometheus.name: Steady Hands of Prometheus
items/steady-hands-of-prometheus.description: A piece of a Titan themself. These pieces can be used to augment celestial weapons at a Titan Workshop. This piece will increase the power of critical hits.

items/steady-hands-of-selene.name: Steady Hands of Selene
items/steady-hands-of-selene.description: A piece of a Titan themself. These pieces can be used to augment celestial weapons at a Titan Workshop.

items/steady-pendant.name: Steady Pendant
items/steady-pendant.description: A sturdy pendant often worn by centurions. It protects its wearer from being stunned.

items/steel-belt.name: Steel Belt
items/steel-belt.description: A belt fashioned with steel. Improves your dexterity and defense.

items/steel-ring.name: Steel Ring
items/steel-ring.description: A ring made of steel. Raises defense when worn.

items/steel.name: Steel
items/steel.description: A small piece of steel ore. Useful for crafting and upgrading weapons or armor.

items/steelguard.name: Steelguard
items/steelguard.description: Grants temporary defenses and grants Ward for 3 turns.

items/steward-candle.name: Steward Candle
items/steward-candle.description: A candle gifted by Damra as part of the Steward ritual. Light it to summon your Steward.

items/stilettos.name: Stilettos
items/stilettos.description: Swiftly attack twice, dealing up to double damage.

items/stone-cure.name: Stone Cure
items/stone-cure.description: A simple tonic that cures one of petrification.

items/stone-dagger.name: Stone Dagger
items/stone-dagger.description: A dagger, once a fixture upon a noble statue. It has a small chance of petrifying an opponent.

items/stone-pendant.name: Stone Pendant
items/stone-pendant.description: A pendant often worn against the mighty cockatrice. It protects its wearer from petrification.

items/stone.name: Stone
items/stone.description: A solid piece of stone. Useful for crafting and upgrading weapons or armor.

items/storm-arrows.name: Storm Arrows
items/storm-arrows.description: Deals damage thrice, grants 2 turns of Ward, and may temporarily increase dexterity.

items/storm-belt.name: Storm Belt
items/storm-belt.description: Belt of Stormforce. Grants protection from lightning.

items/storm-sceptre.name: Storm Sceptre
items/storm-sceptre.description: A staff that harnesses the power lurking above the wielder.

items/strangers-gift.name: Stranger's Gift
items/strangers-gift.description: A gift for another. Open it to find out what it could be.

items/strong-fishing-line.name: Strong Fishing Line
items/strong-fishing-line.description: A stronger fishing line, suitable for fetching aught from the seas. Use when near a body of water or fountain to begin fishing.

items/sturdy-feet-of-eos.name: Sturdy Feet of Eos
items/sturdy-feet-of-eos.description: A piece of a Titan themself. These pieces can be used to augment celestial weapons at a Titan Workshop. This piece allows one to occasionally summon beasts in one less turn.

items/sturdy-feet-of-prometheus.name: Sturdy Feet of Prometheus
items/sturdy-feet-of-prometheus.description: A piece of a Titan themself. These pieces can be used to augment celestial weapons at a Titan Workshop. This piece allows one to recover Ward with each turn.

items/sturdy-feet-of-selene.name: Sturdy Feet of Selene
items/sturdy-feet-of-selene.description: A piece of a Titan themself. These pieces can be used to augment celestial weapons at a Titan Workshop.

items/sturdy-feet-of-themis.name: Sturdy Feet of Themis
items/sturdy-feet-of-themis.description: A piece of a Titan themself. These pieces can be used to augment celestial weapons at a Titan Workshop. This piece allows one to take reduced damage when defending in battle.

items/succubus-mantle.name: Succubus Mantle
items/succubus-mantle.description: Crude armor made of the remains of a succubus. Does not offer much defense, but raises your dexterity.

items/summoners-hood.name: Summoner's Hood
items/summoners-hood.description: Hood worn by advanced summoners. When wearing this hood, using pacts with your summons will be more effective.

items/summoners-robe.name: Summoner's Robe
items/summoners-robe.description: Robe worn by advanced summoners. It increases the chance of a summon protecting you in battle.

items/summoners-shoes.name: Summoner's Shoes
items/summoners-shoes.description: Shoes worn by advanced summoners. They slightly increase the power of summoned beasts.

items/summoning-scroll.name: Summoning Scroll
items/summoning-scroll.description: A scroll containing the ancient Balor techniques of the summon. Reading it will summon a powerful Raid Boss to your nearby area, but the entity may only be visible to those who travel at a slower pace.

items/sumner-crested-shield.name: Sumner Crested Shield
items/sumner-crested-shield.description: Shield of Fomor, Cursed King of Fomoria. This item grants a number of passive abilities known to be utilized by the Fomorian houses.

items/sun-boots.name: Sun Boots
items/sun-boots.description: Magic attire imbued with solar energy.

items/sun-hat.name: Sun Hat
items/sun-hat.description: Magic attire imbued with solar energy.

items/sun-robe.name: Sun Robe
items/sun-robe.description: Magic attire imbued with solar energy.

items/sun-staff.name: Sun Staff
items/sun-staff.description: A staff imbued with celestial might.

items/super-empty-bottle.name: Super Empty Bottle
items/super-empty-bottle.description: A large bottle suitable for holding a brewed potion, tonic, or elixir. Visit a herbalist to fill this bottle.

items/super-exp-potion.name: Super EXP Potion
items/super-exp-potion.description: A sour tasting elixir that quadruples experience earned for a limited time.

items/surtrs-boots.name: Surtr's Boots
items/surtrs-boots.description: Footwear of Surtr, the wanderer. They grant their wearer additional dexterity and are well suited for adornment.

items/surtrs-cuirass.name: Surtr's Cuirass
items/surtrs-cuirass.description: Light armor of Surtr, the wanderer. It grants its wearer additional Ward and is well suited for adornment.

items/surtrs-helmet.name: Surtr's Helmet
items/surtrs-helmet.description: Helmet of Surtr, the wanderer. It grants its wearer additional HP and is well suited for adornment.

items/surtrs-shield.name: Surtr's Shield
items/surtrs-shield.description: Grants temporary defenses and grants Ward for 4 turns.

items/surtrs-sword.name: Surtr's Sword
items/surtrs-sword.description: The extremely bright, decorative sword of Surtr. It can easily blind an opponent and will draw more monsters towards you with its bright, everlasting light.

items/swansong.name: Swansong
items/swansong.description: Use both your magic and attack stats to cast the famous song of the Swansong.

items/symbol-of-doom.name: Symbol of Doom
items/symbol-of-doom.description: Adornment of the Final Horseman. Adorning it upon a weapon will increase the action rate and stats of your follower.

items/symbol-of-famine.name: Symbol of Famine
items/symbol-of-famine.description: Adornment of the First Horseman. Adorning it upon a piece of armor will slightly protect one from status ailments.

items/symbol-of-pestilence.name: Symbol of Pestilence
items/symbol-of-pestilence.description: Adornment of the Second Horseman. Adorning it upon a piece of armor will moderately protect one from status ailments.

items/symbol-of-war.name: Symbol of War
items/symbol-of-war.description: Adornment of the Third Horseman. Adorning it upon a weapon will increase the distance that you can see.

items/taranis-hood.name: Taranis Hood
items/taranis-hood.description: Hood of an infamous Taranis of Stormforce.

items/tarnished-kings-crown.name: Tarnished King's Crown
items/tarnished-kings-crown.description: The broken crown of forgotten King Meliodas. Meliodas claimed rule after Gradlon had fallen, but many outright deny his kingship. Its dents and cracks make it well suited for adornment.

items/tattered-clothwrap.name: Tattered Clothwrap
items/tattered-clothwrap.description: A simple piece of cloth. It's quite old and musty.

items/tempest-boots.name: Tempest Boots
items/tempest-boots.description: Great boots of a mage who controlled the skies. Grants protection from lightning.

items/templar-shield.name: Templar Shield
items/templar-shield.description: The shield of a mighty templar knight. It provides extra physical defense.

items/terra-boots.name: Terra Boots
items/terra-boots.description: Great boots of a mage who controlled the ground below. Grants protection from earthen magic.

items/theta-achlys-riftlock.name: Theta Achlys Riftlock
items/theta-achlys-riftlock.description: Riftlock of Achlys, the Red Dagger.

items/theta-charon-riftlock.name: Theta Charon Riftlock
items/theta-charon-riftlock.description: Riftlock of Charon, the Grand Summoner.

items/theta-olympia-archistaff.name: Theta Olympia Archistaff
items/theta-olympia-archistaff.description: Rare weapon, fallen from an Olympian.

items/theta-olympia-boots.name: Theta Olympia Boots
items/theta-olympia-boots.description: Light armor, reminiscent of an Olympian rogue. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

items/theta-olympia-cowl.name: Theta Olympia Cowl
items/theta-olympia-cowl.description: Light armor, reminiscent of an Olympian rogue. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

items/theta-olympia-hood.name: Theta Olympia Hood
items/theta-olympia-hood.description: Magical clothing, reminiscent of an Olympian magician. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

items/theta-olympia-shoes.name: Theta Olympia Shoes
