items/theta-olympia-vestment.name: Theta Olympia Vestment
items/theta-olympia-vestment.description: Magical clothing, reminiscent of an Olympian magician. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

items/theta-olympia-warbow.name: Theta Olympia Warbow
items/theta-olympia-warbow.description: Rare weapon, fallen from an Olympian.

items/theta-olympia-warsword.name: Theta Olympia Warsword
items/theta-olympia-warsword.description: Rare weapon, fallen from an Olympian.

items/theta-rhada-riftlock.name: Theta Rhada Riftlock
items/theta-rhada-riftlock.description: Riftlock of Rhada, the Great Shield.

items/thieves-ring.name: Thieve's Ring
items/thieves-ring.description: Lucky ring worn by bandits. Increases gold earned.

items/third-horsemans-armor.name: Third Horseman's Armor
items/third-horsemans-armor.description: Armor of the Third Horseman, often associated with unwavering war. It reduces the damage taken from the ultimate attacks of Raid Bosses.

items/third-horsemans-boots.name: Third Horseman's Boots
items/third-horsemans-boots.description: Boots of the Third Horseman, often associated with unwavering war. It reduces the damage taken from the ultimate attacks of Raid Bosses.

items/third-horsemans-cloak.name: Third Horseman's Cloak
items/third-horsemans-cloak.description: Cloak of the Third Horseman, often associated with unwavering war. It reduces the damage taken from the ultimate attacks of Raid Bosses.

items/third-horsemans-gada.name: Third Horseman's Gada
items/third-horsemans-gada.description: Blunt weapon of the Third Horseman, often associated with unwavering war. It reduces the damage taken from the ultimate attacks of Raid Bosses and can easily stun or decrease the dexterity of an opponent.

items/third-horsemans-hood.name: Third Horseman's Hood
items/third-horsemans-hood.description: Hood of the Third Horseman, often associated with unwavering war. It reduces the damage taken from the ultimate attacks of Raid Bosses.

items/thorn.name: Thorn
items/thorn.description: Prickly blade of a woodland creature. It has a small chance to poison an opponent.

items/thorns.name: Thorns
items/thorns.description: Prickly blades of a woodland creature. It has a small chance to poison an opponent.

items/thors-arc.name: Thor's Arc
items/thors-arc.description: A masterfully crafted magical bow of Thor. Thor founded the Stormforce shortly before succumbing to the power of the falling. His bow can easily paralyze an opponent.

items/thors-hammer.name: Thor's Hammer
items/thors-hammer.description: Small, yet immensely heavy hammer of Thor. Thor founded the Stormforce shortly before succumbing to the power of the falling. His hammer can easily paralyze an opponent.

items/titan-armor.name: Titan Armor
items/titan-armor.description: Azure armor crafted of hard titanium.

items/titan-axe.name: Titan Axe
items/titan-axe.description: An azure axe crafted of hard titanium.

items/titan-helmet.name: Titan Helmet
items/titan-helmet.description: Azure armor crafted of hard titanium.

items/titan-leggings.name: Titan Leggings
items/titan-leggings.description: Azure armor crafted of hard titanium.

items/titanium.name: Titanium
items/titanium.description: A large chunk of hardened titanium. Useful in upgrading powerful equipment.

items/tizona.name: Tizona
items/tizona.description: A greatsword often used in defensive swordplay by the almighty knight, Balin. Strikes of the sword have the ability to lower an opponent's physical or magical defenses.

items/top-hat.name: Top Hat
items/top-hat.description: Boy, it is dapper! When wearing this hat, you can wield two-handed weapons more effectively.

items/torch.name: Torch
items/torch.description: Use it at night to increase visibility. You may attract more monsters as well.

items/tower-core.name: Tower Core
items/tower-core.description: The foundation needed to build a Tower of Olympia atop of.

items/tower-plane.name: Tower Plane
items/tower-plane.description: A supporting piece of material used by the Titans to construct towers to the stars. Planes are required to construct every floor of a tower.

items/tower-shard.name: Tower Shard
items/tower-shard.description: A piece of material used by the Titans to construct towers to the stars.

items/tower-shield.name: Tower Shield
items/tower-shield.description: Grants temporary defenses and grants Ward for 4 turns.

items/treecutter.name: Treecutter
items/treecutter.description: Take the stance of Gymir, increasing your attack power, but taking damage every turn.

items/trevelyans-archistaff.name: Trevelyan's Archistaff
items/trevelyans-archistaff.description: Unstable elementless magic that can blind an opponent while dealing damage thrice.

items/trevelyans-charm.name: Trevelyan's Charm
items/trevelyans-charm.description: Amulet carried by Trevelyan, the storied Lyonesse Warlock. Wearing it will increase your offensive power when carrying a weapon with both hands.

items/trevelyans-hood.name: Trevelyan's Hood
items/trevelyans-hood.description: Hood of Trevelyan, the storied Lyonesse Warlock. Wearing it will slightly decrease the mana required for spells while protecting one from the arcane arts.

items/trevelyans-robe.name: Trevelyan's Robe
items/trevelyans-robe.description: Robe of Trevelyan, the storied Lyonesse Warlock. Wearing it will slightly decrease the mana required for spells while protecting one from the arcane arts.

items/trevelyans-shoes.name: Trevelyan's Shoes
items/trevelyans-shoes.description: Shoes of Trevelyan, the storied Lyonesse Warlock. Wearing them will slightly decrease the mana required for spells while protecting one from the arcane arts.

items/trialing-axe.name: Trialing Axe
items/trialing-axe.description: Deals dragon damage and potentially causes blight.

items/trialing-bow.name: Trialing Bow
items/trialing-bow.description: Deals dragon damage and potentially causes blight.

items/trialing-staff.name: Trialing Staff
items/trialing-staff.description: Deals dragon damage and potentially causes blight.

items/trolls-charm.name: Troll's Charm
items/trolls-charm.description: Strange amulet of a troll. Boosts most stats.

items/tundric-katana.name: Tundric Katana
items/tundric-katana.description: A highly decorative weapon wielded by Elven warriors of the North. It boasts extra adornment slots.

items/tundric-staff.name: Tundric Staff
items/tundric-staff.description: A highly decorative weapon wielded by Elven warriors of the North. It boasts extra adornment slots.

items/tundric-sword.name: Tundric Sword
items/tundric-sword.description: A highly decorative weapon wielded by Elven warriors of the North. It boasts extra adornment slots.

items/turul-feather.name: Turul Feather
items/turul-feather.description: The feather of a Turul. It can grant a piece of armor additional dexterity when adorned upon it.

items/twilight-blade.name: Twilight Blade
items/twilight-blade.description: Blade of the wandering twilight knights. Its thick obsidian blade is infused with the power of darkness and may cause an opponent to fall asleep.

items/twilightstone.name: Twilightstone
items/twilightstone.description: A hard obsidian stone that resembles an empty night sky.

items/undead-bone.name: Undead Bone
items/undead-bone.description: Bones of the undead can rarely be so strong.

items/unfelled-concord.name: Unfelled Concord
items/unfelled-concord.description: A large garnet that symbolizes one's allegiance to the Order of the Unfelled. Wearing this gem will allow one to enter dungeons found in the world more frequently.

items/untamed-bull.name: Untamed Bull
items/untamed-bull.description: The powerful, fiery staff of Cerus, the untamed bull.

items/untamed-bulls-eye.name: Untamed Bull's Eye
items/untamed-bulls-eye.description: A celestial adornment capable of increasing many attributes of a piece of equipment when adorned upon it.

items/vajra.name: Vajra
items/vajra.description: A powerful weapon of rain and thunder. Contains the power of lightning and may paralyze an opponent.

items/valhallan-shield.name: Valhallan Shield
items/valhallan-shield.description: Shield carried by valkyries of the Northern lands. It protects one from the cold.

items/valhallas-rise.name: Valhalla's Rise
items/valhallas-rise.description: A rare blade carried by the most gifted of Nothren valkyries. It may grant one the stance of Gunnr, raising attack power but lowering defenses.

items/vampiric-blade.name: Vampiric Blade
items/vampiric-blade.description: An evil blade wielded by experienced vampires. Attacks with this weapon can slightly restore HP.

items/vampiric-ore.name: Vampiric Ore
items/vampiric-ore.description: Ore seemingly treasured by the lords of the night. This can be used to upgrade weapons of theirs.

items/vandals-veil.name: Vandal's Veil
items/vandals-veil.description: A thick piece of fabric, often used to protect one's lungs. Wearing it makes one less likely to be afflicted with status effects.

items/venin.name: Venin
items/venin.description: Putrid spear of the Rat King. It may cause poison while slightly boosting experience and orns earned.

items/verricks-ring.name: Verrick's Ring
items/verricks-ring.description: Lunar Catalyst of Verrick, fallen king of the Enlightened.

items/viper-armor.name: Viper Armor
items/viper-armor.description: An exotic chest guard made of guivre skin.

items/viper-boots.name: Viper Boots
items/viper-boots.description: Exotic boots made of guivre skin.

items/viper-chestmail.name: Viper Chestmail
items/viper-chestmail.description: An exotic chest guard made of guivre skin.

items/viper-cowl.name: Viper Cowl
items/viper-cowl.description: An exotic cowl made of guivre skin.

items/viper-dagger.name: Viper Dagger
items/viper-dagger.description: A fine blade crafted of a great dragon's talon

items/viper-helmet.name: Viper Helmet
items/viper-helmet.description: An exotic helmet made of guivre skin.

items/viper-hood.name: Viper Hood
items/viper-hood.description: An exotic hood made of guivre skin.

items/viper-leggings.name: Viper Leggings
items/viper-leggings.description: Exotic, heavy leg armor made of guivre skin.

items/viper-mages-boots.name: Viper Mage's Boots
items/viper-mages-boots.description: Exotic boots made of guivre skin.

items/viper-robe.name: Viper Robe
items/viper-robe.description: An exotic robe made of guivre skin.

items/vipersong.name: Vipersong
items/vipersong.description: An instrument often used to sooth the greatest of dragons. Its song has the rare chance to temporarily give useful statuses.

items/vritra-charm.name: Vritra Charm
items/vritra-charm.description: Chapter III: Vritra was next to forge these lands, laying her immutable wings upon the coiled rock. This formed a basin of strength for life to grow atop the molten core of this planet. Her charm may occasionally protect you from status effects while granting immunity to Paralyze, Stun, and Petrification.

items/vulcan-boots.name: Vulcan Boots
items/vulcan-boots.description: Footwear of Vulcan, the infamous Red Knight. It grants immunity from being burned.

items/vulcan-buckler.name: Vulcan Buckler
items/vulcan-buckler.description: Buckler of Vulcan, the infamous Red Knight. It grants immunity from being burned.

items/vulcan-charm.name: Vulcan Charm
items/vulcan-charm.description: A yellow crystal carried by Vulcan, the Red Knight. It increases magic power and mana when carried.

items/vulcan-cuirass.name: Vulcan Cuirass
items/vulcan-cuirass.description: Armor of Vulcan, the infamous Red Knight. It grants immunity from being burned.

items/vulcan-helmet.name: Vulcan Helmet
items/vulcan-helmet.description: Helmet of Vulcan, the infamous Red Knight. It grants immunity from being burned.

items/vulcans-archistaff.name: Vulcan's Archistaff
items/vulcans-archistaff.description: An embered Archistaff seldom wielded by Vulcan, the Red Knight. Vulcan formed the Knights of Inferno to fight alongside the forces of Annwn. His staff can easily burn an opponent.

items/vulcans-brew.name: Vulcan's Brew
items/vulcans-brew.description: A strong tonic brewed by Vulcan of the Inferno Knights. Consume it to slightly raise experience and items dropped for a limited time.

items/vulcans-longsword.name: Vulcan's Longsword
items/vulcans-longsword.description: A seemingly flawless blade wielded by Vulcan, the Red Knight. Vulcan formed the Knights of Inferno to fight alongside the forces of Annwn. His blade can easily burn an opponent.

items/wading-boots.name: Wading Boots
items/wading-boots.description: Shoes made to navigate thick marshland.

items/waistguard-of-cerus.name: Waistguard of Cerus
items/waistguard-of-cerus.description: Enchanted belt of Cerus, the untamed. It protects one from burning while granting additional HP.

items/waking-pendant.name: Waking Pendant
items/waking-pendant.description: A magical pendant utilized by studious scholars. It prevents its wearer from falling asleep.

items/war-blinders.name: War Blinders
items/war-blinders.description: Blinders often used to quell a wild horse's restlessness. They increase dexterity and critical hit rate of those granted with extra concentration.

items/war-mage-armor.name: War-mage Armor
items/war-mage-armor.description: Some magic users are also skilled in combat. This is the armor of one.

items/war-mage-boots.name: War-mage Boots
items/war-mage-boots.description: Some magic users are also skilled in combat. These are the boots of one.

items/war-mage-helmet.name: War-mage Helmet
items/war-mage-helmet.description: Some magic users are also skilled in combat. This is the helmet of one.

items/warlock-hat.name: Warlock Hat
items/warlock-hat.description: A large hat of a wise warlock.

items/warlock-staff.name: Warlock Staff
items/warlock-staff.description: An oddly green staff, seemingly owned by a wise warlock.

items/was.name: Was
items/was.description: A symbol of control over the force of chaos. It is well suited for adornment.

items/waterstone.name: Waterstone
items/waterstone.description: A rare piece of waterstone. Useful for crafting and upgrading magical weapons or armor.

items/whetstone.name: Whetstone
items/whetstone.description: A stone of quartz often used in the sharpening of blades. Using it will freely upgrade your equipped weapon to level 2.

items/whisper.name: Whisper
items/whisper.description: Wait one turn, then return an opponent's attack back at them.

items/willow-tree-branch.name: Willow Tree Branch
items/willow-tree-branch.description: Take the stance of Eistla, greatly increasing hybrid offensive ability at the expense of your follower or summons' prowess.

items/wintara-crested-shield.name: Wintara Crested Shield
items/wintara-crested-shield.description: Shield of Fomor, Cursed King of Fomoria. This item grants a number of passive abilities known to be utilized by the Fomorian houses.

items/wisp-staff.name: Wisp Staff
items/wisp-staff.description: Staff imbued with the power of a wisp.

items/witchs-archistaff.name: Witch's Archistaff
items/witchs-archistaff.description: Old, decrepit, dark archistaff of a powerful witch. Slightly boosts experience earned.

items/witchs-hat.name: Witch's Hat
items/witchs-hat.description: The symbolic headwear of Carman, the banished witch.

items/witchstone.name: Witchstone
items/witchstone.description: A strange stone crafted by a great witch.

items/wolfbane.name: Wolfbane
items/wolfbane.description: A magical blade representing the unrelenting force of Fenrir the wolf. It can temporarily decrease your opponent's defense upon use.

items/wolfs-blood.name: Wolf's Blood
items/wolfs-blood.description: What a strange substance. What could it ever be for?

items/wolfskin.name: Wolfskin
items/wolfskin.description: Light armor crafted of a wolf's remains.

items/wolven-tower-shield.name: Wolven Tower Shield
items/wolven-tower-shield.description: Grants temporary defenses and grants Ward for 4 turns.

items/wood.name: Wood

items/woodblade.name: Woodblade
items/woodblade.description: A mystical sword made of hardened wood.

items/wooden-shield.name: Wooden Shield
items/wooden-shield.description: A simple shield made of hardened wood.

items/wooden-staff.name: Wooden Staff
items/wooden-staff.description: A mage's staff crafted of enchanted wood.

items/woodland-staff.name: Woodland Staff
items/woodland-staff.description: A mystical staff made of hardened wood.

items/world-eater.name: World Eater
items/world-eater.description: Chapter VIII: Bashe, the World Eater -- hungry as ever -- drove his mouth downwards, piercing the foundation of the Agathodaemon. His broadsword is filled with craters as well, making it well suitable for adornment.

items/wyvern-armor.name: Wyvern Armor
items/wyvern-armor.description: An exotic chest guard made of wyvern skin.

items/wyvern-blades.name: Wyvern Blades
items/wyvern-blades.description: Swiftly attack twice, dealing up to double damage and drenching an opponent.

items/wyvern-boots.name: Wyvern Boots
items/wyvern-boots.description: Exotic boots made of wyvern skin.

items/wyvern-chestmail.name: Wyvern Chestmail
items/wyvern-chestmail.description: An exotic chest guard made of wyvern skin.

items/wyvern-cowl.name: Wyvern Cowl
items/wyvern-cowl.description: An exotic cowl made of wyvern skin.

items/wyvern-helmet.name: Wyvern Helmet
items/wyvern-helmet.description: An exotic helmet made of wyvern skin.

items/wyvern-hood.name: Wyvern Hood
items/wyvern-hood.description: An exotic hood made of wyvern skin.

items/wyvern-leggings.name: Wyvern Leggings
items/wyvern-leggings.description: Exotic, heavy leg armor made of wyvern skin.

items/wyvern-mages-boots.name: Wyvern Mage's Boots
items/wyvern-mages-boots.description: Exotic boots made of wyvern skin.

items/wyvern-robe.name: Wyvern Robe
items/wyvern-robe.description: An exotic robe made of wyvern skin.

items/xi-olympia-archistaff.description: Rare weapon, fallen from an Olympian.

items/xi-olympia-warsword.description: Rare weapon, fallen from an Olympian.

items/yellow-eye-of-kerberos.name: Yellow Eye of Kerberos
items/yellow-eye-of-kerberos.description: Crystallized eye of the Kerberos. It grants a high chance to paralyze an opponent.

items/yeti-coat.name: Yeti Coat
items/yeti-coat.description: Coat reminiscent of the formidable Yeti. It protects one from the snow and from having their defenses lowered.

items/yeti-mightycoat.name: Yeti Mightycoat
items/yeti-mightycoat.description: Coat reminiscent of the formidable Yeti. It protects one from the snow and from having their defenses lowered.

items/yeti-overcoat.name: Yeti Overcoat
items/yeti-overcoat.description: Coat reminiscent of the formidable Yeti. It protects one from the snow and from having their defenses lowered.

items/ymir-agathodaemon-hammer.name: Ymir Agathodaemon Hammer
items/ymir-agathodaemon-hammer.description: Deals extra damage and may stun an opponent.

items/ymir-brilliant-feathers.name: Ymir Brilliant Feathers
items/ymir-brilliant-feathers.description: Deals extra damage and may cause bleeding.

items/ymir-cliffside-cuirass.name: Ymir Cliffside Cuirass
items/ymir-cliffside-cuirass.description: Chapter VI: Illuyanka then raised walls of stone to frame this new land from the raging seas and winds. The cliffs and shores can be seen from afar, and her mighty armor will surely make one feel as they are made of the cliffs themselves. It will occasionally protect you from hits that take 100% of your maximum HP.

items/ymir-coiled-shield.name: Ymir Coiled Shield
items/ymir-coiled-shield.description: Grants temporary defenses and grants Ward for 3 turns.

items/ymir-staff-of-zaltys.name: Ymir Staff of Zaltys
items/ymir-staff-of-zaltys.description: Chapter V: Zaltys never did like the Agathodaemon, but understood that she needed the soil for life. Zaltys laid seed to the soil, sprouting the foliage that lets us breath our air. Her staff represents life, and will allow you to recover HP each turn in battle.

items/ymir-vritra-charm.name: Ymir Vritra Charm
items/ymir-vritra-charm.description: Chapter III: Vritra was next to forge these lands, laying her immutable wings upon the coiled rock. Her charm may occasionally protect you from status effects while granting immunity to Paralyze, Stun, and Petrification.

followers/surtrs-flame.description: Available for a limited time only, this massive flame can ensure your opponent is always lit ablaze.

followers/surtrs-mighty-flame.name: Surtr's Mighty Flame
followers/surtrs-mighty-flame.description: Available for a limited time only, this massive flame can ensure your opponent is always frozen or lit ablaze.

followers/triton.name: Triton
followers/triton.description: A brown crustacean. It can cause your opponents to bleed while slightly healing you.

followers/turul.name: Turul
followers/turul.description: A wild Turul. It can assist one in battle by diminishing an opponent's stats.

followers/twilight-wisp.name: Twilight Wisp
followers/twilight-wisp.description: A wisp of the night, versed in magic of both light and dark.

followers/undead-golem.name: Undead Golem
followers/undead-golem.description: A great undead golem. It will assist you in battle by granting and restoring ward.

followers/untamed-cerus.name: Untamed Cerus
followers/untamed-cerus.description: The untamed beast. Available for a limited time only.

followers/very-scary-skeleton.name: Very Scary Skeleton
followers/very-scary-skeleton.description: A scary skeleton. It can act often in battle to assist you. Available for a limited time only.

followers/vritra-the-steadfast.name: Vritra the Steadfast
followers/vritra-the-steadfast.description: The Great Dragons will bring many skills to battle. Available for a limited time only.

followers/war-horse.name: War Horse
followers/war-horse.description: A mighty steed. It can assist one in battle with offensive skills and boosts to one's dexterity.

followers/warg.name: Warg
followers/warg.description: A tamed warg. It will assist in battle with dark strikes.

followers/wisp.name: Wisp
followers/wisp.description: A strange floating ball of energy. It is quite proficient at healing its allies.

followers/wolf.name: Wolf
followers/wolf.description: A tamed wolf. It will often attack your enemies in battle.

followers/wyvern.name: Wyvern
followers/wyvern.description: A wild wyvern. It can occasionally breathe fire at your opponent, causing blight.

followers/yeti.name: Yeti
followers/yeti.description: The storied yeti. Can boost your defenses in battle while assisting you with ice magic.

followers/ymir-amphiptere.name: Ymir Amphiptere
followers/ymir-amphiptere.description: The Great Dragons will bring many skills to battle. Available for a limited time only.

followers/yokai.name: Yokai
followers/yokai.description: The storied Yokai is a master of sleep and that of nightmares.

followers/zaltys-friendly-one.name: Zaltys, Friendly One
followers/zaltys-friendly-one.description: The Great Dragons will bring many skills to battle. Available for a limited time only.

followers/zu.name: Zu
followers/zu.description: A tamed Zu. It has a small chance of boosting your speed in battle.

followers/medusa.name: Medusa
followers/medusa.description: Available for a limited time only.

raids/almighty-balin.name: Almighty Balin
raids/almighty-balin.description:
From Avalon comes the Knight with Two Swords.

One blade of attack, one of ward.

raids/apollyon.name: Apollyon
raids/apollyon.description: A destructive exiled Balor mystic, Apollyon sought to destroy lands to stop the falling. He was quickly exiled for his unorthodox approaches.

raids/arisen-asteria-of-olympia.name: Arisen Asteria of Olympia
raids/arisen-asteria-of-olympia.description: With great magic and great resolve, Asteria raised the floors of Olympia's towers in to place.

raids/arisen-atlas-of-olympia.name: Arisen Atlas of Olympia
raids/arisen-atlas-of-olympia.description: Rumored to have lifted a world worth of stone up to the skies, Atlas's strength could not be rivaled.

raids/arisen-balin.name: Arisen Balin
raids/arisen-balin.description:
From Avalon comes the Knight with Two Swords.

One blade of attack, one of ward.

raids/arisen-cade.name: Arisen Cade
raids/arisen-cade.description: Cade, the famed inventor of Avalon, was well renowned for the esoteric gadgets he produced. Perhaps he has been working on something new?

raids/arisen-ebon-scruug.name: Arisen Ebon Scruug
raids/arisen-ebon-scruug.description: An apparition of greed and envy. Once a year, the dreaded Scruug returns from the Underworld with the goal to destroy all happiness.

raids/arisen-hel.name: Arisen Hel
raids/arisen-hel.description:
With resolution
and without remorse
I will gladly
await my own.

raids/arisen-judge-achlys.name: Arisen Judge Achlys
raids/arisen-judge-achlys.description:
Achlys, the Red Dagger.
Judge of the Rift.

raids/arisen-judge-charon.name: Arisen Judge Charon
raids/arisen-judge-charon.description:
Charon, the Grand Summoner.
Judge of the Rift.

raids/arisen-judge-rhada.name: Arisen Judge Rhada
raids/arisen-judge-rhada.description:
Rhada, the Great Shield.
Judge of the Rift.

raids/arisen-kerberos.name: Arisen Kerberos
raids/arisen-kerberos.description: Arisen (again) from the deep depths of the underworld.

raids/arisen-merlin.name: Arisen Merlin
raids/arisen-merlin.description: Merlin was the most famed and powerful Sorcerer of Avalon, and his demise just may have contributed to the ultimate decay of the great Kingdom. This difficult raid will garnish rewards for most player levels.

raids/arisen-morrigan.name: Arisen Morrigan
raids/arisen-morrigan.description: A great witch of curse and plague, Morrigan has been reborn more powerful than ever.

raids/arisen-ophion-of-olympia.name: Arisen Ophion of Olympia
raids/arisen-ophion-of-olympia.description: Conjured to keep watch over the titans, Ophion learned much of commanding forces.

raids/arisen-phoenix.name: Arisen Phoenix
raids/arisen-phoenix.description: From the ashes, it has risen.

raids/arisen-pumpkinhead.name: Arisen Pumpkinhead
raids/arisen-pumpkinhead.description: A true brute of stories of old. Some say the Hallowed should be feared more than the Fallen.

raids/arisen-quetzalcoatl.name: Arisen Quetzalcoatl
raids/arisen-quetzalcoatl.description: From the high skies to the low lakes. She is reborn.

raids/arisen-surtr.name: Arisen Surtr
raids/arisen-surtr.description:
Surtr moves from the south.
With the scathe of branches.
There shines from his sword.
The sun of Gods of the Slain.

raids/arisen-warlock-trevelyan.name: Arisen Warlock Trevelyan
raids/arisen-warlock-trevelyan.description: It is said that Trevelyan was the last of the court of Meliodas to fall.

raids/arisen-yggdrasil.name: Arisen Yggdrasil
raids/arisen-yggdrasil.description: The great Yggdrasil. Once a symbol of life. Now fallen and arisen.

raids/ashen-phoenix.name: Ashen Phoenix
raids/ashen-phoenix.description: From the ashes, it again has risen.

raids/asteria-of-olympia.name: Asteria of Olympia
raids/asteria-of-olympia.description: With great magic and great resolve, Asteria raised the floors of Olympia's towers in to place.

raids/atlas-of-olympia.name: Atlas of Olympia
raids/atlas-of-olympia.description: Rumored to have lifted a world worth of stone up to the skies, Atlas's strength could not be rivaled.

raids/beguiled-apollyon.name: Beguiled Apollyon
raids/beguiled-apollyon.description: A memory of a younger Apollyon, mystic of Balor. Before exploring such unorthodox magics, Apollyon was both a great teacher and student to Balor's native arts.

raids/cerus.name: Cerus
raids/cerus.description: The untamed bull Cerus has fallen from the skies.

raids/dracon.name: Dracon
raids/dracon.description: Once an infamous king, Dracon led the Draconians to fulfill the Great Dragons' wishes.

raids/ebon-scruug.name: Ebon Scruug
raids/ebon-scruug.description: An apparition of greed and envy. Once a year, the dreaded Scruug returns from the Underworld with the goal to destroy all happiness.

raids/fallen-judge-achlys.name: Fallen Judge Achlys
raids/fallen-judge-achlys.description:
Achlys, the Red Dagger.
Judge of the Rift.

raids/fallen-judge-charon.name: Fallen Judge Charon
raids/fallen-judge-charon.description:
Charon, the Grand Summoner.
Judge of the Rift.

raids/fallen-judge-rhada.name: Fallen Judge Rhada
raids/fallen-judge-rhada.description:
Rhada, the Great Shield.
Judge of the Rift.

raids/fallen-king-arthus.name: Fallen King Arthus
raids/fallen-king-arthus.description: Many see Arthus as perhaps the greatest ruler this land has seen. When the Falling took him, Avalon suffered quite the loss.

raids/fallen-merlin.name: Fallen Merlin
raids/fallen-merlin.description: Merlin was the most famed and powerful Sorcerer of Avalon, and his demise just may have contributed to the ultimate decay of the great Kingdom.

raids/fallen-warlock-trevelyan.name: Fallen Warlock Trevelyan
raids/fallen-warlock-trevelyan.description: It is said that Trevelyan was the last of the court of Meliodas to fall.

raids/ferocious-cerus.name: Ferocious Cerus
raids/ferocious-cerus.description: The untamed bull Cerus has fallen from the skies.

raids/fey-chimera.name: Fey Chimera
raids/fey-chimera.description: A beastly chimera lost to the curse of Morrigan.

raids/fey-cockatrice.name: Fey Cockatrice
raids/fey-cockatrice.description: A cockatrice lost to the curse of Morrigan.

raids/fey-dragon.name: Fey Dragon
raids/fey-dragon.description: A dragon lost to the curse of Morrigan.

raids/fey-gazer.name: Fey Gazer
raids/fey-gazer.description: A gazer lost to the curse of Morrigan.

raids/fey-yeti.name: Fey Yeti
raids/fey-yeti.description: A great yeti lost to the curse of Morrigan.

raids/final-horseman.name: Final Horseman
raids/final-horseman.description: The last of the Four Horseman, the foul being is the bringer of the end.

raids/finesse.name: Finesse
raids/finesse.description: Some say swords materialize in his hands, with just a thought.

raids/first-horseman.name: First Horseman
raids/first-horseman.description: The first of the Four Horseman, the foul being brings famine to the land.

raids/fomor.name: Fomor
raids/fomor.description:
Arguably, Fomor has been the least prolific of Fomorian rulers.

Appointed by a Balor king, he is a master in creating illness.

raids/furious-cerus.name: Furious Cerus
raids/furious-cerus.description: The untamed bull Cerus has fallen from the skies.

raids/grand-knight-lugus.name: Grand Knight Lugus
raids/grand-knight-lugus.description: A knight of Balor, Lugus calls to battle.

raids/hel.name: Hel
raids/hel.description:
With resolution
and without remorse
I will gladly
await my own.

raids/ingenious-cade.name: Ingenious Cade
raids/ingenious-cade.description: Cade, the famed inventor of Avalon, was well renowned for the esoteric gadgets he produced. Perhaps he has been working on something new?

raids/kerberos.name: Kerberos
raids/kerberos.description: Arisen from the deep depths of the underworld.

raids/king-of-ljosalfar.name: King of Ljosalfar
raids/king-of-ljosalfar.description: As day fades, the nameless King of the Ljosalfar has shown himself.

raids/last-titan.name: Last Titan
raids/last-titan.description: The Olympian titans were once revered for their might and wisdom, but have seldom been seen after the Falling.

raids/maelor.name: Maelor
raids/maelor.description: A noble of Balor, Maelor strikes fear to many.

raids/ophion-of-olympia.name: Ophion of Olympia
raids/ophion-of-olympia.description: Conjured to keep watch over the titans, Ophion learned much of commanding forces.

raids/orochi.name: Orochi
raids/orochi.description: Orochi, who breathed life to the diligent Tatzelwurms, was lost to Morrigan's curse.

raids/phoenix.name: Phoenix
raids/phoenix.description: From the ashes, it has risen.

raids/pumpkin-spider.name: Pumpkin Spider
raids/pumpkin-spider.description: Raised from the seeds of the foul Pumpkinhead.

raids/pumpkinhead.name: Pumpkinhead
raids/pumpkinhead.description: A true brute of stories of old. Some say the Hallowed should be feared more than the Fallen.

raids/scruug.name: Scruug
raids/scruug.description: An apparition of greed and envy. Once a year, the dreaded Scruug returns from the Underworld with the goal to destroy all happiness.

raids/second-horseman.name: Second Horseman
raids/second-horseman.description: The second of the Four Horseman, the foul being brings pestilence to the land.

raids/sister-badb.name: Sister Badb
raids/sister-badb.description: A great witch of curse and plague, Badb, sister to Morrigan.

raids/sister-macha.name: Sister Macha
raids/sister-macha.description: A great witch of curse and plague, Macha, sister to Morrigan.

raids/sister-neman.name: Sister Neman
raids/sister-neman.description: A great witch of curse and plague, Neman, sister to Morrigan.

raids/starlord.name: Starlord
raids/starlord.description: It's not often a goblin looks to the skies, but the lord known as "Starlord" could not resist celestial magic.

raids/surtr.name: Surtr
raids/surtr.description:
Surtr moves from the south.
With the scathe of branches.
There shines from his sword.
The sun of Gods of the Slain.

raids/tatzelwurms.name: Tatzelwurms
raids/tatzelwurms.description: The Tatzelwurms worked tirelessly to level Lotan's coiled rock.

raids/the-dioscuri.name: The Dioscuri
raids/the-dioscuri.description: The terrible twins Castor and Pollux have risen from the seas.

raids/the-morrigan.name: The Morrigan
raids/the-morrigan.description:
A great witch of curse and plague, Morrigan was the only being to defeat Apollyon as he approached Lyonesse.

Be warned that this is a difficult foe and may not be suitable for the faint at heart.

raids/third-horseman.name: Third Horseman
raids/third-horseman.description: The third of the Four Horseman, the foul being brings unwavering war to the land.

raids/yggdrasil.name: Yggdrasil
raids/yggdrasil.description: The great Yggdrasil. Once a symbol of life. Now fallen.

raids/young-apollyon.name: Young Apollyon
raids/young-apollyon.description: A memory of a younger Apollyon, mystic of Balor. Before exploring such unorthodox magics, Apollyon was both a great teacher and student to Balor's native arts.

raids/zeus.name: Zeus
raids/zeus.description: Zeus, famed old king of Olympia. He raised an army to reach the skies.

spells/achlys-pact.name: Achlys Pact
spells/achlys-pact.description: Sacrifices all but the strongest summon. This summon will absorb all positive and negative status effects of the sacrificed summons.

spells/aegir-stance.name: Aegir Stance (Off-hand)
spells/aegir-stance.description: Take the stance of Aegir, greatly increasing defenses at the expense of offensive power.

spells/aerial-barrage.name: Aerial Barrage
spells/aerial-barrage.description: Attack from the skies many times with a beak, possibly causing an opponent to bleed and landing a critical hit.

spells/alpha-dart.name: Alpha Dart
spells/alpha-dart.description: Throw a dart with the chance to stun or burn an opponent.

spells/annihilation.name: Annihilation
spells/annihilation.description: Unstable balor magic that can deal immense damage.

spells/annwn-fury.name: Annwn Fury
spells/annwn-fury.description: Release the arcane hidden powers of Annwn, the promised land. Requires 3 turns in battle.

spells/anthem-of-avalon.name: Anthem of Avalon
spells/anthem-of-avalon.description: Potentially boost attack, magic, defenses, and resistance while potentially decreasing opponent stats.

spells/anthem-of-lyonesse.name: Anthem of Lyonesse
spells/anthem-of-lyonesse.description: Potentially boost attack, magic, defenses, and resistance while potentially decreasing opponent stats.

spells/anthem.name: Anthem (Off-hand)
spells/anthem.description: Potentially boost attack, magic, defenses, and resistance while potentially decreasing opponent stats.

spells/apocalypse.name: Apocalypse
spells/apocalypse.description: Unstable apocalytic magic that can deal immense damage.

spells/appease-ii.name: Appease II
spells/appease-ii.description: When battling with your party, your opponents will be less likely to target you.

spells/appease.name: Appease
spells/appease.description: When battling with your party, your opponents will be less likely to target you.

spells/aquila-sigil.name: Aquila Sigil
spells/aquila-sigil.description: Cast a longer lasting celestial sigil upon an opponent.

spells/ara-vesta-ii.name: Ara Vesta II
spells/ara-vesta-ii.description: Deals celestial damage that is dependant on the amount of celestial sigils an opponent is marked with. It may hit additional opponents.

spells/ara-vesta-iii.name: Ara Vesta III
spells/ara-vesta-iii.description: Deals celestial damage that is dependant on the amount of celestial sigils an opponent is marked with. Requires 2 turns in battle.

spells/ara-vesta-iv.name: Ara Vesta IV
spells/ara-vesta-iv.description: Deals massive celestial damage that is dependant on the amount of celestial sigils an opponent is marked with. Requires 3 turns in battle.

spells/ara-vesta.name: Ara Vesta
spells/ara-vesta.description: Deals celestial damage that is dependant on the amount of celestial sigils an opponent is marked with.

spells/ara-vestaga.name: Ara Vestaga
spells/ara-vestaga.description: Deals massive celestial damage that is dependant on the amount of celestial sigils an opponent is marked with. Requires 4 turns in battle.

spells/ara-vestala.name: Ara Vestala
spells/ara-vestala.description: Deals celestial damage that is dependant on the amount of celestial sigils an opponent is marked with.

spells/arcane-strikes-ii.name: Arcane Strikes II
spells/arcane-strikes-ii.description: Attack thrice with unrelenting arcane energy. Requires 3 turns in battle.

spells/arcane-strikes-iii.name: Arcane Strikes III
spells/arcane-strikes-iii.description: Attack 4 times with unrelenting arcane energy. Requires 3 turns in battle.

spells/arcane-strikes-iv.name: Arcane Strikes IV
spells/arcane-strikes-iv.description: Attack 4 times with unrelenting arcane energy. Requires 3 turns in battle.

spells/arcane-strikes.name: Arcane Strikes
spells/arcane-strikes.description: Attack thrice with unrelenting arcane energy. Requires 2 turns in battle.

spells/arcanic-strike.name: Arcanic Strike
spells/arcanic-strike.description: Attack with unrelenting arcane energy. It will deal especially high damage to those weak against Arcane.

spells/arcanus-ii.name: Arcanus II
spells/arcanus-ii.description: Unstable magic that can deal massive arcane damage, but may damage its caster.

spells/arcanus-iii.name: Arcanus III
spells/arcanus-iii.description: Unstable magic that can deal massive arcane damage, but may damage its caster.

spells/arcanus.name: Arcanus
spells/arcanus.description: Unstable magic that can deal massive arcane damage, but may damage its caster.

spells/arrowstorm-2.name: Arrowstorm (Off-hand)
spells/arrowstorm-2.description: Bombard all opponents with many arrows.

spells/arrowstorm-ii.name: Arrowstorm II
spells/arrowstorm-ii.description: Bombard all opponents with many arrows.

spells/arrowstorm.name: Arrowstorm
spells/arrowstorm.description: Bombard all opponents with many arrows.

spells/asteria-stance.name: Asteria Stance (Off-hand)
spells/asteria-stance.description: Take the stance of Asteria, increasing your magic power but losing a great amount of defenses. Additionally, mana will burn away each turn.

spells/atlas-stance.name: Atlas Stance (Off-hand)
spells/atlas-stance.description: Take the stance of Atlas, disabling your ability to use Ward, but locking it in place.

spells/barrier.name: Barrier
spells/barrier.description: Has a good chance to boost physical and magical defenses.

spells/bastion-ii.name: Bastion II (Off-hand)
spells/bastion-ii.description: Grants temporary defenses and grants Ward for 4 turns.

spells/bastion-iii.name: Bastion III (Off-hand)
spells/bastion-iii.description: Grants temporary defenses and grants Ward for 5 turns.

spells/bastion.name: Bastion (Off-hand)
spells/bastion.description: Grants temporary defenses and grants Ward for 3 turns.

spells/battle-dance.name: Battle Dance
spells/battle-dance.description: 25 percent chance per stat to boost a stat.

spells/bears-might.name: Bear's Might
spells/bears-might.description: Summon the power of a great bear. Greatly boosts attack power at the expense of your defenses.

spells/beastslayer-ii.name: Beastslayer II
spells/beastslayer-ii.description: Loose a debilitating dart to conquer a beast. Deals great damage to beasts of the wild.

spells/beastslayer.name: Beastslayer
spells/beastslayer.description: Loose a debilitating dart to conquer a beast. Deals great damage to beasts of the wild.

spells/beaststrike-ii.name: Beaststrike II
spells/beaststrike-ii.description: Attack with the might of beasts and acquire Ward for 1 turn. Total damage is determined by both your attack and magic stats.

spells/beaststrike-iii.name: Beaststrike III
spells/beaststrike-iii.description: Attack with the might of beasts, with a greater chance of dealing critical damage. Total damage is determined by both your attack and magic stats.

spells/beaststrike-iv.name: Beaststrike IV
spells/beaststrike-iv.description: Attack with the might of beasts, with a greater chance of dealing critical damage. Total damage is determined by both your attack and magic stats.

spells/beaststrike.name: Beaststrike
spells/beaststrike.description: Attack with the might of beasts. Total damage is determined by both your attack and magic stats.

spells/beaststrikes.name: Beaststrikes
spells/beaststrikes.description: Swiftly attack thrice with the might of beasts, with a greater chance of dealing critical damage. Total damage is determined by both your attack and magic stats.

spells/berserk-ii.name: Berserk II
spells/berserk-ii.description: Boosts all stats, but take considerable damage over time.

spells/berserk-iii.name: Berserk III
spells/berserk-iii.description: Boosts all stats, but take considerable damage over time.

spells/berserk.name: Berserk
spells/berserk.description: Greatly boosts total damage, but damages oneself over time.

spells/beta-dart.name: Beta Dart
spells/beta-dart.description: Throw a dart with the chance to blind an opponent or cause them to fall asleep.

spells/blast-ii.name: Blast II
spells/blast-ii.description: Deals great non-elemental damage with the potential to hinder an opponent's attack power.

spells/blast-iii.name: Blast III
spells/blast-iii.description: Deals great non-elemental damage with the potential to hinder an opponent's attack power. Requires 2 turns in battle.

spells/blast.name: Blast
spells/blast.description: Deals moderate non-elemental damage with the potential to hinder an opponent's attack power.

spells/bleed.name: Bleed
spells/bleed.description: Attack with a good chance of a critical hit. May cause bleeding.

spells/blessed-shield.name: Blessed Shield
spells/blessed-shield.description: Temporarily greatly increases defense and resistance.

spells/blight-arrow.name: Blight Arrow (Off-hand)
spells/blight-arrow.description: Deals dragon damage and potentially causes blight.

spells/blightblast.name: Blightblast (Off-hand)
spells/blightblast.description: Deals dragon damage and potentially causes blight.

spells/blightstrike-2.name: Blightstrike (Off-hand)
spells/blightstrike-2.description: Deals dragon damage and potentially causes blight.

spells/blightstrike-ii.name: Blightstrike II
spells/blightstrike-ii.description: Strike hard with the chance of causing blight.

spells/blightstrike-iii.name: Blightstrike III
spells/blightstrike-iii.description: Strike hard with the chance of causing blight.

spells/blightstrike.name: Blightstrike
spells/blightstrike.description: Strike hard with the chance of causing blight.

spells/blood-pact-ii.name: Blood Pact II
spells/blood-pact-ii.description: Converts a percentage of all summoned beast's HP into damage.

spells/blood-pact-iii.name: Blood Pact III
spells/blood-pact-iii.description: Converts a percentage of all summoned beast's HP into damage. Requires 2 turns in battle.

spells/blood-pact.name: Blood Pact
spells/blood-pact.description: Converts a percentage of all summoned beast's HP into damage.

spells/bloodshift.name: Bloodshift
spells/bloodshift.description: Has the potential to temporarily boost many stats, but healing will be much less effective.

spells/break-power.name: Break Power
spells/break-power.description: Deals damage proportional to the physical attack skills of an opponent.

spells/break.name: Break
spells/break.description: Cast extremely destructive magic, dealing minimal damage but lowering all of an opponent's stats. Requires 2 turns in battle.

spells/bright-star-ii.name: Bright Star II
spells/bright-star-ii.description: Summon a bright star, with the chance of blinding your opponent.

spells/bright-star.name: Bright Star
spells/bright-star.description: Summon a bright star, with the chance of blinding your opponent.

spells/brilliant-lights-2.name: Brilliant Lights (Off-hand)
spells/brilliant-lights-2.description: Unstable elementless magic that can blind an opponent while dealing damage thrice.

spells/brilliant-lights.name: Brilliant Lights
spells/brilliant-lights.description: Unstable elementless magic that can blind an opponent while dealing damage thrice.

spells/call-of-brynhild-ii.name: Call of Brynhild II
spells/call-of-brynhild-ii.description: Increases the chance of your follower performing a buff or debuff. This skill will be most effective when Valhallan classes attempt it.

spells/call-of-brynhild.name: Call of Brynhild
spells/call-of-brynhild.description: Increases the chance of your follower performing a buff or debuff. This skill will be most effective when Valhallan classes attempt it.

spells/call-of-dumbr.name: Call of Dumbr
spells/call-of-dumbr.description: Lulls your follower, decreasing the rate at which they will act in a turn.

spells/call-of-idun-ii.name: Call of Idun II
spells/call-of-idun-ii.description: Increases the chance of your follower performing a healing spell. This skill will be most effective when Valhallan classes attempt it.
